description.hltext_display: Il cloud aiuta la funzione acquisti
description.content:
Giunta alla sua seconda edizione, l'indagine Barometro Srm - Supplier relationship management, ha evidenziato come le performance legate alla funzione acquisti hanno assunto un valore sempre più importante all'interno delle imprese. Condotta dall'istituto di ricerca Tns-Sofres attraverso 162 interviste telefoniche ad altrettanti direttori acquisti o manager di aziende private e semi-pubbliche con almeno un migliaio di dipendenti, la ricerca in oggetto ha messo in luce una serie di evidenze utilizzate dal fornitore di soluzioni e servizi It innovativi Csc al fine di delineare tendenze e prospettive delle direzioni acquisti operanti in grandi aziende europee e nordamericane.
Fra le prime evidenze emergerebbe, che beneficiando della recente crisi finanziaria, gli acquisti non sarebbero più considerati semplici negoziatori ma veri e propri esperti in grado di proporre, sempre di più, soluzioni per l'ottimizzazione dei processi aziendali o il miglioramento del design di prodotto. Di fatto, stando al Barometro che misura la gestione dei rapporti con i fornitori, il ruolo più complesso e strategico acquisito di recente dai direttori acquisti ha comportato una rifocalizzazione della funzione su attività a maggior valore aggiunto, come negoziazione di contratti strategici, analisi delle spese, marketing degli acquisti e interazione diretta con i clienti interni.
Non stupisce, dunque, l'ampio ricorso, anche da parte dei dipartimenti acquisti, delle nuove tecnologie (cloud computing compreso) per sostenere l'importanza crescente del proprio ruolo e dello stesso processo di acquisto. Fra questi, fanno la loro comparsa strumenti It per ottimizzare il workflow e automatizzare il processo procure-to-pay al fine di liberare risorse da destinare ad altre attività più strategiche e in grado di generare maggior valore. Altrettanto interesse sembra venga riscosso da strumenti informativi per l'analisi dei costi, l'e-sourcing, il monitoraggio della qualità dei fornitori e la gestione del ciclo di vita dei contratti, che permettono di ottenere dati e informazioni cruciali per l'ottimizzazione del valore strategico degli acquisti.
Ancora una volta, ad affermarsi sono best practice che, attraverso la condivisione delle risorse, la globalizzazione degli acquisti, l'esperienza di business di fornitori di servizi specializzati o l'outsourcing delle attività a basso valore aggiunto, permettono di ridurre i costi e mantenere i risparmi già acquisiti. Quest'ultime continuano, infatti, a rimanere al vertice nella lista delle priorità dei dipartimenti acquisti mentre il cosiddetto “procurement sostenibile”, che incorpora al proprio interno il concetto di responsabilità sociale dell'impresa nei processi di acquisto, ha riconquistato valore tra le priorità del 2009, anche se le aziende intervistate percepiscono l'approvvigionamento sostenibile come una necessità che resta, comunque, difficile da attuare.

description.hltext_display: NA adopts 19th Amendment Bill
description.content: The National Assembly has approved the 19th constitutional amendment unanimously , Dunya News reported on Wednesday. Under the amendment, the Prime Minister will also have a say on the issue of judges appointment, while the number of judges of the Judicial Commission has been increased from two to four. The bill is aimed to give effect to changes made in light of suggestions made by the Supreme Court in an Oct 21 order after hearing several challenges to parliaments role in appointing judges of the apex court and high courts as set in the landmark Eighteenth Amendment passed in April. Major amendments proposed in the bill include one increasing the strength of a judicial commission headed by the Supreme Court chief justice, which must propose the names for appointments, from existing seven to nine including four, rather than two, senior-most judges of the apex court besides a former judge of the court to be named by the chief justice and fixing a minimum of 15 years experience for a lawyer to be nominated on the body by the Pakistan Bar Council, besides the federal law minister and the attorney-general. Some other amendments provide that an eight-member Parliamentary Committee that must finally approve the appointment of judges would hold its meetings in camera, send its approval or rejection of a nomination to the prime minister instead of the president who must finally notify an appointment and that it would be exempted from a bar on discussing the conduct of judges in parliament.

description.hltext_display: Fashion Valley Finishes Initial Phase of Renovation
description.content:
Operators have completed renovation of the food court at Fashion Valley, the first phase of an ongoing $15 million revamp of the mall in San Diego’s Mission Valley.
A Dec. 20 statement from the mall’s operator, Indiana-based Simon Property Group Inc., said the redone food court has new dining tables and chairs, bar seating, enhanced landscaping and lighting, and four new skylights.
The next phase of renovations throughout the mall will include the addition of soft-seating “living rooms,” two new fountains, new upper-level shading, and new painting, lighting and signs.
The mall, built in 1969 off Friars Road, is among San Diego County’s largest shopping centers. Renovations began in July and are slated for completion by the end of September.
— Lou Hirsh

description.hltext_display: الهند تجري تجربتين ناجحتين لإطلاق صاروخ "بريتخفي-2"
description.content:
نيودلهي، 22 ديسمبر (كانون الأول). نوفوستي. أجرى العسكريون الهنود اليوم الأربعاء تجربتين ناجحتين لإطلاق صاروخ "بريتخفي-2"، كما أفادت وكالة "يانس" الهندية للأنباء.
ونقلت الوكالة عن مدير ميدان التجارب "تشانديبور" س. ب. داشا قوله إن التجربتين اللتين أجرتهما القوات المسلحة حققتا النجاح.
ولم يتمكن مجربو صاروخ "بريتخفي-2" البالغ مداه 350 كيلومترا من إطلاقه في التجربة السابقة في شهر سبتمبر الماضي.
وقبل ذلك بيوم أجرت باكستان تجربة لصاروخ "خطف-5" البالغ مداه 1300 كيلومتر.
وذكرت وسائل الإعلام أن صاروخ "بريتخفي-2" قادر على ضرب أهداف من على بعد يصل إلى 350 كيلومترا بدقة متناهية.
ويقدر هذا الصاروخ على حمل رؤوس مدمرة على اختلاف أنواعها يصل وزنها إلى 500 كيلوغرام.

description.hltext_display: Челябинские общественники призывают арестовать Лукашенко
description.content:
Президент Белорусии Александр Лукашенко. Коллаж: ИА REGNUM
Члены челябинского отделения федерального демократического движения "Солидарность" призывают правительства России, стран Евросоюза и США инициировать международное преследование и арест президента Белоруссии Александра Лукашенко. Об этом корреспонденту ИА REGNUM сообщили 22 декабря в координационном совете движения.
"Мы солидарны с десятками тысяч граждан Белоруссии, которые вышли в ночь подведения итогов выборов президента, чтобы выразить свой протест против массовых фальсификаций, политических репрессий и убийств. Мы требуем от белорусских властей немедленного и безусловного освобождения всех политических заключенных, а от российских властей не признавать итоги прошедших выборов. Мы уверены, Белоруссия устала от Лукашенко. Мы считаем, что мировое сообщество более не вправе терпеть произвол, самодурство и пренебрежение элементарными правами и свободами человека со стороны Александра Лукашенко. Мы знаем, народ Белоруссии готов к демократическим переменам, но он нуждается в помощи. Мы уверены, что арест этого единственного человека - Александра Лукашенко - неминуемо приведет к ненасильственному краху его коррумпированного режима, избавит народ Белоруссии от тирана и положит старт для уверенного движения страны в сторону демократии", - говорится в сообщении "Солидарности".
Напомним, 19 декабря в Белоруссии прошли выборы президента, в которых победил Александр Лукашенко. В связи с этим 19, 20 и 21 декабря в Белоруссии проходили акции протеста, которые были жестоко подвалены, а их участники - арестованы.

description.hltext_display: Eclipse de soleil : la DGS appelle les Français à la vigilance
description.content:
Le 4 janvier 2011 aura lieu une éclipse annulaire de soleil visible partout en France. La Direction générale la Santé (DGS) recommande aux personnes désireuses de l'observer de se munir de moyens de protection adéquats.
Le 4 janvier 2011 aura lieu une éclipse annulaire de soleil visible partout en France. La Direction générale la Santé (DGS) recommande aux personnes désireuses de l'observer de se munir de moyens de protection adéquats.
Le 4 janvier 2011 aura lieu une éclipse annulaire de soleil visible partout en France. La Direction générale la Santé (DGS) recommande aux personnes désireuses de l'observer de se munir de moyens de protection adéquats.
Le 4 janvier 2011 aura lieu une éclipse annulaire de soleil visible partout en France. La Direction générale la Santé (DGS) recommande aux personnes désireuses de l'observer de se munir de moyens de protection adéquats.
Pour trouver des lunettes de protection spéciales, mieux vaut s'adresser aux opticiens, aux pharmaciens ou à des magasins spécialisés.
L'éclipse annulaire de soleil, qui se déroulera le 4 janvier prochain, débutera vers 7h50 pour s'achever aux alentours de 10h30, selon où l'on se trouve en France. Selon la DGS, le pourcentage maximal de la surface du disque solaire occultée par la Lune aura lieu vers 9h et "atteindra son maximum de 65% à Paris".
La DGS rappelle que regarder une éclipse sans protection pour les yeux adéquate peut engendrer, notamment chez les enfants, des lésions oculaires pouvant être irréversibles.
Et de rappeler que les lunettes spéciales doivent répondre aux dispositions de la directive européenne 89 / 686 / CEE et porter le marquage CE de conformité.
Pour de plus amples renseignements sur l'observation de tels phénomènes, la DGS conseille de se rendre sur le site Internet de l'Institut de mécanique céleste et de calcul des éphémérides, Imcce.fr.

description.hltext_display: Kallt - men långt ifrån värst
description.author: Petter Söderbäck petter.soderback@vlt.se
description.content:
- Just nu mäter vi upp -25 grader, vilket är det lägsta för dygnet, säger Elin Torstensson på SMHI.
Personer som hört av sig till VLT har rapporterat om temperaturer kring -30, och sådana lokala variationer kan mycket väl förekomma. Med det är SMHI:s mätningar som är kontrollerade och ligger till grund för den officiella statistiken. Bortåt Uppland ligger också SMHI:s temperatut några grader lägre än kring Västerås.
Köldrekordet för december är i Västerås från 1927, då det en dag var -27 grader. Kallast någonsin var det i staden en dag i januari 1918 då SMHI:s termometer visade -31 grader.
- Det är riktigt kallt i hela landet nu, speciellt i Skåne där det varit kring -25. Nu kommer det fortsätta att vara kallt, men inte riktigt lika kallt. På julafton blir det kring -15 grader, säger Elin Torstensson.
Snödjupet i Västeråstrakten är just nu 2-3 decimeter enligt SMHI:s mätningar. Det är över det normala, men inte är närheten av snörekordet på 555 centimeter som är från 1915. En mer nutida jämförelsesiffra är från den 30 december år 2000 då det låg 40 centimeter snö i staden.

description.hltext_display: Eerste Kamer gaat akkoord met nieuw pensioenvehikel
description.content:
DEN HAAG - De Eerste Kamer is gisteren akkoord gegaan met een nieuw soort pensioenvehikel: de premiepensioeninstelling (ppi). Volgens deskundigen betekent dit een doorbraak in de markt voor zogeheten beschikbare premieregelingen. Diverse partijen, waaronder banken en beleggingsinstellingen, zouden zich al warmlopen langs de zijlijn.
Bij beschikbare premieregelingen staat de maandelijkse inleg van individuele deelnemers weliswaar vast, maar is de toekomstige uitkering ongewis. Als het gaat om het tweede pijler pensioen, dat gespaard wordt via de werkgever, is deze pensioenvorm tot nu toe vooral af te sluiten bij een verzekeraar. Ook een aantal pensioenfondsen voert dit soort regelingen uit.
Verandering
Met de ppi moet daar verandering in komen. Dit vehikel, dat is ingegeven door Europese regelgeving, moet de concurrentie aangaan met verzekeraars en pensioenfondsen. Niet alleen in Nederland, maar juist ook in andere lidstaten van de Europese Unie. In veel landen is het aanvullend pensioen gebaseerd op beschikbare premieregelingen, ook wel defined contribution (dc) genoemd. Zoals in Engeland.
Volgens pensioenadviseur Tim Burggraaf (Mercer) kan een ppi een aantrekkelijk alternatief vormen voor werkgevers. Het vehikel zou kostenverlagingen in de hand moeten werken. De ppi neemt slechts het beheer van de ingelegde pensioenpremies, de beleggingen en de administratie op zich. Een werkgever kan zelf kiezen bij welke partij hij risicos op arbeidsongeschiktheid en overlijden afdekt. Verschillende partijen hebben interesse om de Nederlandse markt te bestormen, waaronder ABN Amro, Brand New Day en BeFrank. Afwentelen Critici waarschuwen echter dat werkgevers deze noviteit willen gebruiken om het beleggingsrisico volledig op hun personeel af te wentelen. Zij krijgen hiermee een pensioen op basis van dagkoersen.
Burggraaf denkt dat het zon vaart niet zal lopen. Voor het wijzigen van gegarandeerde regelingen, ook wel defined benefit (db) genoemd, is toestemming nodig van de vakbonden of de ondernemingsraad. Ik denk dat in de praktijk vooral dc-regelingen zullen verschuiven van een verzekeraar naar een ppi.

description.hltext_display: Bangladesh: Phụ Nữ Bị Đánh Roi Về Tội Ngoại Tình Đã Chết
description.content:
DHAKA - 1 phụ nữ bị đánh roi về tội ngoại tình với con riêng của chồng đã chết 1 tháng sau ngày bị trừng phạt - cảnh sát đã bắt giữ 2 người, gồm 1 người thi hành lệnh đánh roi, theo tin của truyền thông Bangladesh.
Bà Sufia Begum 50 tuổi bị toà Hồi Giáo kết án trong làng thuộc quận Rajshahi, trong vùng tây bắc Bangladesh, và bị đánh 40 roi vào ngày 12-11.
Cảnh sát trưởng địa phương xác nhận bà Begum vào bệnh viện 1 tuần sau khi bị đánh, với 7 thương tích trầm trọng, theo tin của BBC. Điều chưa rõ là tại sao bà Begum vào nhà thương chậm trễ như thế. Bác sĩ khuyến cáo bà đi thủ đô để chữa trị, vì các thương tích là rất nặng.
1 người anh em cho biết thận của bà Begum bị thương tổn nặng và bà đã chết trong lúc gia đình quyên góp tiền. Ông này nói : thân thể của bà Begum sưng phù, khó nhận ra.
Theo tin của BBC, cái chết của bà Begum chưa đuợc xác định là hậu quả của đánh roi. Từ đầu năm 2010, chính quyền Bangladesh đã ra luật cấm đánh roi, nhưng trên thực tế, phụ nữ ngoại tình vẫn bị trừng phạt theo cách này.

description.hltext_display: 海通证券：2010年市场供给中性A股大跌可能性小
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
和讯消息 12月22日，海通证券(600837,股吧)2011年投资策略报告会在上海举行，海通证券研究所策略高级分析师陈瑞明表示，2011年市场供给中性，A股大跌可能性小，预测整体盈利增速15%-18%，上证综指运行区间为2600-3500点。
陈瑞明表示，A股在所有新兴市场中具有“高增长、中等估值”优势，具备战略投资价值。国内货币政策回归稳健，但不改变存量流动性充裕格局。在实际负利率、通胀、房市调控背景下，估值不贵的A股具备配置价值。明年市场供给中性，不会对股市造成大冲击。
陈瑞明指出，根据海通证券的研究预测，2011年上半年，经济预期与政策预期双波动，股市震荡的可能性较大。下半年，政策放松，股指上行的可能性大，但持续性和高度取决于具体政策形势。2011年A股整体盈利增速15%-18%，上证综指运行区间为2600-3500点。
从经济、货币周期看行业，陈瑞明继续看好大消费，但随着经济触底回升、制造业“二次去库存”，中游毛利率将有所下降，因此他表示，上半年相对看淡中上游。
海通证券研究所宏观经济高级分析师李明亮在报告会上表示，中国经济将于2011年软着陆而非二次探底，经济增长率将达9.3%左右。同时，他还指出，对明年的商品房投资持谨慎态度，但看好保障房投资，货币政策收紧的持续效应将显现，明年投资增长总体平稳。

description.hltext_display: Cipiers in Lantin staken weer
description.content:
In de gevangenis van Lantin, nabij Luik, hebben de cipiers dinsdag opnieuw het werk neergelegd. Er is onvrede over het gebrek aan personeel.Vorige week werd er ook al gestaakt in de instelling, nadat een cipier was aangevallen door een gevangene.
Er werden al gesprekken met de directie gevoerd over de aanwerving van nieuwe krachten, maar dat leverde niets op. Een meerderheid van 80 procent besloot daarop het werken stop te zetten.
Ook in de gevangenis van Sint-Gillis is er al een hele week een staking aan de gang. De actievoerders wensen er eveneens extra mensen.

description.hltext_display: Green Dragons down Jellico
description.content:
CORBIN — The Harlan Green Dragons used a balanced attack on Thursday night to defeat the Jellico, Tenn., Blue Devils, 72-44, in the opening round of the Bowman Memorial Classic. Harlan had four players score in double figures, led by junior guard Chris Begley with 18 points.
The Green Dragons controlled the game from the tip, taking a 14-9 lead after the first quarter. Five different players scored for Harlan in the opening quarter, with Begley and junior center Cody Nolan scoring four points each.
“We were a little sluggish to open the game – we weren’t very fluid. We had some good baskets that jump started us there, and then we got going,” said Harlan Coach Casey Lester. “Once we got going, I thought we played well.
The Green Dragons began to heat up in the second quarter when the senior guard hit three shots from beyond the arc on Harlan’s first three possessions of the period. Sophomore point guard Ty Saragas added the fourth consecutive trey to give Harlan a 26-14 lead midway through the quarter. Back-to-back baskets by senior guard Philip Ely helped give Harlan a 30-20 advantage heading into the half.
“Hampton came in and hit those three big 3-point shots for us, and that really sparked us in the second quarter. We extended the lead, and that gave us something to build on,” said Lester.
The Green Dragons had six different players score in the first half, scoring on the inside and out, which is something Lester likes about his team.
“Something about our team this year is that we have the ability to score from different spots on the floor,” said Lester. “We are an unselfish bunch who like playing together, and who get along, and when one kid has a bad night, we have another kid step up for us. That makes a big difference.”
Harlan showcased a 2-2-1 press to open the third quarter, forcing numerous turnovers by the Blue Devils, which led to a 10-0 run to start the second half. The Green Dragons continued to extend their lead throughout the quarter, limiting Jellico to just nine points. At the end of the third, Harlan held a 53-29 lead.
“We have been preaching defense since the start of the season, and that is the way we’ve got to play — put pressure on people and force turnovers,” said Lester. “I think tonight was the first night that we actually got down and guarded the penetration and played good help defense. The intensity we had in the second half was big. We didn’t come out relaxed and try to coast through it, but we came out, got after them and got some easy baskets early. That was the difference in the second half.”
Begley and senior center Brad Tomlin combined to score Harlan’s first nine points of the fourth quarter, extending the Green Dragons’ lead to 30 points. Lester turned to his bench midway through the fourth quarter and got another basket from sophomore guard Dakota Morris before time expired, giving Harlan a 28-point victory.
Lester said he was pleased with his team’s performance and the effort they showed.
“We have to play like that each night. We have to get on the floor, guard people, and play with the intensity that we showed tonight. If we can do that, we can be a pretty good team,” said Lester.
Begley led all scorers with 18 points. Hampton scored 13, while Ely and Saragas added 11 and 10 points, respectively.
The Green Dragons will return to action Saturday at 7 when they take on the Lynn Camp Wildcats in the last night of the Bowman Memorial Classic.

description.hltext_display: 司机曾向家人投诉 路段偶有油渍不安全
description.content:
●南洋商报
（怡保21日讯）金马仑严重巴士意外丧命司机奥玛沙希旦的亲属阿斯瓦迪指出，奥玛曾告诉他，金马仑至新邦波赖的路段不安全。
31岁的阿斯瓦迪受询说，奥玛沙希淡曾告诉他，该路段偶尔会有油渍，导致路滑，他数次险些踏入鬼门关。
“他没有说那是人为的恶作剧或其他原因，只表示若当局没监督，可能会发生悲剧。我也是巴士司机，我希望当局监督……不要在发生事故后只将矛头指向巴士司机。”
阿斯瓦迪说，奥玛驾驶的是载满海外游客的旅巴，他认为奥玛不可能超速。
“奥玛是负责在首都的一家酒店，将游客载送到金马仑高原，接着再将他们载回吉隆坡。”
奥玛的家属已在昨天认领其遗体，将遗体带回家乡安葬。

description.hltext_display: Egyptian spy admits luring a Lebanese daily's editor
description.author: Al Arabiya
description.content:
Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak (R) shakes hands with Israel's PM Benjamin Netanyahu
DUBAI (Al Arabiya)
Tarek Abdel Razzak Hassan, the Egyptian accused of spying for Israel has confessed in a court that he tried recruiting the editor-in -chief of one prominent Lebanese newspaper, the Cairo-based al-Masry al-Youm reported on Wednesday.
In his confession before the Supreme State Security Prosecution, Hassan aged 37, said that he received instruction from an officer from the Israeli Secret Service, Mossad, to lure and recruit the editor-in-chief of one of the big newspapers in Lebanon known for its close ties with Syria and Hezbollah.
Name of the newspaper kept anonymous, but Hassan tried to lure the editor-in-chief by offering lucrative deals such as the editor’s opportunity to produce his own TV program with a budget worth $200 thousands, in addition to other preliminary incentives to join Mossad such as tourist trips to Africa.
His Mossad training in Asia
Hassan also confessed that he went to India to receive training by Joseph Dimore, one of the two Israelis who are still fugitives after being discovered by the Egyptian authorities.
In 2007 Hassan traveled to Thailand under the request from Dimore where he frequented the Israeli embassy there.
Dimore introduced him to the other Israeli escapee, Diddy Moshe. Moshe trained Hassan to collect information clandestinely, and make fake IDs.
Dimore also asked Hassan to travel to Cambodia, Laos, and Nepal to continue training.
Hassan was given by Moshe a laptop computer equipped with a hard-to-penetrate encrypted program as a way to communicate between each other. He also gave Hassan a laptop case which contains the means to hide documents that cannot be detected through the eyes or hardware.
He sets up companies to recruit potential spies
The Mossad chose 8 of 50 applicants for tests before recruiting them as agents
Tarek Abdel Razzak Hassan, the Egyptian accused of spying for Israel
In addition to the high-tech espionage gadgets, Hassan was supplied with a mobile phone with a Hong Kong company tag, and money to set an import and export company in China under a new email and alias “Khalid Sharif” registered in Hong Kong.
The company aim was for “Khalid Sharif” to be engaged with business transactions with Syrian traders involved in the export of olive oils, sweets, and real estate to China as a way to select the “suitable” ones to be later recruited by Mossad.
According to the al-Masry al-Youm English version, Hassan claimed the Mossad shackled him with debt to coerce him to continue his Mossad cooperation.
“They made me continuously spend the money so that I’d constantly require more,” he said.
Prosecutors interrogated Hassan for more than 18 hours over several days. He confessed to having received dozens of requests from Egyptians, Syrians and Lebanese nationals willing to work for a company he had advertised on the internet.
“The Mossad chose 8 of 50 applicants for tests before recruiting them as agents,” he told prosecutors.
His lawyer Nemat al-Sayed said she can prove that her client did not receive information from any of the purported applicants. “The investigation is devoid of evidence proving the defendant's guilt,” she said.

description.hltext_display: Kıbrıs gazisinin yürek burkan dramı!
description.content: Kıbrıs gazisi Ergün Caner, bankaya 84 bin liralık borcunu ödeyemeyince “Gururuma yediremedim. Eşimle intihara karar verdik. Karım bensiz yaşayamaz” notu bırakıp, önce eşi Meryem’i sonra kendini vurdu.İzmir'in Torbalı İlçesi’nde, 30 yıldır evli olan Meryem ve Ergün Caner çiftinin evinden, dün saat 11.30 sıralarında silah sesi gelmesi üzerine, komşuları durumu polise bildirdi. Eve gelen polis, açık bırakıldığı anlaşılan kapıdan içeri girdiklerinde, Caner çiftini yataklarında kanlar içinde buldu.Polisin yaptığı ilk incelemede, Kıbrıs gazisi Ergün Caner’in ruhsatlı tabancasıyla önce eşini yatağında başından vurduğu, ardından yanına uzanıp elini tutuktan sonra ağzına dayadığı aynı tabancayla canına kıydığı anlaşıldı. Evde yapılan aramada Ergün Caner’in birini yakınlarına, diğeri de savcılığa hitaben yazdığı iki mektup bulundu. Olayla ilgili soruşturma başlatan polis, çocukları olmayan Caner çiftinin yakınlarının ifadelerine başvurdu.Ergün Caner’in olaydan önce 15 yaşındaki yeğeni Ali Berke Tanıç’a telefon edip, “Seni ben büyüttüm. Hakkını helal et. Borçlarım nedeniyle canıma kıyıyorum” dediği belirlendi.Çiftçilik yapan Ergün Caner’in bir süre önce bir bankadan kredi çekerek ev aldığını belirten akrabası Okşan Bakır, “Bankaya 84 bin lira borcu vardı. Ödeyemeyince, evine haciz işlemi başlatılmış” dedi. Kıbrıs gazisi Ergün Caner yakınlarına bıraktığı mektupta, “Borcum vardı. Bunu gururuma yediremedim. Bu yüzden eşimle intihara karar verdik. Karım bensiz yaşayamaz. Birbirimizi çok seviyoruz. Bu nedenle intihara karar verdik. Bizi affedin” diye yazdı.Ergün Caner’in eşini vurduktan sonra, amcasının kızı Yasemin Taniç’i telefonla arayıp, “Biz intihara karar verdik, helalleştik. Yengeni öldürdüm. Şimdi de ben intihar ediyorum. Hakkınızı helal edin” dediği ortaya çıktı.

description.hltext_display: Data Exchange the most happening thing in Social Media
description.author: Tomer Ryder
description.content: The rise of the Internet, Social Networking and Mobile Technology has advanced us past traditional ‘communication' methods. You will no longer observe people sticking to their cellphones talking anymore. On the contrary what one is sure to observe these days is the use of cellphones to send out facebook or twitter updates. So it seems, and it should come as no surprise, that the way in which we communicate more frequently is reliant on more data exchange than a telephone exchange. No wonder one of the most valuable commodities on the market is data. User information, trends, market research, and more are all data that get traded regularly. But where is this going to take us?Telco's are some of the undisputed giants of our world, in fact, the world's wealthiest man is a Telco mogul – but what we're seeing is a dramatic shift towards an emphasis of data, over calls.In Japan, they're already using data-only provisions to connect and communicate, with their Telco providers ahead of the shift towards a data-driven society. The Telco moguls have already understood the importance of data and have already started using its potential. Diversification from voice to data is like a homecoming but people exchange more than data over the networks these days thus the technology has to be revisited and made best so that users are glued like kids are to video games.Data, as it seems, has become our most important resource. It is the link between us and the rest of the world, and VOIP services like Skype should gain strength over time – forcing us to be a "phoneless" society, and more a data-exchange society.� It has already started phones are being used less for taking and making calls as the other applications and browsers available even in the very basic phones are quite captivating. Moreover the networks have reworked themselves to give their best to the customers even before they ask for it.Starbucks completely embracing free Wifi as its source of entertainment for its customers, we expect a giant shift towards data becoming a competitive industry, as it becomes an absolute necessity for modern human life.You can learn more about , and Social Media Consultant, by visiting - http://socialmediabrisbane.blogspot.com/

description.hltext_display: Friendship Centre goes for funding
description.content:
A concept for a Friendship Centre and Gathering Place in 100 Mile House passed through the final review by a steering committee on Dec. 17.
An application was then submitted on Dec. 20 for a Community Action Initiative (CAI) Service Innovation Grant for the project, which provides up to $200,000 to successful applicants.
South Cariboo Community Planning Council (SCCPC) executive co-ordinator Lea Smirfitt says the grant proposal put forward the idea of a warm, welcoming resting space that might also include a fireplace, private resource areas and other features.
Patrons of the centre could also benefit by meeting and building relationships with some visiting service providers in a more comfortable setting, Smirfitt adds.
Furthering the vision of the SCCPC and many South Cariboo partners, the project’s lead organization on the application was identified as the Canim Lake Band (Tsq’escenemc): People of Broken Rock.
“By embracing the Canim Lake Band as the lead proponent for this CAI, the partnered service providers are embarking on a concerted effort to appropriately engage a segment of the population that has previously been isolated,” Smirfitt explains.
Service providers participated in the steering committee and brainstorming sessions while individuals were approached for input through surveys and focus groups, she notes.
She adds that another part of the Friendship Centre project is to celebrate the First Nations history, art and culture in the community.
Canadian Mental Health Association-South Cariboo executive director Maggie Patterson-Dickey also sat on the steering committee.
She says the project is looking for a comprehensive and dynamic solution to alleviate some of the issues faced by the most vulnerable community members.
These include embracing and engaging both aboriginal and non-aboriginal residents, she says.
“It’s going to welcome all the people of the South Cariboo and we want to foster a deeper sense of community and increased empathy.”
The centre could decrease barriers to accessing community services as well as being especially beneficial to those with commuting difficulties, providing a place to spend safe, quality time while waiting for (or between) appointments in town, she explains.
If all goes as planned, other funding will also be sourced for the centre, she says, as well as some that is currently available under other initiatives that could be applied under its current criteria.
“It’s just like a great big potluck,” she says, adding that name stems from the First Nations term of “potlatch.”

description.hltext_display: TMC Launches Redesigned 'Vitz'
description.content:
Models with Idling-stop Boast Fuel Efficiency of 26.5 km/L
Toyota City, Japan, December 22, 2010—Toyota Motor Corporation (TMC) announces the launch in Japan today of the redesigned "Vitz" compact car.
Vitz F Smart Stop package
(1.3-liter front-wheel-drive vehicle)
Since the launch of the first-generation in 1999, the Vitz has achieved cumulative sales in more than 70 countries and regions around the world—including many European countries—exceeding 3.5 million units*1. With more than 1.4 million of those units*2 having been sold in Japan, the Vitz is truly a core model of the Toyota brand.
The new, third-generation Vitz, developed based on a new definition of the ideal compact car to meet consumers' diversifying compact-car needs, features sharper styling as well as a compact exterior but roomy, refined interior; abundant utility; and outstanding fuel efficiency of 26.5 km/L—made possible by the Toyota Stop & Start idling-stop system—in the 10-15 test cycle of the Japanese Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism (MLIT). The result is a distinctive compact car that achieves performance equivalent to a vehicle one class higher in terms of quality, comfort, ease of use and affordability.
With four grades that emphasize unique individuality, 17 body colors and four interior colors available, the Vitz is a highly appealing next-generation compact that enhances the enjoyment of choosing the perfect car and the pride of ownership.
Monthly sales target for Japan: 10,000 units
Assembly Plant: Nagakusa Plant, Toyota Industries Corporation

(1.0 liter)

*Includes consumption tax, does not include recycling fees and differs in Hokkaido and Okinawa
Vehicle Outline
Exterior symbolizes innovation united with a high-quality interior
The exterior has been completely redesigned under the key design concept words of agility and sophistication. The result is a dynamism conveying the car's brisk and responsive handling as well as a sophistication expressing compact-car elegance and presence.
The exterior design achieves high aerodynamic performance (coefficient drag value of 0.285), contributing to high fuel efficiency and stable high-speed cruising.
The interior strives to create a form both sporty and comfortable. For example, padding that extends horizontally from the instrument panel to the door trim conveys roominess and creates a sophisticated feel.
New package provides both easy driving and a roomy interior
The compact length, just 3,885 mm, enables a turning radius of 4.5 m.
The interior length has been extended by 35 mm to 1,915 mm, creating a roomier space.
The front seats use a new frame that enhances seating comfort, and the rear seats have 35 mm more legroom to create a comfortable and relaxing space in the rear.
The rear seats fold in a 6:4 split, enabling flexible arrangement.
The vertical adjustment range of the driver's seat is now 60 mm (15 mm more than the previous model) and the seat slide adjustment range is 10 mm with 24 steps (8 steps more than the previous model), allowing the driver to achieve an optimal driving position.
Utility and enhanced performance ideal for a range of driving situations
The cargo space has been made 145 mm deeper, providing ample storage capacity. Also, a new adjustable deck board can be set at two heights: When set in the upper position small objects can be placed below, and folding down the rear seats can create an almost-flat luggage space.
A discreet sub compartment for storing the owner's manual is located at the top of the glove compartment, expanding storage space.
The passenger seat has a special plastic barrier that can be used to prevent handbags or other items from falling forward off the seat. Shopping bags and such can be hooked to the top of the barrier, which can also be used to keep an umbrella in place.
The new Vitz is the first vehicle in the world to use UV-reducing glass in the front-door glass that reduces 99%*3 of ultraviolet light, providing the same level of UV protection as wearing gloves*4.
The single windshield wiper works with an integrated washer nozzle that improves wiping performance.
The headlights automatically turn on and off according to exterior brightness.
The new Vitz is equipped with a color, rearview monitor that enhances visibility when parking, as well as an HDD navigation system that incorporates steering-wheel-mounted audio-system-control switches.
Comfortable cruising, due consideration to safety and the environment
The Smart Stop package, featuring a new idling-stop function, mounts a 1.3-liter engine on a two-wheel drive model to achieve class-leading*5 fuel efficiency of 26.5 km/L. The engine restarts in just 0.35 seconds to ensure smooth and immediate acceleration from a stop.
The 1.3-liter models are now equipped with a 1NR-FE engine with Dual VVT-i (Dual Variable Valve Timing-intelligent). Pairing with a Super CVT-i (Super Continuously Variable Transmission-intelligent) transmission achieves outstanding fuel efficiency of 24.0 km/L (two-wheel drive models) and powerful cruising. The four-wheel drive models are also equipped with Super CVT-i for smooth cruising and higher fuel efficiency.
The front-wheel-drive models (with CVT) surpass the existing Japanese 2010 fuel efficiency standards by 25% and the four-wheel-drive models surpass the standards by 15%. All models in the series achieve emission levels 75% lower than the 2005 standards under MLIT's Approval System for Low-emission Vehicles, qualifying for incentives under the Japanese government's taxation system for environment friendly vehicles. As a result, the front-wheel-drive models (with CVT) qualify for a 75% reduction in the automobile acquisition tax and automobile weight tax, while the four-wheel-drive models qualify for 50% reductions.
A multi-information display located within the instrument cluster shows information including fuel efficiency, average fuel efficiency and possible cruising distance. Further, an Eco Driving Indicator that turns on when the accelerator is operated in an environmentally friendly manner supports eco-driving.
EBD (electronic brake-force distribution) and ABS are standard on all models.
The Vitz features an omni-directional compatibility structure to provide outstanding collision safety performance in the event of a collision from the front, side or rear.
All vehicles come equipped with SRS airbags for both the driver and front-passenger seats. SRS side airbags also provide chest protection, while SRS curtain-shield airbags aim to reduce head injuries.
The WIL (Whiplash-injury Lessening) concept has been adopted for the front seats, adding backrest-give and head and back support for more protection in the event of a rear-end collision.
A pedestrian-injury-lessening body has been adopted to minimize impact to the head and legs of pedestrians in the unfortunate event of a collision.
Four grades emphasize individuality and boost the joy of selection
The new and distinctive Jewela grade features exclusive body and interior colors and interior and exterior ornamentation with a plated finish to convey vibrancy. The Jewela also offers a selectable sophisticated silver-finish for the door mirrors and door handles.
The F grade has specifications designed to meet a wide range of needs including price, fuel efficiency, and comfort.
On the U grade, a leather-covered steering wheel and shift knob and heated seats that warm the shoulders and back are standard equipment to enhance comfort and sophistication.
The sporty RS grade has exclusive designs on the front and rear, including the bumpers and a roof spoiler. Various other equipment, including exclusive sports car style seats, a steering wheel wrapped in leather with dimple stitching, and a fun-to-drive five-speed manual transmission or seven-speed Sports Sequential Shiftmatic transmission with a paddle shift-type shift lever that provides manual-transmission feel.
Welcabs: Vehicles with factory-installed features for the disabled
The Lift-up Front Passenger Seat model is equipped with a front passenger seat that rotates and slides down and to the outside of the vehicle. The B type comes with a motorized device for loading and unloading a wheelchair as standard equipment.
A Welcab Friendmatic model allowing for the installation of a specialized driver's seat and devices is also available. This vehicle has special power steering as a standard feature that reduces the force needed for operation compared to the base vehicle, making the steering wheel easier to turn during initial acceleration and low-speed driving.

description.hltext_display: Will Google follow Microsoft in EU probe?
description.content:
SAN FRANCISCO/BRUSSELS: Google Inc's Internet search algorithm is the technology world's equivalent of the Coca-Cola formula: a top-secret corporate crown jewel.
But pressure is growing on Google to lift the veil on some of its inner workings as European regulators investigate complaints that Google's search engine unfairly discriminates against certain websites.
The case underscores the increased scrutiny over Google's influence in the Internet industry and could set the stage for the kind of long-running regulatory battle fought in the past by technology giants like Microsoft Corp.
Odds are that the world's No. 1 search engine will seek to keep prying eyes -- even those of the European Commission, known in many circles globally as the toughest watchdog -- away from the ranking algorithms that are the core of its business.
"It is difficult to see how this won't come to an impasse in terms of how far can Google go, in terms of opening up access to their secret sauce as it were, which is the basis for their existence," said Martin Olausson at research firm Strategy Analytics.
If the EU determines that Google abused its position in the search market, the Commission could order Google to alter its search practices, such as providing more transparency into its algorithm, or face a fine of up to 10 percent of annual global revenue.
Google has faced criticism in the past that its technology for determining which websites get top billing in search results is too much of a black box. As Google has grown in clout, and as it begins providing its own Web content such as video within results, calls for greater transparency into its search algorithm have swelled.
The Commission ratcheted up pressure on Google this month when it opened a formal probe into allegations the company had abused its dominant position in the search market.
In addition to the charge that Google rigged its algorithms to lower rivals' rankings, complainants said it unfairly promoted its own services, forced advertisers to accept exclusivity deals, and blocked companies from transferring advertising data to other online ad platforms.
"The complaint is often that there's too much at stake. The claim is Google is now too powerful and it's really tantamount to a utility that everybody uses," said Greg Sterling, an Internet consultant and a contributing editor for the online blog Search Engine Land.
Big in Europe
The situation is particularly acute in Europe, where Google controls roughly 77 percent of the market share of search queries, according to industry analytics firm ComScore.
This month, the EU confirmed that it had also taken over two complaints about Google's search practices from German competition authorities.
Google has said it intends to cooperate with the EU's investigation. But the company has a history of keeping its search algorithm close to the vest.
While Google provides certain guidelines about its algorithms to help Web publishers ensure that their sites are accurately ranked, the hundreds of specific "ranking factors" that it uses to rank websites, and the weight it attaches to each of those factors, remain a much-speculated-upon mystery.
"We provide more guidance for websites than any other search engine, and we're constantly exploring new ways to be even more transparent with webmasters about our ranking principles," Google spokesman Adam Kovacevich said in an email. "But disclosing the exact details would only help spammers, make search engines less useful, and hurt our users."
Foundem, one of the complainants in the EU case, has said it is not seeking to get Google to publish details of its algorithm. Instead, it said on the website searchneutrality.org, the company wants Google to be more transparent about the rationale for the various "exclusionary penalties" that can keep certain sites out of search results, and for Google to provide an appeals process for websites that feel such penalties have been mistakenly applied to them.
Foundem is a member of ICOMP, an online trade group that has received funding from Microsoft. One of the other complainants in the EU case, German price comparison site Ciao, is owned by Microsoft.
Easy fix?
Google joins other technology giants, including Apple Inc (AAPL.O), Intel Corp (INTC.O) and Microsoft, whose business practices have triggered scrutiny from European regulators.
Microsoft, which was fined 1.68 billion euros over the course of its decade-plus battle with the Commission, agreed to give European consumers better access to rival Internet browsers in Windows and to improve interoperability with its products last December.
The key challenge for the Commission now is to show that Google conscientiously abused its power in the search market to harm certain websites, said Brett Gordon, a professor at Columbia Business School.
"The Commission would have to show that Google unfairly tampered with their algorithm to disadvantage other search services," he said.
Last week, France's antitrust watchdog warned the company not to abuse its dominant position in online advertising, citing a list of possible anti-competitive practices.
Google had settled with the French regulator two months earlier when it pledged to make its AdWords advertising policy in that country more clear and transparent following a complaint it had unfairly scrapped a company's contract.
A similar tactic could work with the European Commission, said Christopher Thomas, a partner at law firm Hogan Lovells.
"The issue is not the algorithms, the issue is whether they can be changed in a way to sufficiently reassure the Commission without undermining what Google feels is the core of its business. If easy changes can be made, Google may be inclined to do that," he said.
One thing's for sure: The pressure on Google can only grow, said Thomas Vinje, a partner at Clifford Chance, who had led a coalition that took on Microsoft. That then led to the European Commission imposing a total fine of 1.68 billion euros for antitrust infringements.
"The launch of formal probes tends to generate more voices, to cause more people to jump into the fray, and make it more likely that other complainants will come forward with other allegations of abusive conduct," he said.

event_or_fact.property: Internet consultant and a contributing editor
The complaint is often that there's too much at stake.; The claim is Google is now too powerful and it's really tantamount to a utility that everybody uses

We provide more guidance for websites than any other search engine, and we're constantly exploring new ways to be even more transparent with webmasters about our ranking principles; But disclosing the exact details would only help spammers, make search en

description.hltext_display: 冬日里的白色精灵 金星A16点燃圣诞激情
description.content:
“夜深知雪重，时闻折竹声”，唐朝大诗人白居易只用区区十字就为我们描绘出了冬日之静谧和声音之灵动。浓浓的圣诞、元旦的节日气息已经弥漫在你我身边，年轻时尚一族是不是已经“密谋”准备了神秘礼物送给心爱的她/他呢？比鲜花、巧克力等更实在，更浪漫的游戏MP4，相信会是其中一种不错的选择。白版不仅精致小巧，设计美观，而且丰富的功能足以满足他/她的需要，白版性地将“感应游戏+触摸游戏+按键游戏”融合于一身，另外还额外增加了英汉、汉英电子词典，《植物大战僵尸》等七款新游戏。在心间……白色圣诞，就让我们一起来看看属于我们自己的白色吧! 白版本的外观绝对属于让人眼前一亮的款式，机身处理成镜面效果，手感温润更具时尚感，富有高贵华丽的气息，宛如一个的白色。另外为方便游戏操作而设计的双十字键完美继承下来，畅玩模拟器游戏或是通过玩游戏随心自如。 除了将全部的改为白色以外，包括水晶按键也调整为统一的样式，看上去十分的协调。白色版配备的依然是一块4.3英寸屏幕，机身厚度只有9.8mm，轻薄方便携带，由于比一般的MP4产品多了按键区域，所以看起来机身颇为纤细，线条更具美感。 白版除继承了酷黑版的所有功能以外，全新的白版增加了英汉、汉英电子词典，在运用上，支持关联搜索，只要输入前几个字母，即可自动启动搜索功能，还支持英汉互译，英语翻译成中文，中文翻译成英语，对于或者需要英汉翻译工具查找的消费者是非常实用的。
另外，还特别添加了七款全新游戏，最新固化在产品界面中的这几个游戏绝对会让你喜出望外，其中多款均由自主设计，在兼容性方面可谓十分完美。 风靡PC平台、iOS设备和产品的《植物大战僵尸》绝对是目前全世界最流行的游戏之一。它是一款极富策略性的小游戏，能够让你学会如何排兵布阵。可怕的僵尸即将入侵，唯一的防御方式就是栽种植物。此游戏集成了即时战略、炮塔防御战和卡片收集等要素、游戏的内容就是：玩家控制植物，抵御僵尸的进攻，保护这片花园，可玩性不容置疑!
《生化危机》是非常经典一款冒险游戏，目前已有数十个版本。这是一款射击冒险恐怖类游戏，内容是有一家公司研究病毒，最后病毒扩散到整个城市，人都变成了僵尸。玩家需操作一个主人公去解开很多迷团，中间会受到许多僵尸的攻击。绝对够刺激，如果胆子小不要晚上玩哦!
《宠物狗》是一款自主设计的触摸游戏，男女皆宜，耐玩性高。作为一款休闲养成类游戏，游戏的主题是喂养一只可爱的宠物狗，让在现实世界中无法喂养宠物的玩家在虚拟世界体验一下养狗狗的乐趣，你需要陪狗玩，带它去跑步、玩球，饿了喂它食物，生病了需要带它去看病，累了让它休息。
《高尔夫》是一款自主设计的按键游戏，人物、场景和物品的精巧设计逼真呈现出真实的高尔夫运动，选手的动作及表情更是增添了游戏的多姿。界面直观，操作简便，轻松读取游戏各项信息。系统共为您设计了6个球道及14种杆，每种球杆均可打出不同弧度、不同距离的球路。更值得一提的是，它按照真实球场数据即时演算出的模拟场景，能使每个场景显得更加真实生动。 《交通警察》是模仿平台上的一款触摸游戏，玩家需要扮演交通警察的角色，用手指触摸拖动处于十字路口的各种车辆，如果处理不当，车子会越来越多，就会酿成车祸。
《动物连连看》是一款触摸休闲游戏。玩家在游戏中的任务是在各种可爱的动物图案中找出相同的一对，并遵循一定的规则将它们连接之后消除。有时间限制的哦，多玩这款游戏，可以提高您的敏捷力。
《接鸡蛋》是一款重力感应游戏，游戏以简单操作为出发点，在游戏中，站在木棍上的母鸡会连续下蛋，而玩家作为鸡舍的主人，得不停的左右移动去接鸡蛋。在这个过程中，会掉下钻石，金鸡蛋，普能鸡蛋，臭鸡蛋，总共有6次接不着鸡蛋的机会，接到金鸡蛋奖命一条，快来体验下吧。
这款产品将于近期上市，喜欢玩游戏、看高清的你，不妨关注一下!

description.hltext_display: Eredivisie-elftal: centrale verdediger(s)
description.content:
De eerste seizoenshelft zit erop. PSV staat bovenaan, Ajax kijkt net als de afgelopen negen jaar tegen een achterstand aan en Feyenoord probeert z'n vege lijf in het rechterrijtje te redden. Los van de teamprestaties vielen er een aantal spelers op. Goal.com is met behulp van jouw stem op zoek naar de beste elf spelers tot nu toe!
Share Share
Gerelateerde links
Wed kansen Match Title
Selecteer competitie
Selecteer wedstrijd
home
-
Gelijk
-
away
-
Meer wed kansen! »
Vandaag zijn we toe aan het centrum van de verdediging. Omdat het elftal in een 4-3-3 systeem zal spelen zijn we op zoek naar twee verdedigers. We zullen daarbij de nummers één en twee uit de lijst doorschuiven naar het elftal. De redactie van Goal.com heeft acht kandidaten genomineerd.
Op willekeurige volgorde:
Marcelo (23 jaar) - PSV
Werd afgelopen zomer door PSV weggeplukt bij Wisla Krakau. Na een slow start maakte Marcelo indruk. Hij werd al snel vergeleken met zijn Braziliaanse voorganger Alex. Net als Alex moet Marcelo het niet hebben van opbouwen, maar vooral van zijn kracht. PSV heeft goed ingekocht met deze beresterke kerel.
Pa-Modou Kah (30 jaar) - Roda JC
Een symbool van onverzettelijkheid. Aan strijd zal het nooit liggen bij Pa-Modou, die door veel van zijn collega's gerespecteerd wordt. Dit seizoen vormt hij een sterk duo met de verbannen Rob Wielaert. Kah kan ineens veel meer dan foeteren, glimlachen en voorop gaan in de strijd.
Gabor Horváth (25 jaar) - NAC Breda
Toen Kees Kwakman en Patrick Zwaanswijk afgelopen zomer afscheid namen van NAC, leek er een probleem gevormd te worden in de achterhoede. Maar deze huurling bleek een gouden greep. De Nederlandse taal spreekt hij niet, maar hij heeft zich op het veld al wel geweldig aangepast.
Andreas Granqvist (25 jaar) - FC Groningen
Sinds 2008 dé steunpilaar van Groningen. Bekend om zijn rushes naar voren waaruit hij prachtige goals maakte. Als centrale verdediger is hij onmisbaar voor de verrassende nummer drie van de Eredivisie. Zowel verdedigend als aanvallend staat hij zijn mannetje. Vorig seizoen werd hij niet voor niets uitgeroepen tot Speler van het Jaar van Groningen.
Héctor Moreno (22 jaar) - AZ
Na twee sterke seizoenen bij AZ mocht hij afgelopen zomer mee met Mexcio naar het WK in Zuid-Afrika. Van vakantie heeft hij dus niet al te lang kunnen genieten. Maar bij terugkomst heeft hij zich onder Gertjan Verbeek gewoon weer in de basis geknokt. Ondanks zijn lengte is Moreno een sterke kopper en een betrouwbare verdediger.
Peter Wisgerhof (31 jaar) - FC Twente
Een typische laatbloeier. Zijn overstap van NEC naar FC Twente is het beste wat hem kon overkomen. Hij werd kampioen met zijn nieuwe club en speelde dit seizoen in de Champions League. Dit deed hij verdienstelijk en werd dan ook uitgenodigd voor Oranje. Tegen Turkije maakte hij waarschijnlijk de mooiste 45 minuten uit zijn loopbaan mee.
Jan Vertonghen (23 jaar) - Ajax
Ondanks zijn jonge leeftijd nu al een van de meest ervaren verdedigers van Ajax. De Belg straalt pure kracht uit en heeft een geweldige trap in zijn benen. Door zijn imposante spel heeft hij dit seizoen al de interesse gewekt van Arsenal en AC Milan. Vooralsnog speelt hij gewoon bij Ajax, en daar mag Ajax erg blij mee zijn.
Douglas (22 jaar) - FC Twente
Hij sprak al met bondscoach Bert van Marwijk. Dat was niet zonder reden want de Nederlandse keuzeheer wil graag dat deze Braziliaanse parel een Nederlands paspoort krijgt zodat hij er een optie bij heeft. Kopsterk, razendsnel en voetballend sterk, heeft Twente een prima centraal duo waarmee voor het kampioenschap gestreden kan worden.
Stem hieronder op het beste centrale duo!

description.hltext_display: Julskrivbordet | Malin Ericsson
description.content: JulskrivbordetDet är snart dags för julhelg och man märker att folk har börjat ta ledigt. Dels är vi halverad styrka på redaktionen och i tunnelbanan på väg hit märktes det verkligen att helgdagarna närmar sig. Inte en kotte, man fick sitta själv i en ruta för fyra och ingen trängsel alls. Skönt. Jag har påbörjat lite städning av mitt skrivbord, det börjar se fint ut! När jag går på ledighet i morgon så kommer det vara kliniskt på skrivbordet, det är ju så sjukt härligt att komma tillbaka till något som är rent oc

description.hltext_display: Australia indemniza a falso terrorista
description.author: EFE
description.content:
El gobierno australiano ha indemnizado con una suma "substancial" al médico indio, Mohamed Haneef, por su detención errónea en 2007 a raíz de un atentado fallido en el Reino Unido, informó hoy la prensa local.
El abogado de Haneef, Rod Hodgson, evitó confirmar la cifra de un millón de dólares (761.040 euros) revelada por la prensa india sobre una compensación cuya cuantía es confidencial.
"El acuerdo incluye que las partes no hablarán de los detalles del convenio" , dijo Hodgson a la prensa.
La compensación también pretende reparar los daños en la reputación del médico y los perjuicios causados por la interrupción de su carrera como facultativo, indicó el letrado.
Por su parte, Haneef, acompañado de su esposa y de su hija de 3 años, declaró: "Estoy agradecido y feliz por la resolución del problema (...) Fue una experiencia traumática y el acuerdo es una oportunidad para cerrar el pasado y mirar hacia el futuro con mi familia" .
A cambio, el médico indio ha retirado los cargos de difamación que presentó contra Kevin Andrews, el entonces ministro de Inmigración del gobierno de John Howard, quien se ha negado a pedirle perdón.
Haneef es el primo segundo de dos de los responsables de estrellar un automóvil el 30 de junio de 2007 contra el aeropuerto escocés de Glasgow, atentado que no causó víctimas.
La policía australiana le detuvo dos días después cuando intentaba volver a la India por el nacimiento de su hija, le aplicó la ley antiterrorista y le mantuvo retenido durante doce días sin cargos esgrimiendo que su tarjeta de teléfono móvil había sido encontrada en el coche usado en el atentado.
La policía británica comprobó que esa información era falsa y la Fiscalía australiana retiró los cargos pero Andrews respondió de inmediato cancelando el visado de trabajo al médico.
El ex ministro australiano declaró hoy que no tiene intención alguna de pedirle perdón a Haneef, pero el gobierno de la laborista Julia Gillard ha indicado que ofrecerá disculpas públicas al médico y reiterará su inocencia, según dijo su abogado.
Haneef, que regresó a Australia la semana pasada para negociar el acuerdo, exculpó al actual gobierno de la injusticia que ha sufrido. ogsr

description.hltext_display: Reader has great sympathy for plight of Filipino workers
description.content:
To the Editor:
It was with great sympathy that I read the article about the three Filipino men who face deportation for working in Thompson. The foreign temporary worker program gives hope to many hard working individuals of less fortunate countries. Many come with the hope of gaining permanent residence and being able to provide a much better quality of life for their spouses and children, only to be sent back to their home countries despite the need for these hard working individuals here in Canada.
Small business in Thompson is a great example of why these people are desperately needed. Anyone who has ever tried to run a business in Thompson will tell you that the biggest challenge most business owners here face is worker apathy. Finding motivated, dedicated and loyal employees to provide quality customer service in entry level positions is so difficult here that businesses have had to shut their doors or alter their schedules to compensate. From my experience as an employer of a live-in caregiver from the Philippines, Filipinos are, in general, hard working, good natured and loyal. Language is not a barrier as English is taught to most Filipinos in school. From my perspective what we really need in this city are more people like the three amigos.
Jeff Fountain
Thompson

description.hltext_display: 팬택 “내년 스마트폰 내수 300만대 달성”
description.content:
국내 스마트폰시장에서 선전하고 있는 팬택 스카이가 내년에도 ‘국내 넘버2 스마트폰’ 제조사의 명성을 이어가겠다고 선언했다.
▲ 첫 선 보인 ‘베가 엑스’
21일 서울 상암동 팬택 본사에서 모델들이 새로 출시하는 스마트폰 ‘베가 엑스’를 선보이고 있다.팬택 제공 팬택은 20일 서울 상암동 팬택 본사에서 열린 스마트폰 신제품 ‘베가 엑스’ 발표회에서 “2011년 우리의 경쟁상대는 다른 스마트폰이 아니라 PC”라고 선언했다.
팬택은 올해 베가 엑스를 포함해 시리우스, 이자르, 베가, 미라크까지 5종의 스마트폰을 연이어 출시하며 스마트폰 열풍에 발 빠르게 대응했다. 그 결과 올해 국내에서 자사의 스마트폰 공급량이 100만대에 이를 것으로 팬택은 기대하고 있다.
팬택 관계자는 “최고 사양의 고급형 스마트폰인 베가 시리즈부터 보급형 제품 미라크, 디자인을 강조해 여성층을 공략한 이자르까지 다양한 제품을 선보여 선택 폭을 넓힌 것이 선전의 이유”라고 설명했다.
해외시장에서도 북미, 일본을 중심으로 보폭을 넓혀가고 있다. 팬택은 미국 최대 이동통신사 버라이즌을 통해 스마트폰 ‘팬택 크럭스’를 내놓고 연말까지 22만대를 공급한다. 일본에서는 KDDI를 통해 ‘시리우스 알파’를 출시한다.
내년에도 팬택은 국내에서 10종 이상의 스마트폰을 선보일 계획이다. 내년 1200만대 판매가 예상되는 국내 스마트폰 시장에서 팬택은 300만대 이상을 판매해 25% 이상의 점유율로 국내 스마트폰 ‘빅2’ 지위를 확고히 한다는 목표를 세웠다. 스마트폰과 태블릿PC의 중간 단계인 일명 ‘태블릿폰’ 등 다양한 모바일 기기도 내년 상반기쯤 공개할 예정이다. 해외시장에서도 스마트폰 10종을 포함해 25종 안팎의 휴대전화 신제품을 출시해 1500만대 이상의 판매고를 올릴 계획이다. 이날 팬택은 베가의 후속 제품인 베가 엑스를 선보였다. 베가 엑스는 퀄컴 기반 스마트폰 중 최초로 DDR2 램 메모리를 탑재했다. DDR2 램 메모리는 주로 PC에 탑재돼 데이터를 빨리 처리하는 역할을 한다. 이를 통해 애플리케이션(응용 프로그램) 구동 및 인터넷 검색 속도가 기존 스마트폰보다 1.5배 빨라져 PC 수준에 필적한다고 팬택 측은 설명했다.
휴대성도 강화됐다. 4인치 크기의 대화면 액정표시장치(LCD)를 탑재하고도 무게는 119.9g에 불과해 갤럭시S(121g)나 아이폰4(137g)보다 가볍다. 연락처의 친구 사진 클릭만으로 트위터까지 확인할 수 있는 등 소셜네트워크서비스 기능도 한층 강화됐다. 베가 엑스는 KT와 LG유플러스를 통해 이달 안에 출시될 예정이다.
신진호기자 sayho@seoul.co.kr

description.hltext_display: Жесткое порно Интернета
description.content:
� еклама :
Черт с ними, с дипломатами. Все они ученики Талейрана и знают, что язык им дан, чтобы скрывать свои мысли. И черт с ними, с гостайнами. Видали мы их в гробу, особенно у нас, в ССС� - или в путинской � оссии. Узнаю гостайну - тут же ее в лукошко и в Интернет. У нас такие тайны, что обхохочешься. Это еще Евгений Шварц сказал. Но тот вопрос, который поставил перед миром Джулиан Ассанж, - это моральная метафизика, и Интернет здесь ни при чем.
Смогут ли люди жить в беспощадном свете Истины, без утешительных и смягчающих действительность иллюзий? Может, правы древние индусы, считавшие реальность майей, лучистым обманом, цветным ковром, наброшенным Богами на скудную, темную и ужасную основу Бытия? Что-то вроде изнанки "Матрицы" после ядерного Армагеддона, с грязными подвалами, где сердобольные компы создают красивый Нью-Йорк для лежащих в ваннах тел с кабелями на затылке... Как мы будем чувствовать себя без кабеля?
Был такой фильм у Георгия Данелии - "А слезы капали". Там главный герой, которого играл Евгений Леонов, очень опрометчиво решил говорить правду всем, в том числе и собственной семье (осколочек очередной, вроде того, андерсеновского, из "Снежной королевы", ему в глаз попал). Дело кончилось тем, что он со всеми рассорился, остался один, без жены, детей и внуков, без работы и друзей, а в финале после попытки повеситься побежал топиться.
Нужно ли детям знать, как они появились на свет, или аист и капуста как-то эстетичнее? Я, если честно, предпочитаю версию с аистом. Леденящее дыхание правды может оборвать жизнь, даже много жизней. Недаром же говорят: fiat justitia, pereat mundus (да свершится правосудие, даже если погибнет мир). Нам решать, от чего погибать миру, от правды или от лжи. Пусть уж погибает от правды! Так мы решили в августе 1991 года, когда требовали, чтобы все документы КГБ, включая протоколы допросов сталинских времен и расписки стукачей (или даже просто обещавших стучать) эпохи "оттепели" и "застоя". Нет, нам, конечно, было жалко несчастных кроликов, которых сталинские палачи заставляли под пытками оговаривать друзей и признаваться черт знает в чем. Но все равно: пусть будет стыдно и больно, пусть узнают друзья, пусть рухнут репутации. Да будет свет! Любой ценой.
У диссидента Юлия Даниэля есть гениальная повесть "Искупление". Там ни в чем не повинный интеллигент Виктор обвинен в том, что донес на одного парня в сталинские времена. Он не доносил, но этого нельзя доказать. И вот остракизм, его бросают друзья, коллеги, любимая женщина. Он сходит с ума. Это несправедливо, но если бы он был виновен, то его страшная участь воспринималась бы как норма. Общество должно ненавидеть и изгонять подлецов, без жалости, без колебаний, доводя их до самоубийства. Эту непримиримость надо культивировать. "И в любые века, и во все времена трус-предатель всегда презираем, враг есть враг, и война все равно есть война, и темница тесна, и свобода одна, и всегда на нее уповаем" (Высоцкий). Я знаю, что я говорю. У диссидентов было правило: если ты раскаялся на суде или в Лефортове (но никого не заложил, за это прощения уже не будет), то этот проступок можно смыть кровью. Пойди и сядь еще раз - и держись стойко. И тебе простят. Жанна д'Арк, поставив крест под отречением, на следующий день взяла себя в руки и пошла на костер. И кто бросит в нее камень? Марк Морозов, с которым мы вместе трудились на антисоветской ниве, в Лефортове покаялся и получил ссылку. Но ему стало стыдно, в ссылке он заработал еще один арест, вел себя достойно, получил большой срок. А когда не стало сил страдать, он повесился в тюрьме - это достойная смерть. Звиад Гамсахурдиа искупил свое отречение, пав на поле боя за Грузию с оружием в руках.
Остракизму подлежат за коллаборационизм и сотрудничество с чекистской хунтой и Владимир Соловьев, и Никита Михалков, и Михаил Боярский, бывший д’Артаньян, а ныне гвардеец кардинала. Партноменклатура КПСС и "Единой � оссии", ЛДП� , КП� Ф, сотрудники КГБ из "пятерки" и нынешние фээсбэшники, психиатры вроде Снежневского, Лунца и Морозова, "лечившие" здоровых диссидентов, преступники из Института Сербского, ставившие лжедиагнозы инакомыслящим, Путин, Медведев, Сурков, генералы типа Шаманова, палачи Ходорковского и Алексаняна, пособники режима типа тех, кто сдал СПС Кремлю и ушел в "Правое дело" под зубчатые стены, - несть им числа, и никому нельзя прощать, сотрудничать, подавать руку, сидеть рядом. Как собирается искупать свое преступление Никита Белых? У Анатолия Чубайса и Андрея Нечаева есть индульгенция за прошлые заслуги, но над будущим мы не властны, и они оба сильно рискуют: потомки могут отнестись сурово к их недостойному поведению на тризне СПС.
Мы говорили в 1991-м: вывесить, напечатать, объявить по радио все списки стукачей, даже если они просто дали подписку по слабости и не стучали вовсе, и пусть назавтра в стране никто друг с другом не здоровается.
Будем употреблять WikiLeaks вместо Скотланд-Ярда. Если у него нет на тебя материала, то ты праведник. Обязательно надо попросить у Ассанжа дать справку по мнимым миллиардам наших кадетов из ПНС: Немцова, Милова и � ыжкова. И пусть со справкой от WikiLeaks наши праведники смело идут в суд и требуют с премьера, президента, диктатора, тирана, как уж там называется его должность, эти самые миллиарды в качестве компенсации за клевету. На выборах деньги пригодятся.
А вдруг Ассанж обнаружит путинские счета? Если обнаружит, в Интернете места хватит на все. "Береги честь смолоду, - будут говорить дедушки внукам, - а то попадешь к Ассанжу на Wikileaks".
Но фильтровать базар надо, даже и такому "прожектору перестройки", как наш австралийский герой. Обнародовать списки стратегических объектов США - это значит работать на бен Ладена, на исламских фанатиков типа тех, что таранили башни-близнецы, и на погибель свободного мира. Сдавать западную агентуру в Афганистане, Ираке или Иране - это значит убивать защитников демократии. Сотрудничать с "Аль-Джазирой" неприлично. Не стоит также и посещать коммунистические форумы, тем паче что там бродят коммунистки-нимфоманки, которые сначала лезут к тебе за утешением, потом в полицию бегут, а назавтра в ресторан приглашают - чтобы им добавили. Нет, что ли, других "интердевочек" кроме коммунисток?
Не стоит заодно печатать мнение явно некомпетентного американского дипломата, который обязан был все знать, сидя в Грузии, а он даже не знал, если верить "� усскому репортеру", что Грузия не нападала на Самачабло, то есть Южную Осетию. Такие сомнительные данные могут только повредить маленькой героической Грузии. Надо выплескивать из ванны грязную воду, но не вместе с младенцем. Если кто увидит Ассанжа, пусть с ним на эту тему по-хорошему поговорит.
А что до дипломатов, то это ремесло не для порядочных людей. Пошлют тебя в Китай, на Кубу, в Иран, в Северную Корею, к Уго Чавесу - и будешь этим уродам, ископаемым, палачам и идиотам улыбаться и комплименты говорить? Посредники, парламентеры - это куда ни шло. Какие послы могут быть в стане врага? Как у лукьяненковского Ночного дозора, что ли: лицензии вампирам выписывать?
А вообще-то Ассанж помогает нам подготовиться к Страшному суду. Давайте потренируемся. Там то ли еще будет.

description.hltext_display: GamePro: Real Racing 2 Review
description.content: Its a racer in a league of its own, despite the fact that Firemint is competing with big-name developers like EA and their iOS ports of the Need for Speed franchise. If youre after a realistic racing simulation for when youre on the go, this is without a doubt your best option.

description.hltext_display: DM IDM podpisał umowę z Supernova Fund
description.content:
Przedmiotem umowy jest wspólne zaangażowanie w podmiocie, który będzie prowadził działalność w zakresie inwestycji o charakterze private-equity, pre-IPO oraz M&A - poinformował DM IDM SA w komunikacie.
Strony zmienią spółkę SNF na Supernova IDM Fund (SNIF) i podwyższą jej kapitał o 25,2 mln zł. DM IDM SA obejmie akcje dające 49,97 proc. kapitału SNIF za 57,96 mln zł, dokona sprzedaży aktywów na rzecz Supernova IDM Fund o wartości nie niższej niż 125,53 mln zł i zorganizuje emisję obligacji przez SNIF o wartości nie mniejszej niż 92,02 mln zł. Następnie strony chcą wprowadzić akcje SNIF do obrotu giełdowego.
var _r = document.referrer ? encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) : ''; var _w = encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); var _e = document.inputEncoding ? document.inputEncoding : document.charset; document.write('\/script'); Strony zobowiązują się także objąć i nabyć akcje spółki zarządzającej, która będzie zarządzać aktywami SNIF. W dalszym etapie Strony podejmą działania w celu doprowadzenia do publicznej subskrypcji akcji SNIF oraz wprowadzeniu wszystkich akcji SNIF do obrotu zorganizowanego na rynku giełdowym prowadzonym przez Giełdę - podała spółka.
DM IDM SA podał też, że w okresie ostatnich dwunastu miesięcy łączna wartość umów zawartych pomiędzy DM IDMSA a Supernova Fund wynosi 212.598.567,95 zł. Wartość największej umowy to 149.982.782,23 zł.
DM IDM SA podał, że porozumienie zostaje zawarte na 12 miesięcy, a po upływie okresu obowiązywania porozumienia, strony będą mogły renegocjować jego warunki i przedłużyć na ustalony okres - nie dłużej jednak niż do momentu IPO - lub podjąć decyzję o nieprzedłużaniu obowiązywania porozumienia.

description.hltext_display: Jourdain, «simplement » coupable
description.content: NAMUR - Simple dÃ©claration de culpabilitÃ© : voilÃ ce qui sanctionne StÃ©phan Jourdain et quatre autres coaccusÃ©s, aprÃ¨s dix ans de procÃ©dure. Dix ans! Dix ans de procédure pour rien ou pas grand chose. Stéphan Jourdain et ses trois co-prévenus peuvent souffler; le premier qui a pourtant supporté 20 jours de détention préventive décidée par le juge d'instruction. Hier, le tribunal correctionnel de Namur, présidé par Christian Panier, a prononcé la condamnation de l'homme d'affaires bruxellois Stephan Jourdain, et de quatre autres prévenus par simples déclarations de culpabilité. Les prévenus sont reconnus coupables, mais aucune peine n'est donc prononcée. Le tribunal a en effet estimé que les poursuites pénales ont excédé le délai raisonnable, ainsi que l'a relevé le juge Christian Panier dans un jugement stigmatisant la lenteur de l'appareil judiciaire. L'affaire remonte à dix ans. Stephan Jourdain était poursuivi, pour faux, usage de faux, fraude à la TVA et à l'ONSS, en compagnie de quatre autres prévenus : un collaborateur direct, son bras droit, et des travailleurs du bâtiment directement impliqués dans le système des fausses factures. Le principe était simple comme bonjour : le Cercle de Lorraine, grand temple bruxellois des hommes d'affaire et de la bonne société, devait être inauguré le 23 avril 1998. Le bâtiment qui devait accueillir cette agora select a brûlé le 1er avril. Stéphane Jourdain avait indiqué au tribunal, et non sans fierté, que le couper de ruban, a eu lieu à la date dite. Mais que, pour se faire il a fallu faire beaucoup travailler les artisans. Et que pour les rémunérer, on a eu recours à un système de surfacturation. Pourquoi, alors que les faits reprochés au sieur Jourdain et consorts remontent à l'année 1998, faudra-t-il attendre 2006 pour que toutes les parties puissent jouer le jeu du débat contradictoire devant la chambre du conseil de Namur? Et comment comprendre, s'interrogeait Me Franchimont lors de la dernière audience, que des pièces versées au dossier, telle cet interrogatoire d'un prévenu par le juge d'instruction me Dubé, ne soit pas daté? On est clairement hors délai, dira le président Panier, stigmatisant la lenteur de la justice. Le ministère public, par la voix de Ludivine Kerzmann, avait requis 18 mois d'emprisonnement, sans s'opposer toutefois à la simple déclaration de culpabilité. Le tribunal a finalement retenu le dépassement du délai raisonnable et condamne Stephan Jourdain par simple déclaration de culpabilité pour les préventions de surfacturations, de faux, de fraude fiscale et à la TVA. Le tribunal a aussi pris en compte les trois semaines de détention préventive purgées par Stephan Jourdain en 2001. «Pour les prétendus détournements au préjudice de l'ONSS, mon client est acquitté», s'est en outre réjoui son avocat.

description.hltext_display: Teinin julma kidutus: Päätekijän tuomio koveni
description.content:
Hovioikeus on antanut tuomionsa tapauksessa, jossa 14-vuotiasta helsinkiläispoika siepattiin ja häntä pahoinpideltiin julmasti.
Helsingin hovioikeus kovensi päätekijän, 27-vuotiaan Jukka Petteri Tiilikaisen vankeustuomiota neljään vuoteen ja viiteen kuukauteen. Käräjäoikeudessa Tiilikaisen tuomio oli ollut kolme kuukautta lyhyempi. Tuomio tuli muun muassa törkeästä vapaudenriistosta ja törkeästä pahoinpitelystä.
24-vuotiaan Tanja Susanne Heikkisen tuomiota puolestaan lyhennettiin kahteen vuoteen ja kahdeksaan kuukauteen. Käräjäoikeus oli langettanut hänelle kolmen vuoden tuomion.
Hovioikeus korotti myös muiden tapauksesta tuomittujen rangaistuksia.
Tekijät sieppasivat 14-vuotiaan helsinkiläispojan autoon kauppakeskus Sellon parkkipaikalta Espoon Leppävaarassa lokakuussa 2009. Poikaa kyydittiin ympäriinsä ja pahoinpideltiin muun muassa pesäpallomailalla eri osoitteissa yön yli.
Hovioikeuden tuomion mukaan poikaan kohdistettu väkivalta oli etenkin tämän ikään nähden poikkeuksellisen raakaa ja julmaa.
STEFAN LEPPÄNEN stefan.leppanen@iltalehti.fi

description.hltext_display: Weihnachtliche Chorsätze aus Europa

description.hltext_display: H.Clinton labiausiai nusipelniusios įmonės apdovanojimą įteikė bendrovei „Mars, Incorporated“
description.content:
JAV valstybės departamento organizuotuose labiausiai nusipelniusios 2010 metų įmonės rinkimuose apdovanojimas atiteko „Mars, Incorporated“, aplenkusiai 78 kandidatus iš viso pasaulio. Jis bendrovei atiteko už darbą kakavos srityje, išlaikant ekologinę pusiausvyrą, ir pastangas gerinant ekonominį vystimąsi Afrikos kakavos augintojų rajonuose, Ganoje.
H.Clinton gyrė bendrovę „Mars, Incorporated“. "Reuters"
REKLAMA
Labiausiai nusipelniusios įmonės rinkimai JAV pradėti rengti nuo 1999 metų. Šie apdovanojimai skirti pagerbti šalies verslo įmones už rodomą pilietiškumą užsienio šalyse ir teigiamą įtaką Amerikos santykiams su užsienio valstybėmis. Tai pirmas kartas, kai Ganos nominuota įmonė gauna šį apdovanojimą.
Pagal iMPACT partnerystės programą, skirtą Afrikos kakavmedžius auginančios bendruomenės aplinkosauginėms, ekonominėms ir socialinėms problemoms spręsti, Ganoje „Mars, Incorporated“ padėjo įkurti daugiau kaip 800 tūkst. darbo vietų.
Bendrovė nuosekliai vykdo įsipareigojimus dėl sertifikuotos ir tvariame ūkyje išaugintos kakavos įsigijimo. „Mars, Incorporated“ glaudžiai bendradarbiauja su vietos bendruomenėmis Ganoje ir Dramblio Kaulo respublikoje, kur užauginama 60% visų pasaulio kakavos pupelių.
Šiais metais „Mars“, IBM ir JAV žemės ūkio departamentas atskleidė viešam naudojimui kakavos pupelių genomo seką, kuri pagelbės veisiant ir auginant atsparesnius išoriniam poveikiui kakavmedžius. Kakava patenka tarp dešimties svarbiausių pasaulio žemės ūkio produktų. Ji ypatingai svarbi daugelyje besivystančių šalių, kur kakavos pramonė sudaro didžiąją dalį šalies vidaus produkto. Pasauliniu mastu yra apie 6,5 mln. Kakavos augintojų, daugiausiai tai maži, šeimų valdomi ūkiai.

description.hltext_display: Balance del Legislativo
description.author: camilo.pg
description.content:
DEL PASADO PERÍODO LEGISLATI-vo el balance ha sido especialmente favorable para la administración Santos.
›Anuncie Aquí
De los 37 proyectos presentados por el Gobierno, sólo uno, el de la reelección de alcaldes y gobernadores, fue archivado —por fortuna— en primer debate. El resto están en curso o han llegado ya a sanción presidencial. El más importante de estos últimos es tal vez el proyecto que permite mantener los beneficios a los más de 30 mil desmovilizados del conflicto, los cuales peligraron después de un fallo de la Corte Constitucional. Por la importancia dentro de la coyuntura, la reforma a la salud fue igualmente significativa. En lista de espera, pero avanzados en trámites, terminaron proyectos de gran trascendencia como el nuevo estatuto anticorrupción, la reforma al sistema de regalías y tal vez los dos procesos más importantes para la reconciliación nacional: víctimas y tierras. De aquí que el presidente Santos no haya escatimado elogios y haya juzgado el período como “una legislatura sin precedentes en la historia”.
Aunque pueda sonar exagerada la afirmación, es cierto que la Unidad Nacional, con más de las dos terceras partes del Congreso, ha dado resultados a pesar de las divisiones internas, por lo demás naturales dado el tamaño de la coalición y, entre todo, deseables. No obstante, más significativa que la producción del período legislativo es la recuperación que ha venido manifestando la dinámica del Congreso. La renovada discusión en términos de ideas, que ha puesto a la cabeza al Partido Liberal y a Cambio Radical, y que ha obligado a partidos como el Conservador y el de la U a replantearse, además de haber presionado cambios en la estructura política del país, ha hecho fructíferos los debates. La presidencia del Senado, por su parte, ha trabajado para poner la corporación en orden y las cabezas de varios partidos han sabido dar línea y avanzar agendas colectivas. Además, el nuevo tono entre el Ejecutivo y el Legislativo ha restituido el respeto entre las dos ramas de poder y le ha devuelto a este último su papel protagónico, hecho que ha favorecido los acuerdos.
En este contexto surge un reto importante para la siguiente legislatura: es necesario reglamentar las comisiones de conciliación. En el pasado período, 11 de los 14 proyectos que llegaron a cuarto debate terminaron en esta instancia, pero lo que sucedió allí no se conoce. Las comisiones no tienen actas y esto hace que, si bien son públicas las modificaciones, no lo son los acuerdos ni las discusiones que llevaron a ellas. Además, tampoco son claros los criterios por los cuales son elegidos los miembros de las comisiones de conciliación. Sin reglamentación es sólo cuestión de tiempo para que se presenten abusos de poder dentro del Legislativo. Éste debería ser un propósito en aras de la transparencia.
De otra naturaleza es el problema de los altos niveles de abstención en las votaciones y el persistente ausentismo. Aunque muchos atribuyen el origen del problema a la pereza de los legisladores, quórums que apenas superan el nivel decisorio no pueden recibir una explicación tan simplista. Es necesario estudiar las razones de una votación tan baja y tomar los correctivos. Es preocupante que poco menos de la mitad de los congresistas no estén participando, en especial, cuando todo indica que la agenda legislativa seguirá activa. Mantener el buen desempeño de esta legislatura supone mantener lo alcanzado y avanzar en nuevos retos. El Ejecutivo ya ha solucionado lo que ha podido con el restablecimiento de las relaciones y con proyectos, como el estatuto anticorrupción, que de ser aprobados, mejorarían los controles de todo el Estado, pero qué tanto logre recuperar el Legislativo su protagonismo y prestigio es un reto propio.

description.hltext_display: Arms treaty with Russia nears Senate approval
description.content:
President Barack Obama one step closer to signing strategic nuclear arms pact with Russia later this week
REUTERS
President Barack Obama wrapped up enough support on Tuesday to win Senate approval for a strategic nuclear arms pact with Russia later this week, a key step in his drive to improve ties with Moscow and curb atomic weapons proliferation.
The new START treaty cleared a procedural hurdle in the Senate by a vote of 67-28 as 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a decision to limit further debate. The treaty will move to a final vote on Wednesday after lawmakers deal with a rash of last-minute amendments.
Obama's Democrats need a two-thirds majority in the 100-member Senate for final approval of the treaty. Senator John Kerry, who led floor debate as chairman of the Foreign Relations Committee, said he expected 70 senators to ultimately vote in favour of the accord.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Kerry said.
The treaty, which would cut strategic atomic weapons deployed by each country to no more than 1,550 within seven years, was signed by Obama and Russian President Dmitry Medvedev in April.
It is a centrepiece of Obama's bid to "re-set" relations with Russia, which has been increasingly cooperative on issues related to U.S. national security, from curbing Iran's nuclear program to the war in Afghanistan.
"This treaty will make America safer and restore our leadership in global efforts to stop nuclear proliferation," Senate Democratic Leader Harry Reid said.
Senators debated and defeated a series of amendments on Tuesday aimed at changing the treaty's handling of weapons inspections, data exchanges and other issues. Changes that would amend the treaty would effectively kill it by forcing a renegotiation with Russia.
At least 12 Republicans have said that they will vote with Democrats to approve the pact, which would give Obama his third major victory on Capitol Hill in less than a week.
He earlier won repeal of the U.S. ban on gays serving openly in the military and passage of an $858 billion deal with Republicans to extend expiring tax cuts and spur economic growth.
Republican opponents of the accord, angered by the their inability to stop the march toward passage, charged the Obama administration had negotiated a bad treaty that let Russia limit U.S. missile defense options when the real strategic threat was not Moscow but states like North Korea and Iran.
"Nothing that he has done has convinced me that he is committed to missile defense," Senator Lindsey Graham told a news conference, saying Obama was effectively "giving the Russians a veto" over U.S. missile defense plans.
The Senate's top two Republicans -- Minority Leader Mitch McConnell and Minority Whip Jon Kyl -- have announced they will vote against START, saying lawmakers haven't had enough time to fully consider the treaty.
But the chamber's third-ranking Republican, Lamar Alexander, joined Democrats on Tuesday in agreeing to end debate and move to approval of the pact.
