description.hltext_display: Bulls obliterate Sixers
description.content:
Derrick Rose scored 22 points to go with 12 assists as the Chicago Bulls manhandled the Philadelphia 76ers, 121-76, at United Arena.
Luol Deng also chipped in 22 points and Carlos Boozer contributed a double- double of 16 points and 11 rebounds for the Bulls, who have won eight of nine. Kurt Thomas finished with 12 points, eight rebounds and five blocks for the victors.
"It was an old fashioned butt kicking," said Sixers forward Elton Brand. "[Chicago] did what ever they wanted to do tonight."
Andre Iguodala led the Sixers with 17 points and Thaddeus Young added 12 points and seven rebounds off the bench for Philadelphia, which has lost two of three.
Rose and Deng scored 11 and 10 points, respectfully, for the Bulls in the first, as they took a 33-19 lead into the second. Chicago expanded its lead to 61-43 at the half behind a 61.1 percent shooting effort in the second quarter.
Chicago took over in the third, capitalizing on a 4-for-17 shooting effort and seven turnovers by the Sixers. The Bulls outscored Philadelphia 31-11 en route to a 92-54 lead entering the fourth.
Both teams removed a majority of their starters in the fourth quarter. The Bulls' lead eclipsed 50 with four minutes left when rarely used reserve man Brian Scalabrine converted a powering dunk to give Chicago a 118-67 lead.
"We played together as a group of guys," stated Boozer. "We came out very focused tonight and played a great game against [the Sixers]. It's a great thing for us to build on in the future."
Game Notes
This was game two of an eight-game road trip for the Sixers, who will also visit Boston, Denver, Golden State, Phoenix, the Los Angeles Lakers and New Orleans...Philadelphia shot 35 percent from the field and made only 2-of-15 from beyond the arc...Elton Brand led the Sixers with nine rebounds...The Bulls made 81 percent from the charity stripe and scored 31 points off 18 Philadelphia turnovers...Chicago won the rebounding margin 40-37, and held a 52-26 advantage on points in the paint.

description.hltext_display: Lenkijoje parduodama vis daugiau knygų
description.content:
“Gazeta Wyborcza” ir lrytas.lt
Lenkijoje auga knygų pardavimai. Šiais metais pasiektas visų laikų pardavimų rekordas. Lenkai pirko knygų už 2,94 mlrd. zlotų (2,52 mlrd. litų).
Kas antras apklaustas lenkas sakė, kad dovanų Kalėdoms pirks knygą. T.Bauras
REKLAMA
Tokiam rezultatui įtakos turėjo ir kai kurių mokyklinių vadovėlių keitimas. Tačiau lenkai aktyviai papildo savo išsilavinimą, perka visokius patarimų vadovus bei mokslinius leidinius. Jų pardavimai išaugo beveik 9 procentais.
Kas antras apklaustas lenkas sakė, kad dovanų Kalėdoms pirks knygą. Tačiau ekspertai pažymi, kad kiti metai nebus leidėjams lengvi nes įvedamas 5 proc. PVM mokestis knygoms.
Lietuvių leidėjams ši žinia sukels karčią šypseną – čia jau prieš dvejus konservatorių ir liberalų Vyriausybė yra įvedusi 9 proc. PVM knygoms ir 21 proc. spaudai.

description.hltext_display: Tiefe Kratzer im Lack
Opnieuw sneeuw op komst: witte kerst in zicht
description.content:
De volgende dagen gaat het weer sneeuwen in ons land. In het weekend wordt het droog met zowel opklaringen als wolkenvelden. Maar zeer waarschijnlijk zullen we dus een witte kerst krijgen.Vanaf woensdagavond kan er lichte sneeuw of aanvriezende regen vallen over de zuidoostelijke helft van het land. Woensdagnacht gaat het zelfs op vele plaatsen sneeuwen, behalve in een strook dicht bij de kust. In de zuidoostelijke landshelft valt de neerslag enige tijd onder de vorm van aanvriezende regen. Bij temperaturen van rond of net onder het vriespunt kan het dus glad worden op de weg. Donderdag is het zwaarbewolkt met af en toe sneeuw. Aan zee en in het westen valt weinig neerslag. Ten zuiden van de Ardennen valt eerst nog aanvriezende regen die nadien overgaat in sneeuw. Er waait een matige, aan de kust een krachtige noordoostenwind. De middagtemperatuur schommelt rond het vriespunt.
Vrijdag is het zwaarbewolkt met lichte sneeuwval. Er waait een gure noordoostenwind bij een middagtemperatuur rond het vriespunt. Op beide kerstdagen en ook begin volgende week is het droog met opklaringen en wolkenvelden. Overdag vriest het licht en 's nachts komt matige, plaatselijk strenge vorst voor. Het zal op kerstdag dus waarschijnlijk niet sneeuwen, maar de kans op een witte kerst wordt dus bijzonder groot.
We spreken van een witte kerst als er 's morgens in het weerstation in Ukkel een sneeuwdek van minstens 1 centimeter ligt.

description.hltext_display: Pasirašytas memorandumas dėl integracijos į Šiaurės Europos elektros rinką
description.content:
ELTA ir lrytas.lt inf.
Didžiausia pasaulyje elektros birža „Nord Pool Spot“, vienijanti Šiaurės Europos šalis, Lietuvos elektros energijos perdavimo sistemos operatorius „Litgrid“ ir Lietuvos elektros energijos birža „BaltPool“ pasirašė memorandumą, kad Lietuvos elektros birža taps Baltijos jūros regiono valstybių bendros elektros rinkos dalimi.
REKLAMA
Pasak „Baltpool“ generalinės direktorės Linos Skrabutėnaitės, memorandumas įtvirtina nuoseklias Lietuvos pastangas integruotis į Baltijos regiono elektros rinką, o tai suteikia kur kas didesnių galimybių pirkti ir parduoti elektros energiją geriausiomis tuo metu rinkoje esančiomis kainomis. „Tiek gamintojai, tiek prekiautojai veiks konkurencingesnėje aplinkoje, o konkurencija visuomet reiškia geresnes sąlygas vartotojui,“ - sakė L.Skrabutėnaitė.
Šiaurės regiono elektros biržoje „Nord Pool Spot“ elektra prekiauja 338 rinkos dalyviai, o per 2009 metus joje parduota 288 TWh elektros už daugiau kaip dešimt milijardų eurų.
Prieš nepilnus metus savo veiklą pradėjusioje Lietuvos elektros biržoje „BaltPool“ prekybos apimtys jau viršijo milijardą litų. Rinkos dalyvių skaičius padidėjo nuo 18 iki 26. Šiuo metu biržoje nuperkama maždaug 70 proc. Lietuvos poreikiams naudojamos elektros energijos.

description.hltext_display: Indian entrepreneurs'' stress levels up, less than global peers
description.content: Mumbai, Dec 22 (PTI) Stress levels of Indian entrepreneurs have risen markedly in the last two years, but are still less than their global peers, a recent survey has revealed.While 40 per cent of entrepreneurs in India have said their stress levels have risen in the last two years, the figure stands at 46 per cent globally, according to a survey by Regus.The rise in stress levels clearly indicate the difficult economic environment of the past two-years which have left a mark not only on business attitudes but also on the entrepreneurs'' personal lives, the survey said. ...

description.hltext_display: Mass. woman gets prison in glass-eating scheme
description.content:
A Massachusetts woman has been sentenced to more than four years in prison after admitting that she and her husband intentionally ate glass particles, then submitted false insurance claims.
Mary Evano was also ordered Tuesday to pay more than $340,000 in restitution. In September, she pleaded guilty to a 23-count federal indictment charging her with fraud, conspiracy and other offenses.
Federal prosecutors say that from 1997 to 2005, the couple collected more than $200,000 in compensation after filing insurance claims that they had been injured by restaurants, hotels and grocery stores that had served them food containing glass particles.
Evano's husband, Ronald Evano, pleaded guilty in 2007. He is serving five years in prison.
The couple incurred more than $100,000 in medical bills, which remain unpaid.

description.hltext_display: Mertens in beeld bij 'mooie club' Anderlecht
description.author: Stefan Vlieger
description.content: Wed kansen Match Title Selecteer competitie Selecteer wedstrijd home - Gelijk - away - var G_BettingWidgetResponse = },}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},}]}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]},},}]}]}],"bookies":[},},},},},},},},},}],"goalInfo":[},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},},}]}} "Ik zie me nog niet meteen naar een groot kampioenschap vertrekken", zegt Mertens in Het Nieuwsblad. "Een tussenstap zou ideaal zijn. Anderlecht? Dat is een mooie club, maar aangezien de interesse niet concreet is, kan ik er niets meer over zeggen." Mertens hoorde nog niets vanuit Brussel, maar kreeg al wel sms'jes van vrienden.De 23-jarige vleugelspeler verlengde onlangs zijn contract tot medio 2014, dus Anderlecht lijkt flink in de buidel te moeten tasten. Mertens kwam vorig jaar zomer van AGOVV naar Utrecht. Bij de Apeldoornse club maakte hij veel indruk en hij won er in zijn derde en laatste seizoen de Bronzen Stier voor beste talent.Anderlecht, dat Mertens zelf opleidde, ziet in de jonge Belg mogelijk de opvolger voor Mbark Boussoufa, die iedere transferperiode aan diverse clubs wordt gelinkt. Het elftal van coach Aril Jacobs is momenteel koploper in Belgi met n punt voorsprong op Racing Genk.

description.hltext_display: 霹代总警长：路面干燥没被洒黑油
description.content:
●南洋商报
（怡保21日讯）霹雳州代总警长拿督查卡利亚证实，在金马仑山路发生的巴士意外，并非有人在路上铺洒黑油。
查卡利亚今日在记者发布会上说，根据警方现场调查，发生意外的山路路面干燥，没有被人泼黑油的迹象。
“这起巴士翻覆意外后，警方在现场只是发现巴士的汽油痕迹。”

description.hltext_display: Dyrt affär med missad inbetalning
description.author: annons@skd.se
description.content: Kvinnan var 2008 medlem i Alfa-kassan, men uteslöts på grund av bristande betalning. Hon gick i stället med i Handelsanställdas arbetslöshetskassa och betalade sina avgifter.Men när arbetslösheten slog till påmindes hon om den missade inbetalningen och nekades ersättning.Kvinnan överklagade till länsrätten som gick på fackets linje och avslog överklagandet.Kvinnan vände sig då till kammarrätten som i en dom i oktober upphävde länsrättens dom och gav kvinnan rätt till ersättning från januari 2009.Nu vill Inspektionen för arbetslöshetsförsäkring, IAF, att regeringsrätten prövar ärendet på nytt.IAF ställer sig frågande till om det har varit lagstiftarens mening att en person ska kunna behålla ett försäkringsskydd utan att ha betalat samtliga medlemsavgifter och yrkar att Regeringsrätten upphäver kammarrättens dom och istället fastställer länsrättens dom.

description.hltext_display: GPW: Bykom na razie brakuje siły
description.content:
Łukasz Pałka, godz. 9.50 var _r = document.referrer ? encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) : ''; var _w = encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); var _e = document.inputEncoding ? document.inputEncoding : document.charset; document.write('\/script'); Wzrosty wśród największych spółek warszawskiej giełdy na razie nie są imponujące. Najwyższy wzrost notuje GTC, którego akcje rosną o 1,3 procent. Inne spółki nie przekraczają 1 procenta. Inwestorzy wyprzedają akcje Cyfrowego Polsatu, który spada o 1,2 procent.
Podobnie zachowują się również główne indeksy w Europie Zachodniej. We Frankfurcie i w Londynie spadły do poziomu z wczorajszego zamknięcia.
GPW: Kupujący zawalczą o nowe szczyty?
Paweł Zawadzki, godz. 6.06
Wczoraj mimo braku wiadomości z gospodarki, inwestorzy . Dziś danych makro nie zabraknie. Jeśli okażą się one lepsze od oczekiwań, WIG20 może zmierzyć się z tegorocznym maksimum. A jest na to szansa, bowiem nowe szczyty ponownie zobaczyliśmy na Wall Street.
Wczorajszy brak informacji z gospodarki nie zniechęcił do podejmowania decyzji. Choć pierwsza połowa notowań na GPW upłynęła pod znakiem braku zmienności i niewielkich obrotów, to kiedy do gry włączyli się kupujący, dominowali już do zakończenia sesji. Dzięki temu WIG20 znalazł się tylko kilkanaście punktów poniżej ponad 2-letniego maksimum. Dobre humory powinna podtrzymywać wtorkowa sesja na Wall Street, gdzie od początku do zakończenia notowań dominowały byki, a wszystkie główne indeksy zgodnie wyznaczyły nowe szczyty.
Na plus działa także fakt, że wczoraj inwestorzy nie zareagowali wyprzedażą na umieszczenie Portugalii przez agencję Moody's na liście obserwacyjnej z perspektywą obniżenia ratingu.
Oznacza to, że rynki częściowo uodporniły się na negatywne informacje dotyczące problemów z zadłużeniem w peryferyjnych krajach strefy euro i obecnie z nieco większym dystansem obserwują wszelkie informacje serwowane przez agencje ratingowe. Dziś szalę na korzyść kupujących będą mogły przeważyć dane z gospodarki. Dwa kluczowe wskaźniki napłyną ze Stanów Zjednoczonych i będą to finalny odczyt PKB za trzeci kwartał (14:30, prognoza 2,8 proc.) oraz liczba sprzedanych domów na rynku wtórnym (16:00, prognoza 4,71 mln).
Będzie także polski akcent. Decyzję w sprawie stóp procentowych podejmie bowiem Rada Polityki Pieniężnej. I choć szanse na ich zmianę są niemal zerowe, to warto przyjrzeć się komunikatowi i wypowiedziom po posiedzeniu. Spora rzesza ekonomistów i analityków podwyżki oczekuje bowiem już w pierwszym kwartale przyszłego roku.
Notowania spółek na GPW Indeksy GPW w Money.pl Indeksy giełd na świecie

description.hltext_display: Alkoholverbot in Nürnberger Bussen und Bahnen
Konstabel bebas tuduhan cabul Inspektor wanita
description.content:
PETALING JAYA: Seorang konstabel polis dilepaskan dan dibebaskan oleh Mahkamah Majistret di sini, hari ini daripada pertuduhan mencabul kehormatan seorang inspektor wanita yang juga rakan setugasnya, tahun lalu.
Majistret Aishah Hijriah Arshad membuat keputusan itu selepas mendapati pihak pendakwaan gagal membuktikan kes prima facie terhadap Yusri Yusof di akhir kes pendakwaan.
Yusri, 35, dituduh menggunakan kekerasan jenayah ke atas inspektor wanita berumur 24 tahun itu dengan niat mencabul kehormatannya di pejabatnya di sini pada 5.35 petang, 26 Mei 2009.
Yusri, yang sebelum ini digantung tugasnya, didakwa mengikut Seksyen 354 Kanun Keseksaan yang memperuntukkan hukuman penjara sehingga 10 tahun atau denda atau sebatan atau mana-mana dua daripadanya, jika sabit kesalahan.
Aishah ketika membuat keputusan itu berkata, mahkamah mendapati keterangan mangsa tidak konsisten dengan laporan yang diberikan.
"Terdapat percanggahan keterangan yang diberikan oleh mangsa dalam kes ini kerana berdasarkan laporan polis yang dibuat, mangsa menyatakan bahawa dia dipeluk dari arah belakang dan cuba dicium di pipi kanan serta peha kanannya diusap sebanyak dua hingga tiga kali oleh tertuduh.
"Sebaliknya, ketika pemeriksaan utama oleh pihak pendakwaan, mangsa tidak dapat mengesahkan sama ada dia dipeluk atau tertuduh hanya memegang bahunya".
Aishah berkata, mangsa juga dilihat teragak-agak untuk menjawab dan tidak yakin untuk memberi jawapan ketika pemeriksaan utama dan pemeriksaan balas oleh pihak pendakwaan dan pembelaan.
Selain itu, keterangan mangsa tanpa keterangan sokongan tidak dapat membuktikan
tertuduh telah menggunakan kekerasan jenayah ke atasnya.
"Tindakan mangsa yang tidak memaklumkan kejadian yang berlaku ke atas dirinya dengan serta-merta dilihat tidak munasabah kerana sebagai pegawai polis, mangsa mempunyai pengetahuan bahawa apa yang terjadi kepada dirinya adalah salah di sisi undang-undang dan mangsa sememangnya ada banyak peluang untuk bercerita masalah yang dihadapi dengan rakan sebiliknya," katanya.
Sepanjang perbicaraan, empat saksi memberi keterangan bagi pihak pendakwaan yang dikendalikan Timbalan Pendakwa Raya, Choong Kak Sen manakala tertuduh diwakili peguam Wan Shahrizal Wan Laden. - BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: Madonna fik flypassagerer til at rase
description.content: Sangerinden fik i weekenden lov at forlade et omdirigeret fly flere timer før alle andre. Madonna var på vej til London fra New York og hendes maskine skulle oprindeligt lande i Heathrow-lufthavnen, men på grund af snemasserne blev den sendt til Stansted Airport. Efter en times tid kunne popdronningen og hendes følge gå fra borde mens de øvrige passagerer fik besked på at blive siddende. »Der kom en bus og hentede Madonna og hendes selskab på cirka 15 personer. Den slags virker uretfærdigt. Hun er jo hverken præsident eller noget«, siger en unavngiven passager til den britiske frokostavis Daily Mail og fortsætter: »Alle vi andre måtte vente to timer mere. Madonna fik lov at forlade flyet længe før resten af dem på første klasse. Vi knurrede allesammen over det«. Popstjernen og hendes tre børn holder jul i England. Juledag samles familien hos Madonnas eksmand Guy Ritchie. if(!window.ba_adspaces) window.ba_adspaces=[]; window.ba_adspaces.push(});

description.hltext_display: Sankt Peterburge siūloma įvesti mokestį turistams
description.content:
ELTA ir lrytas.lt inf.
Antradienį vykusio vyriausybės posėdžio metu Sankt Peterburgo gubernatorė Valentina Matvijenko pasiūlė įvesti specialų 1 euro mokestį į miestą atvykstantiems turistams, praneša „lentu.ru“.
REKLAMA
V.Matvijenko teigimu, surinktos lėšos būtų skiriamos miesto kultūros paminklų restauravimui.
„Tai palyginti mažas mokestis, o turistai, esu tikra, supras jo įvedimą. Sankt Peterburgas yra unikalus UNESCO saugomas miestas“, - sakė V.Matvijenko.
Sankt Peterburgo gubernatorė jau siūlė įvesti tokį mokestį 2009 m., tik tada jis siekė 2 eurus.
Investicijų ir strateginių projektų komiteto duomenimis, 2010 m. Sankt Peterburgą aplankė daugiau nei 5 mln. turistų.
2010 m. panašaus mokesčio įvedimas pradėtas svarstyti Venecijoje, Lisabonoje ir Barselonoje. Jau žinoma, kad nuo 2011 m. mokestis turistams bus įvestas Romoje.
Komentarai
Vardas
El. paštas
Komentaras (iki 3000 simbolių) Komentatoriaus atsakomybė
Verslas

Likus kelioms dienoms iki gražiausių žiemos švenčių, draudikai ragina vairuotojus dovanų važiuoti neskubant ir atsargiai. Draudimo bendrovės „ERGO LIETUVA“ duomenimis, per Kalėdų karštinę automobilių stovėjimo aikštelėse avarijų kyla apytikriai penktadaliu daugiau nei įprastą dieną.

description.hltext_display: La máquina de hacer fútbol adelanta sus vacaciones
description.content:
El Barcelona, sin Villa y Messi en el once inicial, no es capaz de derrotar a un Athletic que jugó a empatar
votos comentarios
compartir (¿qué es esto?)
Momento de la conferencia de prensa de Patxi Izco en el restaurante Irurena de Tajonar. (Efe)
Vista:
Más texto
Más visual
Galería Noticia
barcelona 0
Athletic 0
BARCELONA Pinto; Alves, Piqué, Abidal, Maxwell, Mascherano (Adriano, m.79), Xavi, Keita (Messi, m.54), Pedro, Bojan (Villa, m.63) e Iniesta.
ATHLETIC DE BILBAO Iraizoz; Iraola, San José, Ustariz, Koikili, Gurpegui, Susaeta, Iturraspe (Orbaiz, m.72), Javi Martínez, Gabilondo e Igor Martínez (Muniain, m.55).
Árbitro Mateu Lahoz (valenciano). Amonestó a los visitantes Javi Martínez, Ustaritz, Gabilondo e Iraola.
Estadio Camp Nou, 45.207 espectadores.
-
barcelona. La máquina de fútbol azulgrana, la misma que había fabricado hasta 39 goles en los últimos diez partidos, ha cerrado por vacaciones y el equipo más en forma del momento se tomó anoche un respiro en la Copa del Rey y ya no volverá a actuar hasta el año que viene.
El Athletic salió vivo del Camp Nou y lo hizo sin acercarse si quiera a Pinto, pero también desdibujando a un Barça sin dar ni una sola patada: desde el orden, la colocación y la concentración de sus jugadores, un muralla infranqueable para los azulgranas durante los noventa minutos.
El Barcelona, primero con Villa y Messi en el banquillo, y después con ambos en el campo, lo intentó sin suerte, y con el pitido final de Mateu Lahoz, los jugadores del Athletic celebraron el empate a nada como una enorme victoria. Saben que aún hay Copa, al menos hasta que el Barcelona de las manitas aterrice en Bilbao tras las fiestas navideñas.

description.hltext_display: Долги петербуржцев за горячую воду превысили 1 млрд рублей
description.content:
К началу декабря 2010 года долг потребителей перед ГУП "ТЭК Санкт-Петербурга" вырос в два раза по сравнению с 2009 годом и составил 1,1 млрд рублей. Как сообщили ИА REGNUM сегодня, 22 декабря, в компании, в декабре задолженность абонентов за горячую воду и отопление составила 1,13 млрд рублей, что в два раза выше уровня задолженности за аналогичный период прошлого года - 525,8 млн рублей.
Основная часть долга - 593,1 млн рублей, приходится на долю жилищного фонда. При этом лидерами в этой категории абонентов остаются управляющие компании и ЖКС с 306,9 млн рублей задолженности. За ними следуют ЖСК и ТСЖ, объем неплатежей которых находится на отметке в 243 млн рублей. На втором месте среди всех категорий абонентов находятся коммерческие потребители. Их долг составил 311,6 млн рублей, что на 120 млн рублей больше их задолженности на конец прошлого года.
Возглавляют список должников среди ТСЖ и ЖСК по итогам 2010 года ТСЖ "Ириновский пр., 33/49" (Красногвардейский район), ТСЖ "Лидер-88" (Приморский район) и ТСЖ "КультРассвет" (Калининский район). Среди крупнейших должников-управляющих компаний - ООО "Жилкомсервис №2 Красногвардейского района", ООО "Жилкомсервис" и ООО "Жилкомсервис №1 Невского района". Лидерами среди неплательщиков из числа коммерческих организаций стали строительная компания ЗАО "М-Индустрия", ОАО "Цветы" и ООО "СК "Импульс".
В пресс-службе отметили, что с января по декабрь 2010 года в суд было подано около 800 исков, в 99% случаев суд принимал сторону теплоэнергетиков.

description.hltext_display: 09:42Tiener fraudeert voor $750.000,- met eigen muziek
Nam H� n Tập Bắn Đạn Thật, Bắc H� n Không Phản Ứng
description.content:
Nam Hàn Tập Bắn Đạn Thật, Bắc Hàn Không Phản Ứng Việt Báo Thứ Ba, 12/21/2010, 12:00:00 AM
Nam Hàn Tập Bắn Đạn Thật, Bắc Hàn Không Phản Ứng
YEONPYEONG - Hôm Thứ Hai, pháo binh Nam Hàn tâp bắn đạn thật tại đảo chỉ cách bờ Bắc Hàn vài dặm và Bắc Hàn loan báo không bắn trả tuy truớc đó tung lời đe dọa phản ứng mạnh.
Seoul cho chiến đấu cơ chuẩn bị ứng chiến, di tản dân tránh xa ranh giới trên bộ và đưa hàng trăm cư dân đảo tới trú ẩn trong các công sự, nhưng không điều gì xẩy ra. Pyongyang cho biết họ không nổ súng vì Seoul thay đổi vùng tác xạ.
Họ vẫn giữ giọng hung hăng, và khẳng định có đủ sức mạnh quân sự để phá hủy các căn cứ quân sự của Nam Hàn và Hoa Kỳ. 1 bản thông cáo của Bộ tổng tham mưu Nam Hàn viết rằng Bắc Hàn có vẻ sợ 1 cuộc chiến tranh toàn diện, và rằng Bắc Hàn chỉ quen tấn công bất ngờ hơn là tấn công thẳng thừng.
Thông tấn Yonhap dẫn nguồn tin không chỉ danh cho biết TQLC Nam Hàn đã bắn 1500 quả đạn trọng pháo tại hải phận của đảo Yeonpyeong. 1 sĩ quan của Bộ tổng tham mưu Nam Hàn tiết lộ : dự phần trong cuộc thực tập tác xạ có 20 người của tình báo và truyền tin Hoa Kỳ, và 9 đại diện của Bộ chỉ huy kiểm soát đình chiến LHQ.
Cuộc diễn tập của Nam Hàn diễn ra gần 1 tháng sau vụ pháo kích của Bắc Hàn gây thiệt mạng 4 người Nam Hàn tại đảo Yeon[yeong, là lần đầu tiên nhắm đánh 1 khu vực dân sự sau chiến cuộc 1950-53, gây căng thẳng cao độ trên bán đảo Hàn. Trong khi đó, HĐ Bảo An họp khẩn cấp hôm chủ nhật theo yêu cầu của Nga mà không đưa tới kết quả nào - nhưng, có dấu hiệu của biến chuyển ngoại giao. Trong khi đó, thống đốc Richardson cho hay Bắc Hàn đồng y cho thanh tra nguyên tử của LHQ trở lại để kiểm nhận rằng Bắc Hàn không tinh chế uranium làm bom nguyên tử, theo tường thuật của phóng viên báo The New York Times đuợc tháp tùng thống đốc New Mexico đi Bắc Hàn.
Vẫn theo lời thống đốc Richardson, Bắc Hàn sẵn sàng bán cho Nam hàn 12,000 thanh nhiên liệu plutonium. Ông Richardson định tổ chức họp báo vào tối Thứ Hai tại Bắc Kinh, nhưng chuyến bay bị hoãn.
Tại phi trường Pyongyang, ông nói với phóng viên của APTV "Chúng ta có những kết quả tích cực".

description.hltext_display: U.S. & UN welcome formation of new Iraqi government
description.content: Washington/United Nations: The U.S. and UN today welcomed formation of a new government in Iraq saying its reflects the resolve of Iraqi people to thwart extremist designs and settle differences through open exchange of ideas. "We encourage its (Iraq's) leaders to continue to pursue a federal, democratic, pluralistic and unified Iraq based on the rule of law and respect for human rights," UN Security Council said in a statement.UNSC said this decision reflects the will of the Iraqi people as displayed by the parliamentary election of March 7, 2010. US President Barack Obama and Vice President Joe Biden each spoke to Iraqi Prime Minister Nuri al-Maliki to congratulate him on the formation of an inclusive government of national partnership that reflects the results of the national election.

description.hltext_display: Landkreis Forchheim: Wechsel im Vorsitz mit dem Jahreswechsel
description.content:
Zum 01. 01. 2011 gibt es folgende Wechsel im Vorsitz nachstehender Gremien:
Verbandsvorsitzender im Zweckverband Vereinigte Sparkassen Forchheim-Gräfenberg-Ebermannstadt ist im Jahr 2011 Oberbürgermeister Franz Stumpf, Stellvertreter ist Landrat Reinhardt Glauber
Verwaltungsratsvorsitzender im Verwaltungsrat der Sparkasse Forchheim ist im Jahr 2011 ebenfalls Oberbürgermeister Franz Stumpf, sein Vertreter ist Landrat Reinhardt Glauber
Vorsitzender im Zweckverband Synagoge Ermreuth ist im Jahr 2011 1.Bürgermeister des Marktes Neunkirchen a. Brand, Heinz Richter, stellvertretender Vorsitzender ist Landrat Reinhardt Glauber
Einen Wechsel gibt es in der Regionalmanagement Wirtschaftsregion Bamberg – Forchheim GmbH (WIR). Der Vorsitz wechselt zum 01.01.2011 für zwei Jahre auf Oberbürgermeister Andreas Starke, Bamberg, Stellvertreter ist Oberbürgermeister Franz Stumpf, Forchheim.
Keinen Wechsel gibt es beim Zweckverband für Rettungsdienst und Feuerwehralarmierung Bamberg – Forchheim. Seit dem 01.01.2010 hat den Vorsitz Landrat Reinhardt Glauber inne, Stellvertreter ist Oberbürgermeister Andreas Starke, Bamberg. Einen Wechsel gibt es erst zum Jahresbeginn 2012.
Ebenfalls keinen Wechsel zum 01.01.2011 gibt es im Vorsitz Naturpark Fränkische Schweiz – Veldensteiner Forst e.V. (Vorsitz nach Wahl am 12.06.2008 Landrat Reinhardt Glauber, Vertreter Landrat Hermann Hübner, Bayreuth, für die Dauer von drei Jahren). Ein Wechsel findet erst zur Jahresmitte 2011 statt.
Im Gebietsausschuss Fränkische Schweiz – dem die Landkreise Forchheim, Bamberg, Bayreuth und Kulmbach angehören – ist für die Wahlperiode 2008 – 2014 Vorsitzender Landrat Reinhardt Glauber, Stellvertreter ist Landrat Hermann Hübner, Bayreuth, weiterer Stellvertreter Landrat Dr. Günther Denzler, Bamberg, und Landrat Klaus Söllner, Kulmbach.

description.hltext_display: Rundgang mit dem Leuchtturmwrter
description.content:
Der Alte Leuchtturm in Travemünde lädt am Sonntag, 26. Dezember, von 11 bis 12.30 Uhr zu einem Rundgang mit dem Leuchtturmwärter und einer Turmführung ein. Dabei gibt es viel Wissenswertes über Travemünde, Schiffe, Molen, Sturmfluten, Lotsenstation, Passat, Tourismus, Leuchttürme, Feuerschiffe und Seezeichen.
Zum Abschluss führt der Leuchtturmwärter seine Gäste durch das Museum im ältesten Leuchtturm Deutschlands auf die Aussichtsgalerie mit dem herrlichen Rundblick. Bei Regen findet diese Veranstaltung im Turm statt. Die Teilnahme kostet sieben Euro, für Kinder drei Euro. Weitere Infos unter Tel. 04502/889180.
Text-Nummer: 66046 Autor: Veranstalter/red. vom 22.12.2010 09.25
Text versenden.+++ Text ausdrucken. +++ Text ohne Bilder ausdrucken. +++ Text kommentieren.

description.hltext_display: Fur Institute of Canada salutes Justin Trudeau
description.content:
To the Editor: On behalf of the Fur Institute of Canada (FIC), I would like to congratulate Montreal Papineau riding Liberal MP Justin Trudeau on a beautiful Christmas card one that reflects not only your families culture, interests and values, but the values and interests of tens of thousands of Canadians from coast to coast to coast. I am certain that you dont need me to inform you how well regulated the fur trade is in Canada, however, as a representative of the FIC, Canadas testing agency for testing and implementation of the International Humane Trapping Standards in Canada, I can confidently say that Canada has the most advanced humane trap research program in the world, the strictest regulations for trapping and the most highly trained trappers anywhere. This along with the fact that Canada continues to be blessed with healthy populations of virtually all native wildlife species. In addition, native and non-native trappers were not only important in opening Canada, they continue to play a vital role in maintaining biodiversity and regulating wildlife populations for the protection of human health and safety. In fact, it has been Canadian trappers that have kept raccoon rabies from entering Montreal in the past few years, and with the use of scientifically tested trapping systems, trappers were integral to the successful reintroduction of wolves and Canadian lynx to the United states over the past 15 years. These animals were largely captured with limb restraining devices that ensured humane capture and 100 per cent health, prior to relocation. In the fur trade today, there are some 60,000 native and non-native trappers, who are carrying on the 400-plus years of tradition of sustainable living off the land and who continue to thrive in rural communities across Canada. From responses we have received, they, along with hundreds of thousands of hunters who support sustainable use principles are all proud of you today. While it is a shame that your family Christmas card has ignited such national debate, it is indeed encouraging to see a Canadian public figure stand up for their beliefs and for Canadian values. Warmest Christmas greetings to your family and all the best for a healthy new year.
Rob Cahill
Executive Director
Fur Institute of Canada
Ottawa

entity.property: Rob Cahill Executive Director Fur Institute of Canada Ottawa

description.hltext_display: Wetter-Ticker: Ramsauer räumt Versäumnisse bei der Bahn ein
description.content:
Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer (CSU) hat angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn eingeräumt. Wir haben mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrühren“, sagte der CSU-Politiker im ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden. Es macht sich jetzt bemerkbar, dass man geglaubt hat, man könne sich das eine oder andere an der Reserve sparen.“ Diese baue man zurzeit in allen Bereichen der Bahn wieder auf. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf morgen beheben. Aber die Öffentlichkeit kann erwarten, dass die Politik zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in Ordnung gebracht werden und das tun wir.“ Ramsauer wies Vorwürfe zurück, dass die Winterreifenpflicht den Lastwagenverkehr nicht ausreichend einschließe. Natürlich müssten nicht nur die Antriebsachsen, sondern alle Achsen eines Lastwagens mit griffigen Allwetter- und Ganzjahresreifen ausgestattet sein. Jeder Lastwagen, der auf den anderen Achsen nicht hinreichend bereift ist, wird sofort aus dem Verkehr gezogen“, sagte der Verkehrsminister.
Bei einem Verkehrsunfall auf der Autobahn 73 ist am Mittwochmorgen ein Lastwagenfahrer schwer verletzt worden. Wie die Polizei in Suhl mitteilte, war der 32-Jährige aus zunächst ungeklärter Ursache zwischen Eisfeld und Schleusingen mit seinem Wagen ungebremst auf ein vorausfahrendes Fahrzeug des Winterdienstes aufgefahren.
Durch die Wucht des Aufpralls wurde das Führerhaus des Lastwagens abgerissen und der Fahrer eingeklemmt. Die Mitarbeiter des Winterdienstes blieben bei dem Unfall unverletzt. Der entstandene Schaden wird auf rund 200.000 Euro geschätzt.
Auf dem wichtigsten deutschen Flughafen in Frankfurt am Main sind wieder alle Start- und Landebahnen in Betrieb. Das sagte ein Sprecher des Betreibers Fraport der Nachrichtenagentur dpa. Es deutet alles darauf hin, dass sich die Dinge entspannen. Die Überhänge vom Dienstagabend sind fast abgebaut.“ Die weitere Entwicklung hänge aber nicht allein vom Frankfurter Flughafen ab, sondern auch von der Leistungsfähigkeit der anderen europäischen Airports.
Obwohl der Flugbetrieb in Frankfurt reibungslos“ laufe, müssten 60 Flüge gestrichen werden. Die Umläufe stimmen europaweit noch nicht“, sagte der Sprecher. Den Tag über werde man versuchen, die etwa 3500 gestrandeten Passagiere zusätzlich zum normalen Passagieraufkommen in den Maschinen unterzubringen und dass bei einem noch immer durcheinandergewirbelten Flugplan mit Ausfällen und Verspätungen. Die Terminals seien am Morgen schon wieder gut belebt“. Rund 600 Passagiere hatten die Nacht am Flughafen auf Feldbetten verbracht. Der Großteil der Wartenden ließ sich die Nacht über in Hotels einquartieren, teilweise 70 Kilometer außerhalb der Stadt. Für Donnerstag sei außerdem noch einmal mit einem Zuwachs an Fluggästen zu rechnen, weil in neun Bundesländern die Weihnachtsferien beginnen. Eine Prognose, ob sich rechtzeitig zu Weihnachten wieder alles normalisiert haben wird, kann wirklich noch keiner geben“, hatte schon am frühen Morgen ein Fraport-Sprecher gesagt. Zumindest die Wettervorhersage sei vorteilhaft.
Der Deutsche Wetterdienst (DWD) in Potsdam hat vor gefährlichem Blitzeis“ im Süden Brandenburgs gewarnt. Betroffen sind laut DWD die Stadt Cottbus sowie die Landkreise Elbe-Elster, Oberspreewald-Neiße und Spree- Neiße. Ursache der Glätte sei gefrierender Regen oder Sprühregen. Dadurch gebe es starke Behinderungen im Straßen-, aber auch im Bahnverkehr. Erschwert wird die Situation durch Schnee. Bis zum Abend könnten acht Zentimeter Neuschnee fallen. Allerdings steigen die Temperaturen laut DWD über den Gefrierpunkt. Das könnte die Lage entspannen.
Temperaturen über dem Gefrierpunkt bringen Schnee und Eis zumindest in Süddeutschland vielerorts zum Schmelzen. Im Norden kalt, im Süden mild“, bilanzierte der Deutsche Wetterdienst DWD im hessischen Offenbach. Mit Stand von 4.00 Uhr am Morgen lagen die Temperaturen in Konstanz, Stuttgart und Frankfurt am Main im Plusbereich. In München waren es null, in Nürnberg minus ein Grad. Köln und Dresden lagen mit einem Grad geradeso im Plus.
Weiter gen Norden wurde es kälter, beispielsweise mit minus sechs Grad in Hannover, minus sieben Grad in Bremen und Rostock, minus fünf in Hamburg und minus acht Grad in Berlin. Dieses Temperaturgefälle zwischen Nord und Süd soll laut DWD-Prognose generell anhalten, wobei jedoch die milderen Temperaturen in die Mitte Deutschlands vorrücken.
In Baden-Württemberg und Bayern war das Tauwetter schon am frühen Morgen vielerorts zu beobachten, wie eine Umfrage bei den größeren Polizeidienststellen ergab. Leichte Plusgrade gab es fast überall.
Für den Heiligabend am Freitag sagt der DWD für weite Teile Deutschlands leichten Schneefall voraus. Bei Temperaturen um den Gefrierpunkt soll es zunächst am Vormittag in Berlin, Frankfurt/Main, Stuttgart und München noch Regen oder Schneeregen geben, zum Abend hin wird es dann laut Prognose aber deutschlandweit leicht schneien.
Der Winter mit Tiefsttemperaturen von minus zehn Grad beeinträchtigt auch den S-Bahn-Verkehr in Berlin. Bei den Regional- und Fernbahnen sowie am Flughafen Tegel gibt es dagegen eine weitgehende Normalisierung. Witterungsbedingte Störungen und erhöhter Instandhaltungsbedarf“ sorgen nach Angaben der S-Bahn Berlin im gesamten Streckennetz für Einschränkungen. Viele Linien werden deshalb nur noch im 20-Minuten-Takt bedient.
Bereits am Dienstag waren nur 278 Doppelwagen unterwegs. Erforderlich für einen Notfahrplan, wie er bis zum Beginn der Schneefälle Anfang Dezember galt, sind 434 Doppelwagen. Vertraglich vereinbart ist mit dem Land Berlin der Einsatz von 562 Doppelwagen. Seit Sommer 2009 wurde diese Zahl wegen Sicherheitsauflagen des Eisenbahnbundesamtes und verstärkter Sicherheitsüberprüfungen nicht mehr erreicht.
Der Flugverkehr hat sich weiter normalisiert. Am Dienstag hatte die vierstündige Schließung des Flughafens Frankfurt am Main zu zahlreichen Flugausfällen in Tegel geführt. Doch am Mittwochmorgen waren in Tegel nur Flüge von und nach Düsseldorf und London gestrichen.
Auch bei der Bahn gab es Besserung. Von Mittwochmorgen an werden von und nach Berlin zusätzliche Fernbahnzüge eingesetzt. Die Berliner Verkehrsbetriebe (BVG) melden derzeit etwa 300.000 zusätzliche Fahrgäste. Busse, U- und Straßenbahnen sind deshalb recht voll. Im Laufe des Tages rechnete der Deutsche Wetterdienst wieder mit Schneefällen. Bei steigenden Temperaturen könnte es damit zu überfrierender Nässe und Straßenglätte kommen.
Eiszapfen an Hausdächern und Gebäuden werden mehr und mehr zur Gefahr für Passanten. Allein in Hamburg musste die Feuerwehr zwölfmal ausrücken, um die spitzen Zapfen zu entfernen, teilte ein Sprecher mit. Unter anderem mussten das Dach des Marien-Domes von ihnen befreit werden, um die dort stattfindenden Filmaufnahmen nicht zu gefährden. Außerdem mussten die Einsatzkräfte sechsmal aufbrechen um Schwäne und andere Wasservögel aus dem Eis auf den Gewässern um Hamburg zu befreien.Kurz vor dem Fest macht das Wetter den Reisenden das Leben schwer. Wo Flüge und Züge ausfallen, Blitzeis droht oder es milder wird, erfahren Sie hier.

description.hltext_display: Tricky conditions set to test fleet
description.content:
Sydney to Hobart racers can expect rough conditions this year but there will be no repeat of the horrendous weather conditions that led to the 1998 tragedy, according to the Bureau of Meteorology (BOM).
Light winds are set to ease sailors out of Sydney Harbour when the race starts on Boxing Day, but a strong southerly front is forecast to hit the fleet as they begin the long trek down the east coast.
However, BOM spokesman Barry Hanstrum was confident of avoiding a similar scenario to that witnessed in 1998 when brutal winds wreaked havoc on the field of 115 boats.
In that race, six sailors died and just 44 yachts completed the race, but Hanstrum said this year's competitors are not in danger.
"There's certainly nothing in the weather pattern that is indicative of the ferocity of the winds in the 1998 race," Hanstrum told reporters.
"That was a very small intense low that actually moved through the race course."
On Boxing Day evening the winds are expected to pick up, with a 20-30 knot southerly set to cause some trouble for the leading crews.
The forecast headwinds will dampen any hopes that pre-race favourite Wild Oats XI may have had of breaking her own race record of one day, 18 hours, 40 minutes and 10 seconds set in 2005.
"When you're on the boat you're really just focussed on making the right decisions at the right time to get down there as best you can," said Wild Oats XI's navigator Ian Burns.
"The real challenge I think is (going to be) the first couple of nights and keeping the boat together.
"We'll be slowing down rather than trying to break any record, or even necessarily breaking our competition.
"For us it won't be a record-breaking year, I don't think, but it'll have its challenges."
Hanstrum said the toughest period of racing will likely start late on Monday night and continue through to Tuesday when the leading yachts will encounter winds of 30-40 knots approaching Bass Strait.
"I think that's likely to be the most testing period of the race, weather-wise," Hanstrum added.
"A combination of gale force winds and large seas, expected to be in the range of 4-5 metres ... it will be tough going."

event_or_fact.property: There's certainly nothing in the weather pattern that is indicative of the ferocity of the winds in the 1998 race; That was a very small intense low that actually moved through the race course.

description.hltext_display: BS TransComm Consortium Bags Rs.300 Cr. Transmission System Project
description.content:
(RTTNews) - BS TransComm Ltd., an end-to-end turnkey services and technology solutions provider, said it had bagged a project for Rs.300 crore from Rural Electrification Corporation Ltd., or REC, for establishment of 765kV transmission system associated with Krishnapattanam Ultra Mega Power Plant on build-own-operate-maintain basis in consortium with Patel Engineering Ltd. and Simplex Infrastructure Ltd.
This transmission system project is for the construction of the synchronous interconnection between the southern region and western region spanning 210 kms from Raichur to Sholapur.
The completion of the project is by March 2014 and the operation and maintenance period is for 35 years, the company said.
BS TransComm shares are being trades at Rs.137.30, up by 0.18% from the previous close at the BSE.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com

description.hltext_display: Bentley Ranks Top 500 Infrastructure Owners
description.content:
Bentley Systems Inc. released its inaugural Bentley Infrastructure 500 Top Owners ranking, a global compendium of the top public- and private-sector owners of infrastructure based on the value of their cumulative infrastructure investments (measured by reported net tangible fixed assets). Data sources for the rankings included published financial statements and third-party research.
The list, which Bentley will update annually, makes it possible to compare investment levels across types of infrastructure, regions of the world, and public and private organizations. The full list is available for download at www.bentley.com/500. Readers are authorized and encouraged to use it for any purpose with attribution.
Bentley Systems compiled the ranking to help global constituents appreciate and explore the magnitude of investment in infrastructure and the potential to continually increase the return on that investment. The infrastructure value represented is more than $13 trillion, which, to provide perspective, is close to the U.S. annual GDP and equal to the combined annual GDPs of China, Japan and Germany.
“We anticipate a diverse, global audience for our new Top Owners ranking, since all of us are infrastructure constituents and depend on infrastructure owners—and their stewardship of their infrastructure investments—to help sustain our society, environment and economies,” said Greg Bentley, Bentley CEO. “The rankings and measurements provide a frame of reference to help all of us appreciate just how massive investments in infrastructure are, and the degree to which enabling better returns on these investments is leveraged.”
The top five countries, in terms of the infrastructure value of the Top Owners headquartered in each, are the United States (166 Top Owners, $4,241.1 billion), Japan (58 Top Owners, $1,349.2 billion), China (29 Top Owners, $869.6 billion), France (22 Top Owners, $747.2 billion) and the United Kingdom (23 Top Owners, $617.8 billion).
Further analysis shows extensive involvement of the private sector in infrastructure investments, with 359 of the Bentley Infrastructure 500 being private-sector organizations, with a total value of their infrastructure at more than $9 trillion.

description.hltext_display: Belarus: Bầu Cử Tt Diễn Ra Trong Gian Lận V� Bạo Động
description.content:
Belarus: Bầu Cử Tt Diễn Ra Trong Gian Lận Và Bạo Động Việt Báo Thứ Ba, 12/21/2010, 12:00:00 AM
Belarus: Bầu Cử TT Diễn Ra Trong Gian Lận Và Bạo Động
MINSK - Ủy ban tuyển cử trung ương Belarus họp báo hôm Thứ Hai tại thủ đô, loan báo TT Lukashenko tái cử nhiệm kỳ thứ tư với gần 80% tổng số phiếu, vài giờ sau khi cảnh sát chống bạo động giải tán cuộc biểu tình của hàng ngàn người phản đối bầu cử gian lận tại thủ đô - quan sát viên quốc tế và các chính phủ Tây Phương tố cáo TT tại chức Lukashenko dùng gian lận và bạo động để bám giữ quyền lực sau 16 năm cai trị bằng sự áp bức. 7 trong 9 ứng viên đối lập bị bắt, gồm 1 người bị đánh và bị công an chìm lôi từ giường bệnh sang nhà giam, theo lời kể của nhân chứng.
Nhưng, tổ chức vì an ninh và hợp tác châu Âu (OSCE) mô tả cuộc bầu cử hôm chủ nhật là "xấu hay rất xấu" tại nửa số quản hạt trong nước. OSCE cũng lên án các cuộc giải tán biểu tình bằng bạo lực.
Các nhà lãnh đạo của Hoa Kỳ và châu Âu cũng đả kích đợt bạo động chống lại các ứng viên TT và cảm tình viên của họ ngay sau cuộc bầu cử. TT Lukashenko phản bác và nói việc cảnh sát giải tán biểu tình là ngoài thẩm quyền của quan sát viên bầu cử.
Ông Lukashenko là 1 trong các di sản của chủ nghĩa độc tài thời xô-viết, kiểm soát mọi mặt sinh hoạt của 10 triệu dân. Chế độ áp chế tại Belarus trở thành điều bối rối với Liên Âu, và khối này đề nghị cấp viện trợ 3.9 tỉ MK cho chính quyền Minsk nếu bầu cử TT đuợc kiểm nhận là tự do và công bằng.
Phóng viên báo cáo: không có dấu hiệu bất ổn tại thủ đô Minsk và cảnh sát chống bạo động đã rút lui nhanh chóng. TT Lukashenko nguyên là viên chức quản lý của nông trang tập thể thời CS không cho phép truyền thông độc lập hoạt động, nắm quyền kiểm soát 80% công kỹ nghệ, và đàn áp đối lập bằng lực lượng cảnh sát hay bằng các hình thức áp lực khác. Ông có hậu thuẫn từ công nhân và người cao niên với chủ trương duy trì "luới an toàn bao cấp".
Ứng viên TT bị đánh là ông Vladimir Neklyayev - vợ của ông nói với phóng viên "Tôi không biết chồng tôi hiện ở đâu -thât là không thể tưởng tượng - cảnh sát chìm bắt chồng tôi từ phòng cấp cứu đem đi. Tôi chỉ có thể đứng nhìn, không làm gì đuợc".
Nga tiếp tục coi Belarus như trái độn giữa họ và NATO - đoàn quan sát viên của nhóm gọi là "cộng đồng các quốc gia độc lập" thân Moscow tuyên bố không đặt nghi vấn với kết quả kiểm phiếu.

description.hltext_display: Nets break 10-game road slump with win at Memphis
description.content:
Brook Lopez scored 26 points and pulled down six rebounds, as the New Jersey Nets snapped a 10-game road losing streak with a 101-94 victory over the Memphis Grizzlies from FedEx Forum.
Sasha Vujacic added 16 points off the bench for the Nets, who won away from the Prudential Center for the first time since November 15. Kris Humphries tallied 12 points and 15 rebounds, while Devin Harris donated 12 points and five assists for the victors.
"We scored the ball tonight and got contributions from everyone across the board," Nets head coach Avery Johnson said.
Marc Gasol finished with 19 points for the Grizzlies, who have lost three in a row since a four-game winning streak. O.J. Mayo chipped in with 17 points off the bench for Memphis, which got 13 points and eight assists from Mike Conley.
The Nets scored the final nine points of the first quarter to take a 26-18 lead.
New Jersey carried the momentum into the second stanza. An 8-2 spurt had the Nets ahead 34-20 on Vujacic's jumper with under nine minutes left.
Memphis responded with seven straight points to prevent New Jersey from pulling away. The Grizzlies got a three-point play from Conley prior to the half to cut the gap to 45-43.
The home team actually took the lead briefly early in the third. Trailing by three, 53-50, New Jersey put together a 19-4 run to gain control again. Lopez tallied six points during the surge, which Graham capped with a layup for a 69-57 margin with about 2 1/2 minutes remaining.
Memphis scored the final five points of the third to get within six, 73-67.
The Grizzlies never got closer than four in the final period.
"They outplayed us and outworked us," Grizzlies forward Zach Randolph said.
Game Notes
Memphis won both meetings with New Jersey a season ago...The Nets improved to 3-12 on the road this season...Grizzlies forward Rudy Gay returned to the lineup after serving a one-game suspension for his flagrant foul on Houston Rockets forward Luis Scola during last Friday's game. He ended with 11 points and nine rebounds...The Nets shot 52.6 percent from the floor, while the Grizzlies made 39.8 percent of their shots.
©2010 Sports Network. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

description.hltext_display: Scott County overpowers Green Dragons
description.content:
Harlan senior forward Brandon Taylor went up for a shot during action against state power Scott County on Tuesday. The Dragons fell 85-54 to the visiting Cardinals. MISSY BIANCHI/ Daily Enterprise
There usually aren’t any bright spots to be found after a 31-point loss, but there were several reasons for the Harlan Green Dragons to stay positive after falling 85-54 to Scott County on Tuesday.
Coming into the game, Casey Lester was unsure how his players would respond to the challenge of facing the perennial state power, but the Harlan coach was pleased with what he saw from the Dragons.
“We got to see some things that we needed to work on. Just as far as competing, I think we did that and that was one of the big things I wanted to see. That’s a big step for us,” Lester said.
It was a homecoming of sorts for Scott County coach Billy Hicks. The Ages native was the head coach at Evarts and Harlan before moving on to Corbin and eventually Scott County.
“I wish it was a July 4th picnic so I could really relax, but it was nice to be back around a lot of people that I know and grew up around,” Hicks said.
Harlan (5-2) trailed by 10 heading into the second quarter, but a basket by sophomore guard Ty Saragas closed the gap to 34-27 late in the second period. However, the Cardinals responded with a 12-1 run to close out the period and take a 44-28 led into the half.
“We played well. We cut it to seven with about two minutes to go in the second quarter and I felt like if we finished that quarter out it would have been a different game,” Lester said. “We came out and played right with them for almost two quarters and the third quarter some too.”
Harlan sophomore Philip Ely kept the Dragons close early, with eight of his 17 points coming in the first quarter.
“Philip played extremely well. He’s a senior, and that’s what we’re looking for out of him,” Lester said.
A basket by Harlan senior Brandon Taylor closed the gap to 11 early in the third quarter, but the Cardinals closed the period with another run. This time Scott County (7-1) outscored the Dragons 15-6 to end the third quarter and take a 61-41 lead into the fourth.
“Harlan played hard tonight. I was very impressed with how hard they played. Coach Lester has done a really good job with them. They just got tired at the end,” Hicks said.
Harlan never got any closer and the Cardinals pulled away for the win.
“Their depth hurt us, especially late in the game. I felt like we just wore down a little bit and weren’t able to keep up,” Lester said.
Scott County forward Tanner Shotwell had 13 of his team-high 17 points in the second half to lead the Cardinals.
‘He’s as good an athlete as I have ever coached. He was playing with a sprained ankle tonight, but he was still able to get to the basket and score,” Hicks said.
Harlan will return to action on Tuesday in the Max Performance Invitational at Shelby County.
———
Harlan (2-2) fell 73-21 to Scott County in the junior varsity contest.
Manny Davis had eight points to pace the Dragons. Cody Logan added six. Donovan Miller had five points and Dakota Morris added two points.
Zach Humphrey had 12 points to power the Cardinals. Andrew Short added eight points for Scott County.
———
SCOTT COUNTY (7-1)
Trey Reliford 5-8 2-2 12, Isiah Ivey 7-11 0-0 16, Tamron Manning 4-11 2-2 10, Tanner Shotwell 7-12 2-3 17, Josh Harris 3-5 1-2 5, Chris Cunningham 2-4 1-1 5, Trent Gilbert 3-6 0-0 8, Rob Barger 0-0 0-0 0, Avery Ford 0-0 0-0 0, Zack Humphrey 1-2 0-0 2, Dylan Portwood 2-2 0-0 4, Andrew Short 2-2 2-2 6, Zack Bryant 0-0 0-0 0, Matt Peterson 0-0 0-0 0. Totals: 36-65 10-12 85.

description.hltext_display: California boy, 9, is youngest US chess 'master'
description.content:
A 9-year-old California boy has become the youngest-ever chess "master" in the United States.
Samuel Sevian, of Santa Clara, earned the title after a match in San Francisco.
The United States Chess Federation, the governing body of competitive chess, gave him a rating of 2,201 after the Dec. 11 match. A rating of 2,200 qualifies a player as a "national master."
Samuel beat the previous record-holder for youngest chess master, Nicholas Nip, of San Francisco, by 11 days.
It's not the first record for the fourth-grader at Don Callejon School, who turns 10 on Sunday. Samuel also was the youngest person to reach the previous chess level of "expert" when he was 8.
The federation's ultimate title is that of "senior master" for ratings of 2,400 and up.

description.hltext_display: Đức: 1 Con Chó Sinh 17 Con, Chủ Không Nuôi Nổi, Sẽ Bán
description.content:
BERLIN - 1 con chó cái hạ sinh 17 chó con, gây ngạc nhiên cũng như gây mệt mỏi chủ chó vì phải nuôi bầy chó con bằng bình sữa từ hơn 1 tháng, bởi chó mẹ không đủ sức đáp ứng nhu cầu.
Bà Ramona Wegemann cho biết bà không thể ngủ đuợc nhiều phút để bảo đảm sự sống còn của bầy chó thuộc giống Rhodesian Ridgeback. Bà nói : khi cho con thứ 17 bú xong, thì con số 1 lại đói - bà phải cho bầy chó con bú sữa bình 5 lần mỗi ngày.
Hôm 28-9, chó mẹ sinh 8 con cái và 9 con đực. Đây là lần thứ nhì chó cái Etana sinh, lần trước sinh 8 con. Trong trường hợp sinh nhiều như thế, thường thì 5, 6 chó con chết ngay trong tuần lễ đầu. Bầy chó con của bà Wegemann sống sót hết là điều tưởng như khó tin.
Bà đặt tên bầy chó con bằng tên Phi Châu, bởi chó mẹ là giống chó săn Rhodesia - vợ chồng bà định cho đi hầu hết số chó con. Nếu bán, bà hi vọng 1000 MK/con, là gần đủ các chi phí - bà định chỉ bán cho các gia đình có trẻ em, không bán cho người gây giống vì nhu cầu thương mại.
4 con đã có người mua và 2 con đã đuợc đặt tiền.

description.hltext_display: Stoytchev non si ferma qui
description.content:
Il tecnico di Trento assicura: "La fame di vittoria di questa squadra non si è ancora esaurita, abbiamo ancora tanta voglia di primeggiare".
Articoli Correlati
La squadra di Stoytchev schianta a Doha il Belchatow e si conferma campione del mondo per club, è il sesto alloro gialloblu in bacheca.
Svanisce il sogno iridato della Norda Foppapedretti Bergamo sconfitta 3-0 dalle brasiliane del Sollys Osasco nella semifinale del Mondiale per Club.
A sfidare nuovamente la squadra di Stoytchev per il titolo di Campione del Mondo nel match di martedì ancora il PGE Skra Belchatow.
"E' una vittoria conquistata con la forza del gruppo che ha avuto un ruolo primario. Voglio quindi complimentarmi con tutti i ragazzi perché sono stati splendidi per tutto il torneo. Prima di ottenerla potevo solo sognare di vincere una doppietta al Mondiale per club: non immaginavo nemmeno potesse diventare realtà". Quasi non ci crede nemmeno Radostin Stoytchev dopo il bis della sua Trento.
"La fame di vittoria di questa squadra non si è ancora esaurita, abbiamo ancora tanta voglia di primeggiare nelle altre quattro manifestazioni che giocheremo da qui alla fine della stagione".
Tutto su: volley stoytchev ferma

description.hltext_display: 4th of July Recipes: Aussie Works Burger | Submitted By: SuzAnne
description.content:
When the grill is ready, lightly oil the grilling surface. Form the ground beef into four patties, and grill for 5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions, and fry until soft. Remove the onions from the skillet, and crack the eggs in the same skillet over medium heat. Cook until the yolks are solid, turning over once. Remove eggs, and set aside. Place the Canadian bacon in the same skillet, and fry until toasted. Remove the bacon, and turn the heat to high. Quickly fry the pineapple rings in the bacon drippings just until browned on each side.
To Assemble sandwiches: Set bottom of kaiser roll on a plate, and top with burger, a slice of cheese, a slice of Canadian bacon, one fried egg, fried onions, a few slices of beet, a slice of pineapple, a slice of tomato, and a leaf of lettuce. Decorate the top bun with ketchup, mustard, relish and mayonnaise as desired. Place over the burger. Repeat with remaining burgers.

description.hltext_display: Wrongly Jailed
description.author: Zuo Likun
description.content:
Parents, think up a unique name for your child, lest he be jailed for his namesake. Student Wang Qi holds his release notice. [Photo/China Daily Youth]� A teenager student� in Bole city of Northwest China's Xinjiang was jailed two years ago for a robbery committed by a namesake. Adding irony to absurdity, he met the namesake's accomplice in jail, who was stunned by� the mistake, leading to a redress last year, the China Youth Daily reported on Monday.
The student's� family won a state compensation of 23,000 yuan ($3,445) last year. But they said they would still appeal the case to a higher court for the 212-day ordeal that included abuses and threats in custody as well as� public humiliations at schools.
The newspaper used the pseudonym Wang Qi to protect the teenager.
The gaffe dated to March 2008, when Wang's dropout classmate Ma Qinglin was arrested for a break-in robbery in Bole city. He at first confessed to some lesser crimes, telling the police that he gave some of his stolen jewelry to Wang� to sell. Thus Wang was taken in for questioning in April. He admitted the wrongdoings. But since Wang was still an underage student, 15 at the time, and selling stolen goods wasn't a serious offense, he was released after his father paid a fine.
That seemed to be the end for the student Wang, but in fact his troubles were just beginning. As the probe continues, Ma admitted that he once robbed a student of his cell phone and a 10 yuan bill with Wang Qi. Here Ma somehow failed to mention that it was another Wang Qi, a then-security guard in West Xinjiang.
However, the police assumed that it must be the student Wang Qi.� In September 2008, the student Wang was taken away in cuffs from an Internet café. For three days, he tried to explain that he never robbed anything. He realized the police must have gotten the wrong guy, since he knew Ma had a namesake friend.
The police just didn't believe him.
"They thought I was lying. So they repeatedly threatened me, bullied me, choked my neck and beat me. I was bruised all over my body," Wang said to China Youth Daily.
Instead, a police officer, taking advantage of the student's ignorance,� read out Ma's testimony and asked him to repeat it, which was then recorded as Wang's testimony.
Still, Wang wouldn't admit to the robbery charges, until the fourth day in custody, when he was told that if he confessed, he could go home.
"I knew nothing about law," Wang said. "I didn't know how serious it was until the trial."
On Nov 30, 2008, the student Wang Qi was sentenced to two years in prison for a crime he never committed.
After the trial he was transferred to another jail, where he met Ma Qinglin, the dropout classmate, who had accidentally implicated him but now held the power to free him. An internal report about the mistake was submitted. Only after that, the student Wang was allowed to meet with his parents. When told about the mistake, his parents, stunned,� immediately sought a redress.
He was released after a retrial, a day after April Fools' Day in 2009. By then, he had been in custody for 212 days. The real robber Wang was later arrested and sentenced. Responsible police officers were given internal criticism notices. Two of them were denied three-month bonuses and suspended for discipline training.
But for the student Wang, the damage had already been done.
While in custody, Wang was handed a confession letter and ordered to read it out loud on public stages at three schools as a deterrent message to other students.
"I've been stealing since I was a child," he read, describing all the despicable things he never did, weeping in grief. The police interpreted that as a sign of "heartfelt remorse."
"Everybody was laughing at me. I really� wanted to die then," Wang said.
According to judicial experts early this year, Wang still suffers from "traumatic stress disorder."

description.hltext_display: Toyota: Nộp Thêm Tiền Phạt 32.4 Triệu Mk Vì Xe Trục Trặc
description.content:
Toyota: Nộp Thêm Tiền Phạt 32.4 Triệu MK Vì Xe Trục Trặc; Toyota: Sẽ Bán Ra 7.7 Triệu Chiếc Xe Khắp Thế Giới Năm 2011
TOKYO - Nhà sản xuất xe hơi Toyota thỏa thuận nộp 1 khoản tiền phạt bổ túc là 32.4 triệu MK để dàn xếp cuộc điều tra về việc giải quyết 2 đợt thu hồi xe có thiếu sót kỹ thuật, là trung tâm của khủng hoảng về an toàn.
Trong cuộc dàn xếp trước, Toyota đã chịu nộp phạt 16.4 triệu MK.
Như vậy là Toyota bị phạt tiền tổng cộng 48.8 triệu MK.
Từ đầu muà Thu 2009, Toyota đã thu hồi trên 11 triệu xe có vấn đề trong lúc ra sức bảo vệ uy tín về an toàn, đánh dấu 1 năm đầy khó khăn với nhà sản xuất xe hơi số 1 thế giới. Toyota quyết định nộp phạt bổ túc sau 1 phiên họp hôm Thứ Ba của HĐ giám đốc.
Theo nguồn tin thông thạo, Toyota thuận nộp phạt và không nhận vi phạm luật pháp Hoa Kỳ. Dù vậy, Toyota vẫn có thể là đối tượng bị khách hàng kiện, hay từ kết quả của các cuộc điều tra khác.
Ông Steve St. Angelo, giám đốc phụ trách phẩm chất của Toyota tại Bắc Mỹ, tuyên bố "Toyota đang cố gắng đặt định tiêu chuẩn mới về đáp ứng các khiếu nại của khách hàng. Thỏa thuận nộp phạt là cơ hội để sang trang trong mối quan hệ xây dựng hơn với HĐ an toàn lộ vận (NHTSA)". Ông St. Angelo cũng ngỏ lời tri ân khách hàng về sự tin cậy vào các sản phẩm của Toyota.
Phóng viên đưa tin : Toyota đang đối đầu hàng chục đơn kiện của các gia đình có người thân chết hay bị thương trong các tai nạn gây ra bởi sự tăng tốc bất ngờ của xe Toyota.
Chính phủ Hoa Kỳ đã nhận đuợc 3000 báo cáo về tai nạn tương tự trong 1 thập niên qua, với 93 trường hợp tử vong - nhưng NHTSA chỉ xác nhận 4 tai nạn chết người ở California.
Trong khi đó, giới phân tích cho hay tiền phạt hàng chục triệu MK không ảnh hưởng gì với doanh lợi của Toyota tính bằng số tỉ (chỉ trong 6 tháng đầu năm là 1.2 tỉ MK).
Mặt khác, Toyota loan báo dự kiến bán ra 7.7 triệu xe khắp thêá giới trong năm 2011.

description.hltext_display: Nato: Không Có H� nh Quân Đặc Biệt Của Mỹ Tại Pakistan
description.content:
Nato: Không Có Hành Quân Đặc Biệt Của Mỹ Tại Pakistan Việt Báo Thứ Tư, 12/22/2010, 12:00:00 AM
NATO: Không Có Hành Quân Đặc Biệt Của Mỹ Tại Pakistan
BRUSSELS - Hôm Thứ Ba, NATO phủ nhận 1 bản tin theo đó các cấp chỉ huy quân sự Hoa Kỳ đang xem xét khả năng mở các cuộc hành quân đặc biệt tại vùng biên giới tây bắc Pakistan để bắt hay giết loạn quân Taleban và khủng bố al-Qaeda để tăng tốc các thành quả an ninh trước ngày bắt đầu giảm quân tại Afghnanistan từ Tháng 7-2011.
Các viên chức Hoa Kỳ tại thủ đô Washington và thủ đô Kabul mô tả đề nghị của các tư lệnh chiến trường với báo the New York Times. Họ cho biết dự định ấy đang đuợc cân nhắc và sẽ trình lên TT Obama. Đề nghị của các tư lệnh chiến trường là dùng các đơn vị nhỏ của lực lượng tinh nhuệ để thu thập tin tình báo giá trị nếu bắt đuợc các nghi can đưa sang Afghanistan để khai thác, theo bài báo đã đưa lên mạng từ tối Thứ Hai.
Tại Kabul , đô đốc Gregory Smith của NATO cho phóng viên của AP biết tin ấy là không đúng.
Qua bài báo của tờ New York Times, các viên chức NATO và Hoa Kỳ cảm thấy tính cấp bách của nhu cầu cải thiện an ninh tại Afghanistan. Họ tin rằng "hành quân đặc biệt" là 1 cách để tăng tiến an ninh nhanh hơn. Nhưng, ý kiến về hành quân đặc biệt sẽ gặp phản ứng từ phiá Pakistan trong lúc dân chúng cảnh giác về chủ quyền. Hiếm khi binh sĩ Hoa Kỳ vuợt biên giới để truy kích Taleban, tuy phi cơ không người lái hoạt động thường hơn để không tập các mục tiêu đuợc chỉ điểm.
Cùng ngày Thứ Ba, đô đốc Gregory Smith xác nhận rằng NATO và lực lượng Hoa Kỳ đã phát triển các quan hệ hợp tác tích cực hơn với Islamabad để giải quyết các vấn đề an ninh mà các bên chia sẻ.

description.hltext_display: Driver charged in fatal wreck during snowstorm
description.content:
[+] click to enlarge
Related
A staff report
The driver of a truck that caused a fatal wreck on Elliott Bridge Road during the snowstorm last Thursday has been charged, according to court records.
Israel Solis Beltran, 39, of Spring Lake, was charged Tuesday with misdemeanor death by vehicle, according to charging documents.
According to the state Highway Patrol, Beltran was driving a Ford F-150 Thursday morning when he lost control and slid across the center line into a Corvette driven by 50-year-old Larry Leo Raines of Sanford. Raines was killed.
Charging documents allege Beltran was driving at a speed "greater than was reasonable and prudent under the then existing conditions."

description.hltext_display: Hòa Bình Từ Việc L� m
description.content:
Đức Đạt Lai Lạt Ma nói rằng dân Tây Tạng hiện là những người gìn giữ giáo pháp truyền thống từ Viện Đại Học Nalanda – nơi đào tạo học tăng và đã biến mất vì chiến tranh từ cả thiên niên kỷ trước – và do vậy dân Tây Tạng là học trò chân thực của các đạo sư Phật Giáo Ấn Độ.
Ngài nói như thế trong bài diễn văn khai mạc Hội Nghị Quốc Tế về Khoa Học, Tinh Thần và Giáo Dục hôm Thứ Hai, giaỉ thích rằng “Tôi luôn luôn tự hào rằng chúng ta là những người giữ được truyền thống Nalanda. Các khaí niệm và phương pháp quan trọng của Phật Giaó luôn luôn dựa vào các thầy Nalanda, nên chúng ta là đệ tử chân chính của truyền thống Nalanda. Đó là lý do tại sao tôi luôn luôn nói, chúng ta là môn đệ của Ấn Độ và người Ấn Độ là đạo sư của chúng ta.”
Ngài cũng nói hoà bình thế giới không thể đạt được qua cầu nguyện và ban phước, “Hòa bình thế giới không thể tới qua cầu nguyện hay qua sự ban phước; hòa bình xuyên qua hành động của chúng ta. Hành động quan trọng hơn cầu nguyện hay ban phước.”

description.hltext_display: ITC to take Motorola case against Microsoft
description.content:
WASHINGTON: A trade panel that specializes in patent cases has agreed to hear the complaint of Motorola Inc's subsidiary Motorola Mobility against Microsoft Corp, the panel said.
Motorola Mobility, which makes handsets and is being spun off by Motorola, has accused Microsoft of infringing its patents to make some Xbox video game consoles.
Motorola Mobility has asked for the infringing devices to be barred from importation into the United States. Motorola Mobility has filed similar lawsuits in district courts in Florida and Wisconsin.
Patent lawsuits are frequently filed with the ITC in order to get infringing products banned from importation and in district courts in order to win damages.

Pincha aquí para ver los acuerdos y las resoluciones divididos en categorías. Recuerda que hay que seleccionar la jornada y la categoría deseada.

description.hltext_display: Afghan official blasts NATO for civilian deaths
description.author: TAREK EL-TABLAWY
description.content:
KABUL, Afghanistan A provincial governor in Afghanistan said Wednesday that a battle between NATO and the Taliban the previous day had killed three women and two children, and called on the coalition to "pay attention" to civilian casualties.
Afghan officials have often spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.
Also Wednesday, NATO said that a leader of the Haqqani network militants who operate out of western Pakistan and eastern Afghanistan was killed in a Dec. 18 operation grouping international forces and their Afghan counterparts in the eastern Khost province.
In Helmand, a Taliban stronghold and scene of some of the heaviest fighting in the nearly ten-year-old war, the provincial governor's office said that the five civilians died Tuesday as militants attacked coalition forces in the Sangin district. Seven insurgents were killed in the battle, according to the statement from the governor's office.
NATO has said it was investigating the civilian fatalities and that it exercises the utmost caution during operations to minimize such occurrences. The coalition said Tuesday that insurgents were using a civilian home to attack its forces and that the insurgents launched their attack with assault rifles and a machine gun. NATO troops returned fire and used mortars.
A U.N. report this month said that Afghan civilian casualties increased by 20 percent in the first 10 months of 2010, compared with the same period a year earlier. It said there were at least 6,215 conflict-related civilian casualties 2,412 deaths and 3,803 injuries.
But the U.N. report also found that civilian casualties attributed to NATO and pro-government forces dropped by 18 percent compared to the first 10 months of 2009.
The governor's office said it wants NATO "to pay attention to civilian causalities during operations and prevent civilian causalities."
In the operation in Khost province, NATO said intelligence reports led international and Afghan troops to a compound in the Terezai district where an ensuing gun battle killed the Haqqani network leader, identified as Usman, along with an unspecified number of insurgents. NATO said Usman had coordinated and conducted attacks on its forces in Khost.
The Haqqani network is among militant groups that have hideouts in neighboring Pakistan from where they attack targets inside Afghanistan. U.S. officials have urged Pakistan to launch an offensive on the North Waziristan area where these groups are based, but Islamabad has rebuffed such requests, saying its forces are stretched too thin for such an operation without drawing down troops facing its archrival, India.
___

description.hltext_display: Tecno Net Work unveils coud-based RIA using Magic Software uniPaaS app
description.content:
Enables building and deployment of business apps process
Magic Software, a cloud services company, said that Techno Net Work has developed their cloud-based rich Internet applications (RIA) using Magic Software's uniPaaS application platform.
Techno Net Work selected the uniPaaS RIA platform to develop a septic tank management system, which it plans to market across Japan. The company also developed a dental technician management system using the uniPaaS RIA platform.
Dental technicians and dentists are now able to use an organised business process management system, where they can automatically share information and have real-time access to each others' data in a central location on the cloud, the company said.
Magic Software's uniPaaS simplifies the process of building and deploying business applications and provides the ability to create cloud-based RIA applications efficiently.
Magic Software president Toshio Sato said they are proud that Techno Net Work has developed its systems with uniPaaS RIA, which has enabled the company to tap into the power of the cloud. "This deal is additional proof that uniPaaS enables users take a leap forward and design their systems as cloud-based offering," Sato said.

description.hltext_display: Nurse to attend signing of 'don't ask' repeal
description.content:
A Washington state flight nurse who sued to win reinstatement to the Air Force is planning to be there when President Obama signs a repeal of "don't ask, don't tell."
The Washington state chapter of the American Civil Liberties Union, which represents Maj. Margaret Witt of Spokane, says she flew to Washington, D.C., on Tuesday and will attend the ceremony Wednesday.
Witt says she's excited to be there for all of the people who can't attend.
Witt was discharged just short of retirement after the Air Force learned she had been in a relationship with a civilian woman. She sued, and in September a federal judge found her dismissal was unconstitutional because it advanced no legitimate military interest.
She expects to rejoin the Air Force Reserve early next year.

description.hltext_display: Taking A Closer Look At The Ranthambore National Park
description.content:
The Ranthambore national park is one amazing destination that you should not miss seeing in your entire life. This is an exciting opportunity to see wildlife at its best especially if you are fascinated with birds and tigers. Recently, you can take advantage of the various promos and offerings of the Ranthambore national park that are fit to spend the Christmas and New Year with your whole family. You can choose from a wide array of safari tours and resorts that you would truly enjoy and will remain memorable in your mind.
The Ranthambore National Park:This is known to be one of the best national parks in the whole of South Asia. It is also considered as one of the biggest when you talk about the area and it has the largest tiger reserve in the entirety of India. The place is not just wealthy in nature and wildlife but also rich in culture and history.
Resorts in Ranthambore National Park:There are multiple resorts in Ranthambore national park. It offers the finest of services since you can be sure to experience the most luxurious of services in terms of accommodation. The resorts range from deluxe, 3, 4 and 5 star types of accommodations. Amongst the most famous resorts would be the Jungle Nivas, The Ankur, The Santury, Sher Bagh, Vanya Villas, Khem Villas, and many more. All these resorts offer clean and peaceful ambiance along with sumptuous food servings.
Safari in Ranthambore:You can enjoy Safari in Ranthambore either through Jeep or Canter. The ones who are more into the play safe mode would prefer the Jeep Safari tour. But if you want to travel through the thick and deep forests of the place, you must not hesitate to take the Canter safari tour option. You would be amazed with the wide array of fauna and flora that you will discover within along with meeting the wildest of beasts that lurk around. You need not worry for you will be able to view all these from a very safe distance.
Hence, it is not troublesome or too dangerous to bring your kids to witness such amazing creations in nature. Make it a point to consider booking online to stay in the resorts of the park and also take the opportunity to enjoy its wildlife offering. You will surely not regret booking for the Ranthambore national park and all that it can render you.

description.hltext_display: 旅游部要旅游社 7天内呈解释信
description.content:
●南洋商报
（怡保21日讯）旅游部要求涉及金马仑旅巴车祸27死惨剧的旅游社，在七天内该部门提呈车祸意外的解释信。
旅游部也指出，该部将援引1999年旅游交通工具执照法令，对这次意外展开详细调查，会在探讨各相关政府机构对此的调查结果后，再确认是否吊销或取消有关旅巴的执照。
需3周完成报告
旅游部发表文告说，肇祸旅巴车牌号码是AFX 2266，2009年11月30日，注册在SK Murni Tours & Travels公司，巴士执照有效期限是到2012年11月30日。
此外，旅游部执照小组秘书卡拉杜拉阿凡迪说，该小组需要三个星期完成有关报告。

description.hltext_display: 22 syarikat konsesi lebuh raya beri diskaun, rebat sempena Krismas
description.content:
KAJANG: Sejumlah 22 syarikat konsesi lebuh raya akan memberi diskaun kadar tol dalam bentuk tunai dan rebat dari 5 hingga 37 peratus, bermula dari 22-31 Disember ini bersempena perayaan Krismas dan Tahun Baru akan datang.
Ketua Pengarah Lembaga Lebuhraya Malaysia (LLM), Datuk Ir Ismail Md Salleh, berkata ia adalah kesinambungan program Tanggungjawab Sosial Korporat (CSR) untuk membantu memberi nilai tambah serta menghargai para pengguna di semua lebuh raya berkenaan.
"Untuk program ini, semua konsesi telah bersetuju untuk menanggung pemberian insentif diskaun ini sebanyak RM1 juta, dan kita berharap para pengguna dapat menggunakannya dengan sebaik mungkin.
"Terdapat sesetengah konsesi memberi diskaun dari 12 malam hingga 7 pagi, di mana tujuannya adalah untuk menggalakkan para pengguna menggunakan lebuh raya ketika waktu berkenaan selain mengurangkan kesan kesesakan yang teruk pada waktu siang," katanya pada sidang media di ibu pejabat LLM di sini hari ini.
Antara konsesi lebuh raya terlibat ialah Lebuhraya Utara Selatan (PLUS), Lebuhraya Utara Selatan Hubungan Tengah (ELITE), Lebuhraya Seremban-Port Dickson (LDP), Lebuhraya Sistem Penyuaraian Trafik KL-Barat (Sprint), Lebuhraya Shah Alam (Kesas), Lebuhraya Duta Ulu Kelang (DUKE), Lebuhraya Cheras Kajang (Grand Saga) dan Lebuhraya Bertingkat Ampang-Kuala Lumpur (AKLEH).
Syarikat lain turut terlibat ialah Lebuhraya Koridor Guthrie, Lebuhraya Kemuning Shah Alam (LKSA), Lebuhraya KL-Putrajaya (KLP), Lebuhraya SMART, Lebuhraya Kajang SILK, Lebuhraya Pintas Selat Klang Utara Baru (NNKSB), Lebuhraya METRAMAC, Lebuhraya Baru Pantai (NPE), Lebuhraya Sungai Besi (BESRAYA), Lebuhraya Kajang-Seremban (LEKAS) dan Lebuhraya Lembah Kelang Selatan (SKVE).
Sementara itu, Ismail berkata, pihak LLM telah mengambil langkah rapi untuk menghadapi sebarang kemungkinan seperti kesesakan luar biasa, kemalangan, tanah runtuh dan sebagainya.
Antara langkah yang dikenal pasti ialah penyediaan tambahan 15 hingga 17 kereta penunda di beberapa lokasi strategik dan menambah jumlah pekerja sebanyak 20 peratus untuk menghadapi sebarang kemungkinan yang memerlukan tindak balas yang pantas.
Pihak LLM juga kemungkinan akan menutup dan mengalih aliran trafik melalui jalan alternatif jika terdapat kemalangan yang serius dan melibatkan kehilangan nyawa untuk memastikan aliran lancar serta tidak mengganggu kerja-kerja pihak berkuasa.
Sehubungan itu, Ismail berkata, para pengguna jalan raya diminta memandu dengan berhemah serta berhati-hati memandangkan musim cuaca yang tidak menentu serta keadaan jalan raya yang agak licin akibat hujan yang berterusan. - BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: Pajín estudiará caso a caso las muertes por violencia de género
description.author: La Opinión de Zamora
description.content:
MADRID, EUROPA PRESS La ministra de Sanidad, Política Social e Igualdad, Leire Pajín, ha anunciado en el Congreso que se reunirá periódicamente con un grupo de trabajo -en el que se encuentra la ex ministra de Igualdad, Bibiana Aído -, para estudiar «caso por caso» las muertes registradas por violencia de género.
«Hemos entendido que es bueno hacer un análisis caso a caso de este año y también de los anteriores, sobre las particularidades de cada una de las víctimas, porque también los comportamientos cambian y es importante poder hacer estudios particulares y pormenorizados de cada una de las víctimas.
Vamos a actuar conjuntamente», ha destacado tras reunirse con los secretarios de Estado de Igualdad y Seguridad, Bibiana Aído y Antonio Camacho, respectivamente, el delegado del Gobierno para la Violencia de Género, Miguel Lorente, la Fiscal de Sala Soledad Cazorla y la presidenta del Observatorio contra la Violencia de Género, Inmaculada Montalbán.

description.hltext_display: Etisalat Misr inks $1.2 bln financing for expansion
description.content:
DUBAI, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Etisalat Misr, the Egyptian arm of UAE telco Etisalat on Wednesday signed a 7.2 billion Egyptian pounds ($1.24 billion) financing deal, partly to fund local expansion.
The agreement was signed with a consortium of local and regional banks including state-owned National Bank of Egypt, Banque Misr and National Bank of Abu Dhabi, according to a statement on the Qatar News Agency website.
(Writing by Amran Abocar; Editing by Jason Benham) ($1=5.806 Egyptian Pound) Keywords: EGYPT ETISALAT/
(amran.abocar@thomsonreuters.com; +971 4 391 8301; Reuters Messaging:amran.abocar.reuters.com@reuters.net)

description.hltext_display: Mỹ: Coi Chừng Kẻ Mạo Danh Từ Thiện Quyên Tiền
description.content:
Vào thời gian này hàng năm, quý vị thường lọt vào giữa vòng vây của vô số người gây quỹ, gồm những kẻ mạo danh và ai cũng cảm thấy ít nhiều sự thôi thúc để đóng góp.
Tất cả chúng ta đều biết ơn cứu hoả và cảnh sát về các hi sinh của họ - đó là lý do để những quân gian tự nhận là cứu hoả hay cảnh sát để mời gọi góp quỹ từ thiện.
Phóng viên nhắc nhở : chúng xưng tên giả khi nói chuyện điện thoại. Vấn đề trở thành phức tạp, bởi các hội đoàn cảnh sát và cứu hoả thường muớn những người gây quỹ chuyên nghiệp làm việc này - bất cứ khi nào có người trung gian, tiền thực sự đóng góp là ít hơn.
1 vấn đề khác là có khi tổ chức gây quỹ không bảo đảm dùng tại địa phương các khoản tiền thu góp đuợc bằng cách hợp pháp. Nên lưu ý vài điểm kể sau : quân gian lấy tên tổ chức gần giống tên của hội đoàn thật.
Nếu quý vị đóng góp 1 lần, sẽ có vô số mời gọi qua điện thoại hay bằng thư để kêu gọi tài trợ tiếp.
Sẽ có nhiều sự mời gọi, bởi quân gian chia sẻ với nhau danh sách các đối tượng của họ.

description.hltext_display: 金山安全报告称今年木马等造成损失150亿
