description.hltext_display: Huawei ryöstää Sony Ericssonin insinöörit Ruotsissa
description.content:
Kiinalainen Huawei on saanut houkuteltua joukon Sony Ericssonin eturivin insinöörejä palvelukseensa, ruotsalainen talouslehti Dagens Industri kertoo.
Lehden mukaan Huawei on onnistunut palkkaamaan "joukon" ruotsalaisia matkapuhelinkehittäjiä palvelukseensa. Ilmiötä on vauhdittunut sen jälkeen, kun Sony Ericsson sulki oman kehityskeskuksensa Tukholman Kistassa pari vuotta sitten.
"Ruotsalaiset ovat teknisesti edistyksellisiä. Siksi täällä on hyvä kehittää kännyköitä", Huawei Nordenin toimitusjohtaja James Chen sanoo DI:lle.
Sony Ericsson saa jatkossakin pitää kiinni omistaan, sillä Huawei aikoo palkata 50 uutta työntekijää nykyisten 500 lisäksi.
Huaweilla menee Pohjoismaissa muutoinkin lujaa. Alueen myynti rikkoo tänä vuonna sadan miljoonan euron rajan.

description.hltext_display: Group pushes for nationwide wolf restoration
description.content:
Anonymous FILE - This undated handout photo provided by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service shows a gray wolf. An environmental group has filed notice that it will sue the federal government to force it to adopt a plan for the recovery of gray wolves across the lower 48 states. Biologists with the Arizona-based Center for Biological Diversity said Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010 they want to expand that recovery nationwide. (AP Photo/U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service,file)
Environmentalists said Tuesday they intend to sue the Obama administration to force it to restore gray wolves across the lower 48 states _ even as Republicans in Congress sought unsuccessfully to strip the animals of protection.
The Center for Biological Diversity said in a formal notice to the Interior Department that it will sue the agency in 60 days unless the government crafts a plan to bring back wolves throughout their historical range.
"Wolves once roamed nearly the whole country and down into Mexico, but at this point there just in a fraction of that range," said Noah Greenwald, director of endangered species for the Center for Biological Diversity.
About 6,000 wolves live in the lower 48 states. They are protected from hunting except in Alaska.
Biologists for the Arizona-based group argue there is enough wild habitat to support thousands of wolves in New England and New York, the southern Rocky Mountains, parts of Colorado and the Cascade Range of Oregon and Washington.
But prospects for new wolf packs in other parts of the country are uncertain at best, given how polarized the debate over wolves has become in recent months.
Like the Bush administration, the Obama administration has pushed to end federal protections for wolves and turn control over the animals over to states. Lawmakers from states where wolves already roam say there are too many of the predators.
On Tuesday, Sen. Mike Crapo, R-Idaho, tried to force a full Senate vote on a bill to strip wolves nationwide of federal protections.
The measure was backed by Republicans in Wyoming and Utah, but failed in the face of Democratic objections.
Wolves were poisoned and trapped to near-extermination in the United States in the last century. They have bounced back in some wilderness areas over the last few decades, in part through government-sponsored reintroduction programs.
Crapo said the growing population of wolves in the Northern Rockies _ more than 1,700 at the end of 2009 _ was harming big game herds and domestic livestock.
"The longer we wait to resolve this issue, the more difficult it's going to be," he said.
But Sen. Benjamin Cardin, a Maryland Democrat, said the Republican bill would undermine the Endangered Species Act. He criticized what he called an attempt "to solve politically what should be done by good science."
Cardin suggested he would support a compromise pushed by Montana lawmakers and the administration that would limit the scope of the bill to include only wolves in the Northern Rockies.
Crapo said that proposal was unacceptable because it would have forced Idaho to change the way it manages the animals.
Public hunts for wolves were allowed briefly in Montana, Idaho and Wyoming in recent years. Those were halted after the federal government was rebuffed by the courts in several attempts to take the animal off the endangered list.
Judges have ruled that the government has not proved existing wolf numbers would ensure the population's long-term survival.
Wolves are notorious predators. Experts say they could survive in most of the country if they were allowed. But a hunger for livestock often gets the animals into trouble, particularly in the Northern Rockies where ranches and wolf territories often overlap.
Young adult wolves sometimes travel hundreds of miles when looking to establish a new territory. In the last several years, packs have gained a toehold in parts of Oregon and Washington. Others have been spotted in Colorado, Utah and northern New England.
"We've learned from where wolves have been reintroduced that they have a tremendous benefit," Greenwald, of the Center for Biological Diversity, said. "They force elk to move around more, which allows riparian vegetation to come back and increases songbirds, and they control coyote populations."
The U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service is currently analyzing research into wolf genetics to see how populations in different parts of the country relate to one another.
Agency spokesman Chris Tollefson on Tuesday said the effort is not part of a nationwide recovery plan, but declined to say if it could be used for such an effort in the future.
He said results of the agency's work are expected in early 2011.
"It's designed to establish the best scientific foundation to make future management decisions about wolves. That's about all I can say about it at this point," Tollefson said.
__
Matthew Daly contributed to this story from Washington, D.C.

description.hltext_display: Ylen hd-lähetykset eivät saa sotkea markkinoita
description.content:
Ylen hallintoneuvoston työvaliokunta valmistelee hd-palveluiden ennakkoarviointia yhdessä helsinkiläisen asianajotoimisto Borenius & Kemppisen kanssa.
Merkittävien uusien palveluiden ennakkoarviointimenettely noudattaa Euroopan komission linjauksia ja sen tarkoituksena on selvittää julkisen palvelun arvo ja niiden vaikutukset markkinoihin.
Ensimmäinen ennakkoarviointimenettelyä edellyttävä merkittävä uusi palvelu on Ylen säännöllisten teräväpiirto- eli hd-lähetysten aloittaminen keväällä 2011.
"Suomessa ennakkoarviointimenettely on pitkälti samanlainen kuin Saksassa. Myös muissa EU-maissa kuten Britanniassa, Tanskassa ja Ruotsissa on hankkeita merkittävien uusien palveluiden ennakkoarviointiin", sanoo Ylen hallintoneuvoston puheenjohtaja Kimmo Sasi.
Sasin mukaan arvioijaksi valittu Borenius & Kemppinen valikoitui tarjouskilpailussa, jossa mukana oli lakiasiaintoimistojen lisäksi media- ja tilintarkastustoimistoja.
"Tarjouskilpailussa painotimme enemmän laatua kuin hintaa. Borenius & Kemppisella on vahva osaaminen kilpailuasioissa", Sasi sanoo.
Yle varaa julkisen palvelun televisiotoimintaan kapasiteettia yhden teräväpiirto- eli hd-kanavan lähettämistä varten. Suunniteltu hd-kanava koostetaan Yle TV1- ja Yle TV2 -kanavien tarjonnasta. Kanava merkitsee tuotanto- ja lähetysteknisen laadun parantumista, ei sisällöllistä markkinamuutosta. Katsojille maksuton hd-kanava olisi samoin ehdoin kaikkien operaattorien saatavilla.
Hd-lähetysten tavoitteena on toteuttaa Ylen julkisen palvelun tehtävää muuttuvassa toimintaympäristössä.
Ylen palvelukehitys ei lopu hd-lähetyksiin. Sasi vilauttaa myös mahdollisuutta tarjota Ylen tuotantoa ipadissa.
"Tästä ei kuitenkaan ole vielä suunnitelmia", hän sanoo.
Median ja markkinoinnin uusimmat tuulahdukset esittelee Markkinointi&Mainonta.

description.hltext_display: Redukcja na akcje EuCO przekroczyła 60 procent
description.content:
Wartość całej oferty wyniosła 30,6 mln złotych brutto, a wartość nowej emisji ? 10,8 mln złotych brutto.
- Wartość nowej emisji ? 10,8 mln złotych brutto jest wyższa od zakładanej w prospekcie emisyjnym. Spółka planowała pozyskać od 7 do 10 mln złotych brutto ? czytamy w komunikacie.
Spółka przeznaczyła dla inwestorów indywidualnych 300 tys. akcji. Z kolei w transzy dużych inwestorów znalazło się 1,4 mln akcji EuCO. Oferta publiczna łącznie obejmowała 1,7 mln akcji, w tym 1,1 mln akcji istniejących (seria A) oraz 600 tys. nowych akcji (seria B). var _r = document.referrer ? encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) : ''; var _w = encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); var _e = document.inputEncoding ? document.inputEncoding : document.charset; document.write('\/script'); Cena emisyjna i cena sprzedaży akcji Europejskiego Centrum Odszkodowań została ustalona na 18 zł za akcję, czyli na maksymalnym poziomie z przedziału cenowego wynoszącego od 14 do 18 złotych.
Europejskie Centrum Odszkodowań (EuCO) jest wiodącą w Polsce i w Czechach firmą odszkodowawczą. Działalność Grupy Kapitałowej EuCO obejmuje głównie dochodzenie roszczeń o zapłatę z tytułu odszkodowania oraz innych świadczeń wynikających ze szkody (np. renta, zadośćuczynienie).
EuCO wypracowała zysk netto wysokości 4,7 mln zł po trzech kwartałach 2010 r., co oznacza wzrost o 68% r/r. Przychody ze sprzedaży wyniosły 14 mln zł po trzech kwartałach 2010 r. i były o 27% wyższe niż rok wcześniej.

description.hltext_display: 超级网银试运营范围扩大
Rosh Hashanah: Pitcha | Submitted By: DENITA H
description.content:
Ask your butcher to chop the calf's foot in several pieces; wash well. (If you're using oxtails, leave the pieces whole and do not remove fat or bones until later.) Place the meat in a stock pot with the bouillon cube. Tie the chopped onion, garlic, bay leaf, clove, and peppercorns into a cheesecloth bag. Add the bag to the pot and pour in water to cover. Bring the water to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat and simmer for 3 hours.
Stir the gelatin into the 1/2 cup of cold water and set aside for 10 minutes. Remove the meat from the pot and let it cool. Strain the cooking liquid into a bowl; you should have about 8 cups of broth. Discard the spice bag. Pick the meat from the bones and set it aside; discard the bones and gristle.
Spray a gelatin mold with cooking spray. Add the lemon juice and salt and pepper to the broth. Taste and adjust the seasonings. Transfer the softened gelatin into the warm broth and stir to dissolve. Pour the liquid into the prepared mold and refrigerate. Chill the broth until the gelatin has thickened slightly, about 45 minutes to 1 hour. Stir in the reserved meat and the egg slices. Refrigerate until set, 4 hours or overnight.
To unmold the pitcha, dip the gelatin mold into warm water for 15 to 20 seconds. Invert the mold onto a serving plate and serve with parsley and lemon wedges.

description.hltext_display: Museum of Wellington City & Sea – The Unfolding of New Zealand's Rich Culture
description.content:
Being the capital of New Zealand, the heart of Wellington lies in the country's rich heritage and culture. This unique blend creates an intriguing story of the capital city, which is flaunted to its people through numerous museums.
Standing as a testimonial that narrates its history, the Museum of Wellington City & Sea is one of the leading museums in New Zealand that exclusively recounts stories of the sea and the land. Situated in the heritage site of the Bond Store found on Queens Wharf, the museum is a place that explores and discovers all that is known of Wellington life. The building which is deemed as a historic site itself brings more significance and value to the museum, making the experience much more exciting.
Offering wonderful insight into the social and cultural developments of Wellington, the technology used in the museum has the ability to engage and captivate its visitors in a way that brings to life its rich, vast history. With interactive exhibits such as holographic effects and a large cinema screen stretching up to three floors, the museum has an array of delightful techniques that anybody would enjoy, regardless of any age differences.
Grasping both its maritime and commercial history, the museum is dedicated to the past, present and future life of Wellington. One of its main highlights belongs to the dramatic show of "A Millennium Ago". The show exquisitely portrays the ancient Maori legends and myths where as other highlights include the 1968 maritime tragedy, which is shown as an emotional and moving film. There are also 101 enchanting tales of 20th century life in contemporary Wellington. The fascinating collection of maritime memorabilia of paintings, logbooks, flags, maps and replica of ships complement the old tales of seafaring and ship wrecks.
In addition to preserving the capital's abundant history, the Museum of Wellington City & Sea focuses on educating students in local schools by conducting tours and activities.
As the museum provides a journey of the people and the events that have made Wellington what it is today, it remains as a top tourist attraction. A visitor can tour the museum conveniently by lodging at any Wellington accommodation situated nearby, such as the Kingsgate Hotel Wellington. Staying in a hotel in Wellington makes sightseeing much easier for a relaxing and exciting stay in New Zealand.

description.hltext_display: Tehdäänkö tiedettä vai tiedepolitiikkaa
description.content:
Veli-Matti Jalovaara, 10:41
Joskus muinoin akateemisen maailman ideana oli toimia sivistysyliopistona. Sivistynyt ihminen ei puhunut koko aikaa rahasta tai edes sen puutteesta. Siinä mielessä nykyinen akateeminen maailma on muuttunut moukkamaiseksi. Eri asia sitten paljonko siihen on syynä yhteiskunnalta ja yrityksiltä tulevan rahoituksen riittämättömyydessä.
”Suomen tieteellisen tutkimuksen (suhteellinen) taso ei ole kehittynyt 2000-luvulla odotetulla tavalla”, Suomen Akatemia tiivisti vuoden takaisen tutkimuksen tuloksia.
Se lähtökohta innoitti pureutumaan tarkemmin eilen julkistetussa ”Tutkimuspolitiikan välineet ja käytännöt – viiden maan vertailu” -tutkimuksessa siihen, miksi Suomen tieteen tilanne ei ole ihan toivotunlainen ja miten tilannetta kenties saataisiin kohennettua.
Tutkimuksessa Suomea verrattiin 2000-luvulla tieteessä meitä paremmin pärjänneisiin Hollantiin, Irlantiin, Norjaan, Sveitsiin ja Tanskaan. Mitä siellä on tehty toisin?
Tutkimuksen aihe on tärkeä ja vakava, mutta johtopäätöksiin voi halutessaan suhtautua myös jo hieman turhautuneella huumorilla. Keskeisten rakenteellisten ja rahoituksellisten syiden lisäksi yhtenä yksityiskohtana Suomi-tieteen suhteelliseen pärjäämättömyyteen nostetaan meikäläisten tutkijoiden vertailumaita huonommat palkat ja resurssit. Siksi tänne ei hakeudu edes tarpeeksi ulkomaisia huippututkijoita.
Kieltämättä olisi ollut yllättävää, jos tutkijat olisivat suoraan tai vahvasti rivienvälissä päätyneet siihen tulokseen, että yhteiskunnan on sijoitettava nykyistä vähemmän rahaa tutkimukseen ja että tutkijoiden palkkaa ja muita resursseja on nyt kiireesti vähennettävä.
Tämän päivän Hesarin mielipidekirjoituksessaan Helsingin yliopiston emerituskansleri Kari Raivio tokaisee ”Suomalaisen tiedepolitiikan kaksi turhinta sanaa lienevät huippuyliopisto ja innovaatio, sillä kummankin sisältö kumisee onttouttaan. Tutkimuksen huipulle ei Aallolla ole asiaa.”
Raivion kirjoitus ei liity Suomen Akatemian julkaisemaan tutkimukseen, mutta onpahan muuten yksi lisäys ajankohtaiseen tiedepolitiikkakeskusteluun.
Voi olla, että muutosvauhti Suomen yliopisto- ja ammattikorkeakoulujärjestelmässä on ollut liian kovaa ja korjausliikkeet taas liian hitaita. Kokonaisuus on jäänyt osiensa jalkoihin. Kyllä se näkyy väistämättä myös tieteen tuloksissa.

description.hltext_display: Pacquiao to face Mosley in Las Vegas
description.content:
Manny Pacquiao will fight Shane Mosley, a former champion in three divisions, on May 7 in Las Vegas.
The fight, to be held at the MGM Grand, will be contested at the welterweight limit of 147 pounds, Top Rank promoter Arum told Reuters in a telephone interview.
"Mosley is very dangerous, he's a very slick fighter, very experienced," said Arum. "Manny's style is made to order for Shane. It should be a very, very interesting fight."
After considering a choice between Mosley, lightweight champion Juan Manuel Marquez and WBC welterweight champion Andre Berto, Pacquiao (52-3-2, 38 KOs) informed Arum of his choice last week in the Philippines.
"He (Pacquiao) liked Mosley because Mosley is better known than the other two," Arum said of the choice. "It is a name selection. He picked the guy that is known to more people because that is going to generate interest in the fight."
Arum said finalized the bout on Tuesday.
The 32-year-old Pacquiao, the current WBO welterweight champion and widely considered the world's best pound-for-pounder fighter, would have preferred a bout with undefeated Floyd Mayweather Jr., said Arum.
"We made no secret that Mayweather was our top priority," said Arum. "All Mayweather had to do was signal to us that he would have been available pending his court situation and we would have waited, but we heard nothing from him.
"Nobody has talked to him, he hasn't talked to anybody."
Mayweather, 33, was arrested at a Las Vegas casino last week on a misdemeanor battery charge after he allegedly assaulted a security guard at his gated community.
The 39-year-old Mosley, a Californian, is 46-6-1 with 39 knockouts but has a loss and a draw in his last two fights. He dropped a unanimous decision to Mayweather in May and had a draw with Sergio Mora in September.
Marquez fought Pacquiao to a draw in a 2004 featherweight championship fight and lost a split decision in a 2008 junior lightweight title fight.

description.hltext_display: Bundesgesundheitsministerium warnt bayerische Hausärzte
Глава петербургского Дворца творчества юных уволен из-за финансовых нарушений
description.content:
В ноябре-декабре 2010 года межведомственная комиссия провела анализ содержания и форм работы в государственном образовательном учреждении Санкт-Петербургском городском Дворце творчества юных. Как сообщили ИА REGNUM сегодня, 22 декабря, в пресс-службе Комитета по образованию администрации Санкт-Петербурга, в результате выявлено большое количество нарушений.
На содержание и развитие главного городского учреждения дополнительного образования детей в 2010 году было выделено более 400 млн рублей. За последние годы был практически заново отстроен детский оздоровительный лагерь "Зеркальный", построены бассейн и эколого-биологический центр, проводится восстановление внутренних интерьеров дворца. По данным пресс-службы, комиссией выявлено незаконное получение денежных средств по 11 договорам с различными организациями на использование помещений Дворца творчества юных. Договоры заключены директором дворца Владимиром Киселевым в нарушение правил аренды в Санкт-Петербурге.
Комиссией отмечено, что в городском Дворце творчества юных нарушается принцип доступности образования - прием детей в Аничков лицей осуществляется по конкурсу, занятия в самых востребованных творческих коллективах (театре-студии "Розыгрыш", студии танца и пластики "Метаморфозы", Театре юношеского творчества и др.) первые два года обучения проводятся только на платной основе. Тренировки в бассейне учреждения в самое востребованное время - в вечерние часы и в выходные дни - осуществляются исключительно по платным абонементам. Организованное во Дворце отделение предшкольного образовании осуществляет свою деятельность без лицензии. Штатное расписание не соответствует методике расчета штатной численности учреждений образования. Нет прозрачности в расходовании средств, полученных от платных услуг, в то время как само учреждение зарабатывает более 100 млн рублей в год.
В связи с выявленными нарушениями Комитетом по образованию принято решение о расторжении трудового контракта с Киселевым. Директором городского Дворца творчества юных назначена Татьяна Говорушина, ранее возглавлявшая Дворец детского (юношеского) творчества Московского района Санкт-Петербурга.
Татьяна Говорушина родилась 26 июня 1963 года в городе Ленинграде. В 1985 году окончила Ленинградский педагогический институт им. Герцена. В 2005 году окончила "Московский институт права" по специальности "юрист". Имеет ученую степень кандидата педагогических наук. С 1998 по 2010 годы - директор Дворца детского (юношеского) творчества Московского района Санкт-Петербурга. За этот период учреждение из небольшого районного Дома творчества превратилось в ведущее учреждение города - Дворец высшей квалификационной категории, сложившаяся система которого обладает уникальным потенциальным развития разнообразных способностей каждого воспитанника, отметили в пресс-службе. Говорушина награждена нагрудным знаком "Почетный работник общего образования РФ", почетной грамотой Министерства образования РФ, медалью "В память 300-летия Санкт-Петербурга". Является победителем Всероссийского конкурса "Лидер в образовании - 2008". За заслуги в педагогической и воспитательной деятельности и многолетний добросовестный труд Говорушиной в 2010 году объявлена благодарность президента Российской Федерации. Комитет по образованию подчеркивает, что все опасения, касающиеся разделения и продажи ГДТЮ, закрытия детских коллективов безосновательны. Все творческие и спортивные коллективы Дворца продолжат свою работу в обычном режиме.

description.hltext_display: Will Making Healthy Selections and Getting Wealthy Attractiveness to You
description.content:
Author : Doris Hill
Most all of us agree that while not sensible health life will be challenging The advantages of excellent health are really priceless I additionally understand that the shortage of money can place a strain on you emotionally, which in flip can make you sick Nowadays, Doctors more than ever diagnose health related issues with stress as being the cause for not feeling well One issue that causes stress for individuals these days are because of monetary problems How would you prefer to resolve both issues with one resolution?
Healthy Choices Will Improve Your Life!
The daily selections we have a tendency to all create have long term effects on us Several people blame genetics on our current health situations More of a deciding issue in our health than genetics is our own personal selections of diet, exercise and just how we tend to select to live In reality that's some nice news we will improve our health by making higher choices If the genetic pool is stacked against you, it's even a lot of vital that you are taking charge of your life!
Most of the Killer Diseases of Nowadays are Preventable
The diseases of Diabetes, Strokes, Heart Disease and many cases of Cancer are related to weight management and nutrition These factors are controllable with healthy choices Kind a pair of diabetes is 95 p c preventable with an improved diet and weight control My own Mother has diabetes She is eighty four years recent and lives with me and my family Her quality of life isn't what I wish for myself She has had three strokes and is on medication for each ailment you can imagine She has no energy, and really no want to try to to anything This is all a results of selections she made I would like I may fix it, however I recognize I will only learn from her mistakes and make sure of myself It's sad, however true
Here is a Health Assessment for You to Take:
1 Has anyone in your immediate family (e g father, mother, brother, or sister) ever been diagnosed with heart disease, diabetes, or cancer?
2 Are you concerned concerning your immune systems ability to fight off a chilly or flu throughout the winter months?
3 Do you discover yourself frequently running out of energy or lacking the energy required to induce through your day?
4 Does one struggle along with your weight? (e g recently gained weight or notice it more durable to maintain a healthy weight as you grow up?
5 Do you find it a challenge to eat five to nine servings of fruit and vegetables every day?
6 Do you regularly crave high sugar or high fat foods?
7 Is your cholesterol beyond you would prefer it to be?
8 On most days, does the level of stress in your life feel out of control?
9 Do you find it a challenge to urge the recommended quantity of exercise? (e g , 30 minutes, most days of the week)
10 Do you've got issue sleeping three nights or additional every week? (e g hassle falling asleep, waking up frequently in the middle of the night, come to life too early and have hassle falling back to sleep)
Well, how did you do? If you answered from one to 3 queries with a "yes," you are well on your manner down the pathway to sensible health However you continue to have a little bit of fine tuning to actually get pleasure from optimal health If you answered four to 5 questions "yes," you are in all probability like so several Americans trying to balance the strain of labor, home, and family in nowadays's stress-crammed world Currently is the time to start out on your personal pathway to optimal health If you had six or seven "yes" answers, you are in all probability burning the candle at both ends, and it's extremely time to regain control of your life and your health currently, by improving your diet, adding exercise, managing stress, and adding the proper supplements to your daily regimen
Currently For Some Real Smart News!
Just imagine if you'll improve your health and create a business for yourself to generate a substantial income for yourself at the identical time Well it can be done! My wife and I've got done simply that We tend to have found a corporation with an exquisite record within the health and wellness industry After all, they have been around since 1956 and they're still going strong! Their product line is tremendous, not only with their vitamins and supplements They also have household cleaning product, beauty product and weight loss products If having your own business is not for you, have a look at the products that can improve your life while not a doubt When a amount of your time you only would possibly be therefore impressed that you will want to share them with your family and friends too! Thanks for reading this article I hope that it's been useful to you
Dorish Hill has been writing articles online for nearly 2 years now. Not only does this author specialize in Supplements, you can also check out her latest website about: Suncatchers Which reviews and lists the best Christmas Suncatchers

description.hltext_display: Iphone-sovellus mittaa pulssin korvastasi
description.content:
Emma Kauppi, Tuomas Hyytiä, 10:38
Mitä jos Iphonella voisi musiikkia kuunnellessa mitata sydämen sykettä? Avaruusteknologian avulla se on kohta mahdollista.
Sveitsiläisyritys CSEM:n kehittämä Pulsear-niminen laite mahdollistaa sydämen sykkeen mittaamisen korvanapin avulla.
Kuulokkeeseen upotettu laite käyttää infrapunasignaaleja sydämen lyöntitiheyden mittaamiseen. Informaation keräämiseksi se lähettää infrapunasignaaleja korvan kudosten läpi. Pieni valodiodi tallentaa tuloksen ja lähettää tiedot kuulokejohdon kautta puhelimeen liitettyyn laitteeseen, joka laskee sykkeen mittaustulosten perusteella.
"Monet kuuntelevat musiikkia kuntoillessaan, ja monet myös pitävät sykemittarin lähetintä epämukavana", kertoo tohtori Andrea Ridolfi CSEM-yhtiöstä, "joten keksimme mitata sykkeen korvan kautta."
Ratkaisu avaruusteknologiasta
Pulsear-laite julkistettiin ensi kerran vuonna 2008, mutta tekniikka ei ollut vielä silloin tarpeeksi hienostunutta. Suunnitellessaan ESA:n astronauteille monimutkaista anturia yhtiö joutui kehittämään tekniikkaansa, ja niin syntyi uusi versio Pulsearista.
Tekniikkaa aiotaan käyttää ainakin Iphone-sovelluksessa. Sovellus tuo sydämen lyöntitiheyden näytölle, ja sen avulla voi vertailla vaikkapa tämänpäiväistä juoksulenkkiä viimeviikkoiseen.
Nykyinen prototyyppi mittaa vain sydämen sykettä, mutta tulevaisuudessa laitetta voidaan yrityksen mukaan helposti soveltaa muidenkin elintoimintojen, kuten veren happipitoisuuden, mittaukseen.

description.hltext_display: 姚明退役？全世界都在等待巨人的决定
description.content:
﹃姚明左脚骨折赛季报销追踪﹄
火箭队医昨日透露，手术或退役都由姚明定夺
昨日，本应是火箭队或者姚明本人甚至是姚之队宣布“决定”的时间，最终却音讯全� ，可见这是一个多么复杂而艰难的决定。而当下的情形是，美国各大体育网站的头条早已不是姚明，甚至在休斯顿本地网站上，提到的也更多的是关于火箭战胜国王比赛的消息。火箭队的装备经理托尼却找人托话给姚明称，“我会继续帮他把衣柜整理好。”但还有一些网站，则已经开始对姚明的职业生涯“十大时刻”进行盘点……
本来该在昨日公布的医疗方案，至今迟迟没有公布，这或许不是火箭队医和医疗团队的问题，� 为不管动不动手术，甚至是退不退役，最终决定权都在姚明本人手里。
“具体治疗方案可能还没有这么快出来，由谁来公布这个我不清楚，这个得由姚明自己决定。”在火箭出征客战国王之前，火箭队医这� �对采访他的记者表示，关于最终决定权在谁手里？他回答得非常坚决——“姚明。这个得由他自己来决定。”当然，除此之外，姚明最近的精神状况大家也非常关心，“他很好啊，刚刚还和他联系了，谈笑风生，状况很好。我和他每天都联系，在一起聊天，他的状况很好，没有什么可担心的。他是一个性� �很坚强的人”。 就在昨日，《体坛周报》多年贴身采访姚明的记者以《GAMEOVER》为题采写了最新一期的报道，他透露姚明最近心情非常轻松，开始玩起了游戏，但文中却处处透露了“姚明职业生涯结束”的信号。离姚明最近的记者都觉得姚明要退役了，难道这事是真的？网友们从昨天上午就开始了热烈的讨论。但就和火箭队医说的一� �——一切都要由姚明来决定。而我们只能祝福并等待着。
姚明能说“再见”吗
除了一天前简短的表态之外，姚明目前还保持着沉默，姚之队也没有任何表态。只有火箭队医给大家透了一点内情——“一切，都由姚明自己来决定。”但，姚明真能为自己的前途做主吗？
目前的形势表面上看来，是一个非常简单的选择题。A选项是姚明接受手术，然后在半年或者一年之后归来，拿到一份500万美元左右的小合同，坚持在火箭或者是其他愿意收留姚明的球队打下去，直到他实在打不动为止。这个选择，或许会让他退役之后变成真正的“步履蹒跚”。B选项，不做手术，退役，静养。一年之后，以一个健康人的身体，继续他除了上场比赛之外的篮球生涯。这� �做，他也不用担心后半生瘸着腿走路。不过，姚明真要退役，那要跳起来投反对票的人可太多了。
首先不干的应该是赞助商，特别是刚刚签下合同的赞助商。用最通俗的理解来看，姚明本赛季的归来，本应该是他们收获的季节，但现在很显然，这和他们的预期差距太大了。不光本赛季泡汤，连以后的合作也基本上别谈了。除了赞助商之外，姚之队也绝对是热锅上的蚂蚁，如果姚明轰然倒下，那么姚之队的存在形式，也必将经历一场重大的改变，这绝对也是他们不想看到的。当然，还有国家荣誉，NBA中国市场等等原� 在困扰着姚明。可以这� �说，姚明退役，将让� 数人的美梦瞬间� �碎。这些问题，聪明的姚明一定比谁都清楚。但即便这� �，三缄其口之后的何去何从，依然要他自己来决定，只是不知道他最终的决定是代表着谁。
休斯顿“阴谋”？
就在姚明的决定迟迟没有出炉的这个节骨眼上，《休斯敦纪事报》的杰罗姆·所罗门却还要跳出来大放厥词。昨天，据国内媒体报道，杰罗姆撰文称他从火箭内部得知，火箭� �本没有� 姚明挣到多少钱，每年不过400万美元而已。
“30岁的他这个赛季已告终结，由于这已经是他合同的最后一年，所以说他作为火箭球员的生涯很有可能就走到头了。姚明是相当有价值的球员，当然这是指他健康的时候。不过如果他这个赛季再也� 法上场，那他整整两个赛季里就只出现了5场比赛。”杰罗姆首先用� 乎肯定的语气，猜测了姚明即将退役的决定。
在他看来，火箭肯定很愿意考虑一下交换走姚明和他即将到期的合同，毫� 疑问这是不可能发生的事情，没有哪支队伍会愿意接受一个支离� �碎然后� 法带来任何价值的大块头。 而关于姚明的价值，他的一段话或许将很大程度上刷新大家的观念——“不管� 愿不愿意相信，火箭并没有� 为姚明的中国元� 挣到� 想象中的钱，队内知情人士透露他带来的收益大约是一年400万美元，这和他1700万美元的工资或者福布斯统计的4.7亿美元身价相比不值一提。” 虽然他这个消息将姚明的身价变得� 乎“一文不值”，但他还是不忘在最后替姚明感到惋惜，“如果他能够继续在火箭的职业生涯绝不会是令人失望的，并且毫� 疑问是个惊喜。”

description.hltext_display: 手机下载量全球第12 大马人爱玩偷车赛车游戏
description.content:
●南洋商报
（吉隆坡21日讯）全球移动传媒公司BuzzCity的调查显示，大马人喜欢在他们的手机玩偷车和赛车游戏，下载量全球排名第12。
这家公司在上个月进行的调查报告指，大马人最爱通过手机软件下载侠盗飞车2（Grand Theft Auto2）、“3D Street Racing”、地下狂飙（Underground Racer）以及3D极速飘移（3D Need For Drifting）游戏。上个月共有9万7000名用户下载6万7000个相关游戏。
根据该公司旗下的免费手机游戏门户网站Djuzz，公布11月调查结果，全球共下载760万个游戏，增长17%。
尽管大马用户游览网页的次数比别人多，但通常都是浏览更多的相关内容才下载，因此大马用户下载游戏的几率较低，平均每户下载0.74个游戏。

description.hltext_display: La Gala del Deporte Cántabro homenajea a Del Bosque y a la Selección
description.content:
El seleccionador nacional Vicente Del Bosque recibió el I Premio Juan Manuel Gozalo y al combinado nacional español se le concedió el Premio Especial, por su histórico triunfo en el Mundial de Sudáfrica.
La Gala del Deporte Cántabro 2010, celebrada en Santander, estuvo marcada por el recuerdo al periodista fallecido Juan Manuel Gozalo. El seleccionador nacional Vicente del Bosque recibió el galardón Juan Manuel Gozalo, que se entregó por primera vez este año, en memoria del periodista. Se trata de un premio que, además de la trayectoria profesional del premiado, le distingue por sus cualidades humanas.
Del Bosque también recogió el Premio Especial concedido a la Selección Española, por la consecución de la Copa del Mundo en Sudáfrica.
Y es que la Asociación de Prensa Deportiva de Cantabria (APDC) premió a los más brillantes de la temporada, a los más comprometidos con el deporte y a aquellos con más futuro.

description.hltext_display: TIB chief welcomes open financial books
description.content:
Repeating his view about a controversy that continues to linger, the chief of one of the most prosperous native bands in B.C. said he has no problem opening its financial books.
Tk’emlup Indian Band Chief Shane Gottfriedson said he supports a resolution by the Assembly of First Nations (AFN) to make public audits, salaries and expenses of its chiefs and band councils.
“I’m a leader in one of the most progressive communities in Canada and I don’t have a problem with openness and transparency,” he said.
The move by the AFN comes after a report by the Canadian Taxpayers Federation suggested dozens of chiefs were making more than the average salary of a provincial premier, including one chief who is paid an annual wage of nearly $1 million.
Gottfriedson said it does raise eyebrows when a salary could come close to the $1-million mark, but added it is not fair for him to judge what’s right or wrong.
“People need to be reasonable in what they receive in payment,” he said, noting his annual salary is $58,000.
Gottfriedson called the CTF report, which was first released in November, unfair.
He said there is a lot of misunderstanding on what First Nations leaders do and what they get paid, noting chiefs, unlike federal and provincial politicians, don’t have a pension to fall back on.
Gottfriedson said full disclosure will likely help put an end to the controversy.
He said the CTF might want to look into how much the federal government spends on duplication of services already provided by individual bands.
Other chiefs in the region have deplored the CTF study, including Chief Wayne Christian, spokesperson for the Shuswap Nation Tribal Council, who argued the federation is playing “fast and loose with the facts.”
He said the CTF erred in its use of information from the Department of Indian Affairs, claiming the federation essentially doubled what B.C. chiefs are actually paid.
The federal government has also waded into the issue, as a private member’s bill was introduced this fall that would require bands to publicly disclose salaries and expenses.
TEXT
COMMENTS

description.hltext_display: Usain bolts
description.content:
IT takes a lot to scare Olympic sprint champion Usain Bolt.
But the Olympic world record holder and gold medal winner over 100 and 200 metres, admitted to being more than a little rattled when he got behind the wheel of a Ferrari this week.
Bolt paid a VIP visit to Ferrari’s headquarters where he was able to test-drive the Ferrari 458 Italia and 599 GTB Fiorano on Ferrari’s private test track, Fiorano.
The sprinter started as an excited passenger next to the Ferrari test-drivers Dario Benuzzi and Raffaele De Simone, while later on he completed some laps himself behind the wheel.
At the end of the day he couldn’t hide his love for the 458 Italia.
“It’s a little bit like me, very reactive and determined,” Bolt said.
Bolt joked later that his heart was racing when test-driver Dario Benuzzi showed him how to control the car on a wet track.
“I was really scared, but it was a good scare. I’m excited like a child,” he said.

description.hltext_display: 震惊！豆浆“错喝”会变成慢性自杀
description.content: 豆浆是将大豆用水泡后磨碎、过滤、煮沸而成。豆浆营养非常丰富，且易于消化吸收。豆浆是防治高血脂、高血压、动肪硬化、缺铁性贫血、气喘等疾病的理想饮食。 鲜豆浆四季都可饮用。春秋饮豆浆，滋阴润燥，调和阴阳;夏饮豆浆，消热防暑，生津解渴;冬饮豆浆，祛寒暖胃，滋养进补。其实，除了� 统的黄豆浆外，豆浆还有很多花� �，红枣、枸杞、绿豆、百合等都可以成为豆浆的配料。 1、豆浆性质偏寒，消化不良、嗝气和肾功能不好的人，最好少喝豆浆。由于豆浆是由大豆制成的，而大豆里面含嘌呤成分很高，且属于寒性食物，所以有痛风症状、乏力、体虚、精神疲倦等症状的虚寒体质者都不适宜饮用豆浆。 另外，豆浆在酶的作用下能产气，所以腹胀、腹泻的人最好别喝豆浆。另外，急性胃炎和慢性浅表性胃炎者不宜食用豆制品，以免刺激胃酸分泌过多� 重病情，或者引起胃� 胀气。 2、常喝豆浆注意补锌，豆类中含有抑制剂、皂角� 和外源凝集� ，这些都是对人体不好的物质。对付它们的最好方法就是将豆浆煮熟，长期食用豆浆的人不要忘记补充微量元� 锌。 3、豆浆一定不要与红霉� 等抗生� 一起服用，� 为二者会发生拮抗化学反应，喝豆浆与服用抗生� 的间隔时间最好在1个小时以上。 4、忌不彻底煮开：� 为生豆浆里含有皂� 、胰蛋白酶抑制物等有害物质，未煮熟就饮用，会发生恶心、呕吐、腹泻等中毒症状。豆浆不但必须要煮开，而且在煮豆浆时还必须要敞开锅盖，这是� 为只有敞开锅盖才可以让豆浆里的有害物质随着水蒸气挥发掉。 5、忌冲入鸡蛋：� 为鸡蛋中的黏性蛋白(鸡蛋清)会与豆浆里的胰蛋白酶结合，产生不易被人体吸收的物质，使鸡蛋和豆浆均失去原有的营养价值。 6、空腹饮豆浆：最好不要让宝宝空腹饮豆浆，豆浆里的蛋白质大都会在人体内转化为热量而被消化掉，营养成分不能被宝宝充分吸收。 7、忌放红糖：红糖里有机酸较多，如醋酸、乳酸等，它们能与豆浆里的蛋白质和钙质结合，产生变性物及醋酸钙、乳酸钙等块状物，这不仅有损豆浆的营养价值，而且也影响豆浆里所含营养� 的吸收。 8、忌用保温瓶储存豆浆：把豆浆装在保温瓶内，会使瓶内的细菌在温度适宜的条件下大量繁殖，3～4小时后，就会使豆浆变质。 9、忌与药同饮：有些药物如红霉� 等抗生� 类药物会� �坏豆浆里的营养成分，甚至产生副作用，危害健康。 （编辑：童言）

description.hltext_display: 10 Healthy Habits For a Healthy New Year
description.content:
Author : Doris Hill
Are you trying to boost your life? Get healthier? Feel higher? Here are 10 great, healthy habits you can adopt this year for a happier, healthier, and doubtless longer life
1 Cut back stress Stress affects your health during a very negative way It affects your immune system It affects your ability to sleep and to digest your food properly It causes you to gain weight and impacts on pain If you're wanting for one thing you'll do higher for yourself and your health this year, it'd be to search out ways of reducing your stress Stress reduction tools are simple to learn and produce relaxation Relaxation reverses the impact of stress on your body
2 Drink a lot of water, not simply as a result of water is sweet for you but as a result of when you drink more water, you stop drinking soda or alternative sugary drinks Diet soda is not a lot of higher because it's stuffed with artificial sweeteners and chemicals They're excessively sweet and create your tastebuds crave excessively sweet foods
3 Walk/exercise Adding exercise to your day adds years to your life You do not need to run a marathon or become iron man triathletes Walking for 30 minutes every day is an excellent start Plus, you may simply feel higher as your brain produces a lot of neurotransmitters for positive emotion - nature's "feel sensible " molecules!
4 Get your vitamins A well-balanced diet is great; but a multi-vitamin is a superb tool for a little additional insurance, since few people consistently eat the right foods at the right time in the right amounts
5 Eat a lot of fruits and veggies It goes while not saying that eating your fruits and veggies is nice for your health Add one further serving of fruits and veggies every day to your diet every week till you're eating at least five-seven or additional servings a day You'll be well on your manner to improving several aspects of your health
6 Eat less saturated fat Instead of ordering a burger or a steak at dinner, contemplate chicken or fish Have a no-meat day once a week Use a lot of olive oil and canola oil for cooking Eat low-fat or no-fat dairy Avoid trans-fats and saturated fats found in butter and a few margarine spreads
7 Eat less sugar Sugar causes a speedy rise in blood sugar and an initial feeling of well being It conjointly causes a speedy drop in blood sugar and a sense of no energy Then you eat a lot of sugar and the cycle repeats itself This roller coaster of sugar highs and lows wreaks havoc on your body The solution, eat less sugar, refined and processed foods Build your complex carbohydrates whole grains, beans, yams, sweet potatoes and long-grain rice This is known as low glycemic impact eating
8 Fish oil Fish oil and omega three fatty acids reduce inflammation in our bodies It could help cut back cholesterol and could facilitate shield your brain against degenerative diseases Take a supplement or eat a minimum of a pair of servings of cold-water, fatty fish twice a week
9 Head to the doctor Are there regular tests you should be taking to check for hereditary diseases or preventative measures that are acceptable to your age? Cancer screenings are the most common, however cholesterol checks, blood pressure readings and blood glucose levels are all important Take the steps necessary to determine your doctor this year Schedule it around your birthday every year as a reminder
10 Laugh Laughing reduces stress and puts you during a positive frame of mind It's scientifically proven that stress incorporates a direct effect on your health Laughter counter-acts the effects of stress Laugh, you will be glad you did!
Dorish Hill has been writing articles online for nearly 2 years now. Not only does this author specialize in Supplements, you can also check out her latest website about: Suncatchers Which reviews and lists the best Heart Suncatchers

description.hltext_display: Two Die In Gas Leak At Dr Reddys Plant; Stock Recovers From Day's Low
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Two employees have died in a gas leakage incident at the Bollaram facility of Pharma giant Dr Reddys Lab in Hyderabad today, media reports said.
Reacting to the news, shares of Dr Reddy's tumbled over 4% to a low of Rs. 1,618 earlier in the session before recouping most of its loss. Currently, shares of the company are down 0.10%, with around 1.6 lakh shares changing hands versus a two-week daily average volume of 0.29 lakh shares.
Likewise, on the National Stock Exchange, Dr Reddy's shares are trading down 0.12% at Rs.1,684.60 after falling to a low of 1,616.10 a few hours before. The benchmark Sensex index, meanwhile, is posting a modest 0.23% gain.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com

description.hltext_display: Sample questions from Vocational Aptitude Battery
description.content:
Sample questions from the Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery:
Dana receives $30 for her birthday and $15 for cleaning the garage. If she spends $16 on a CD, how much money does she have left?
A. $29
B. $27
C. $24
D. $12
Ephemeral most nearly means:
A. short-lived
B. mythical
C. dead
D. exceptional
Buddhism is a religion that must be viewed from many angles. Its original form, as preached by Gautama in India and developed in the early years succeeding and as embodied in the sacred literature of early Buddhism, isn't representative of the actual Buddhism of any land today.
According to this passage:
A. Most Buddhists live in India.
B. Buddhist teachings have changed over the years.
C. Buddhism draws its teachings from early Christianity.
D. Buddhist temples can be found in any land of the world.
If 2 plus x equals 4, what is the value of x?
A. 6
B. 2
C. 4
D. 1/2
Answers: 1) A, 2) A, 3) B, 4) B

description.hltext_display: World Bank approves $1.5 billion for rural roads
description.content: Washington: The World Bank on Tuesday approved a $1.5 billion Credit and Loan for India's Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY) aimed towards improving rural accessibility of roads. The new project will concentrate on the states of Himachal Pradesh, Jharkhand, Meghalaya, Punjab, Rajasthan, Uttarakhand, and Uttar Pradesh, the Bank said in a statement.Over the next five years, the project will aim to provide these states with an average connectivity of around 91 per cent by constructing 24,200 km of all-weather roads to benefit an estimated 6.1 million people. The project will also develop a system for maintaining these roads in good condition over the long term.

description.hltext_display: 枪手近距离朝头部射2枪 菜市场东主遭枪杀
description.content:
●南洋商报
（吉隆坡21日讯）一名蔬菜批发市场东主今晚在休业后，在车上与女友等候员工登车准备离开时，遭枪手在近距离朝头部连射两枪当场毙命。
这起枪杀命案在今晚9时30分，发生在莎阿南与梳邦再也交界处的旧三英里路一个停车场。死者为51岁的T & T批发市场的东主。
车内等候员工关门
雪州刑事调查主任莫哈末阿南在现场向记者说，事发当时，该批发市场正准备关门休业，死者与31岁的女友前往取车，在车上等候两名员工关门后一起离开。
他说，两名神秘枪手骑摩托接近死者的冠美丽轿车，后座骑士一下摩托车，就拨枪朝死者头部开枪，死者中弹直接毙命在轿车内，其女友未受到伤害。
他指出，枪手相信是一位华裔男子，得逞后与同党骑摩托逃走。

description.hltext_display: TCS bags Hilton Worldwide deal
description.content:
MUMBAI: IT bellwether (TCS) said it has entered into a multi-year agreement to accelerate hospitality firm Hilton Worldwide's technology strategy as part of the 'Hilton Worldwide Innovation Collaborative' initiative.
The Innovative Collaborative initiative aims to evolve Hilton Worldwide's technology infrastructure and accelerate innovation across the company's portfolio of ten brands, TCS said in a filing on the . However, the company did not disclose the financial details of the agreement.
"This relationship confirms our leadership position as the long-term IT partner best equipped to help global corporations transform their businesses using our full-service capabilities and domain knowledge," TCS CEO & MD N Chandrasekaran said.
TCS will leverage its extensive experience on large transformational initiatives and modernising legacy systems to help develop a platform that keeps Hilton Worldwide at the forefront of the business and technology landscape.
TCS will manage Hilton Worldwide's corporate suite of applications in the areas of property information management, learning management, quality assurance, business intelligence, financial systems and intranet applications.
"As a partner in our Innovation Collaborative, TCS has demonstrated its commitment to help us meet our business objectives and continues to deliver world-class services," Hilton Worldwide Chief Information Officer Robert Webb said.
Hilton Worldwide is a leading global hospitality company and its properties range from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels.
Its brands are comprise more than 3,600 hotels and 600,000 rooms in 82 countries and include the Waldorf Astoria Hotels and Resorts, , Hilton Hotels and Resorts, Doubletree, , Hilton Garden Inn, Hampton Hotels, Homewood Suites by Hilton, Home2 Suites by Hilton and Hilton Grand Vacations.

event_or_fact.property: As a partner in our Innovation Collaborative, TCS has demonstrated its commitment to help us meet our business objectives and continues to deliver world-class services

description.hltext_display: Московский "Локомотив" приобрел вратаря сборной Белоруссии
description.content:
Московский "Локомотив" сделал второе приобретение в это межсезонье. Ряды железнодорожников пополнил вратарь "Ростова" и сборной Белоруссии Антон Амельченко. Он подписал с "Локомотивом" трехлетний контракт и провел первую тренировку со своими новыми товарищами по команде.
"Локомотив" - это новый этап и однозначно шаг вперед в моей карьере, - сказал Амельченко. - Я отдаю себе отчет, что сейчас первым номером команды является бразилец Гилерме. Но просто не бывает нигде - будем конкурировать".
Напомним, что ранее "Локомотив" взял нападающего "Локомотива-2", лучшего бомбардира второго дивизиона Артура Саркисова.

description.hltext_display: 低成本集成电路功率放大器电路原理图
description.author: nana
description.content:
作者：nana 来源：本站整理 发布时间：2010-12-22 16:22:28 [收 藏] [评 论]
电路特点：
此放大器适于工薪族的初级发烧友们自制。它有以下特点：
2、电源滤波电容采用10只2200UF普通电解电容，使它们的等效串联电感及内阻比10000UF音响专用电解电容都要低。
3、使用CMOS集成电路CD4069作前置放大，如图5-53所示。曾经用NE5532作前置放大，因为闭环增益只有2倍，发生高频自激而失败，故改为CD4069，一举成功。
4、本机左声采用反相放大可使两只LM3886均衡地向正负电源萦取电流，电源电压始终对称，从而改善音质，使低音深沉有力，中音明亮，如图5-54所示。
5、采用柔性削峰电路，使后级不易过载，不易烧毁音箱，且增加了悦耳的偶次谐波。
6、本机LM3886的反馈方式为无源伺服式，减弱了大容量负反馈隔直电容对音质的影响。
7、本机采用两只音量电位器，可以改变削峰的程度，以改变音色。还可以在小音量下欣赏颇具“胆”味的音乐。
元器件选择：
所有元件均用正品，按图中数值选取。变压器可选用200W环牛。容量不小于100UF的电解电容可选用普通CD11型；容量小于1UF的可用涤纶或独石电容，经济条件好的可用无感聚丙烯电容，未标明耐压的均可用63V的；除标明外。所有电阻均选用0.25W五色环金属膜电阻。3只发光二极管均用红色LED。L可用0.66MM漆包线在22MM脱胎而成。散热器总表面积约1000CM的2次方，可用厚度不小于1MM的铝合金板下脚料制作，将横截面为100MM*25MM的铝合金板截成10CM长的两段，一只LM3886用一段，散热效果很好。LM3886的选取视机壳材料而定：金属机壳可用LM3886TF，木质或塑料外壳可用LM3886T。
注意事项：
1、本机输出端子左声道接地端为正极，而右声道LM3886输出端为正极，连接音箱时不要搞错。
2、若不用柔性削峰电路，请将1S1断开。
试听表明，它的音质比韩国三星组合音响的音质好多了。
看来，低价也可靓声！

description.hltext_display: Store deal for affordable homes
description.content: Ipswich Borough Council has come to an "in principle agreement" with supermarket giant Tesco over a £70m redevelopment and regeneration project near the town's docks. Tesco is keen to have a supermarket branch in the area and has offered £4m towards the regeneration and finance to build 30 affordable homes. The deal is contained in research by the BBC into the growth of the 'big four' supermarket companies - ASDA, Sainsbury's, Tesco and Morrisons - in the UK. The BBC contacted every UK planning authority to discover how many shops from the big four received planning permission between 1 November 2008 and 1 November 2010. The research includes applications for new stores as well as for lit advertising signs, an indicator of a store which does not need full planning permission because it has previously been used for retail purposes. In the two years to 1 November, 39 new supermarkets were given planning permission across the East and if all current applications are approved at least 32 more will go ahead. The research shows the big four companies are competing for space in Suffolk towns. But all are willing to co-operate in many different ways with local authorities and community groups to win planning approval. In Suffolk at least seven applications were made by the top four in the two years to 1 November 2010 and four were approved, creating extra floor space of 20,479 square metres. Morrisons was successful with an application in Stowmarket, Sainsbury's in Mildenhall and Tesco in Ipswich and Woodbridge. The supermarkets answer opponents to the developments by saying that the scale of their developments are complementary to growing populations. Tesco has made a formal planning application for a site in Grafton Way in Ipswich and have included an offer of a section 106 agreement. The planning act allows a local authority to enter into legally binding agreements as a condition of granting planning permission. This is called a section 106 agreement. These agreements are usually a way of addressing matters that make a development acceptable in planning terms. "They are increasingly used to support the provision of services and infrastructure, such as highways, recreational facilities, education, health and affordable housing," a government statement said. A spokesman for Ipswich Borough Council said: "The council has supported the principle of this application for a major development between the town centre and the multimillion-pound Waterfront refurbishment. "In common with any large application there are detailed issues still being discussed. "The headlines of the section 106 agreement have been agreed but it is not appropriate to comment in detail until contracts are signed and planning permission is formally issued."

description.hltext_display: Ill. Santa inducted into hall of fame
description.content:
(UPI via COMTEX) -- The Santa Claus Hall of Fame in Indiana said an Illinois man is to be the first living Santa to be inducted.
Phil Wenz, 48, who said he has been dressing as Santa since he was 4 and got his first job as St. Nick when he was teenager, said the hall of fame in Santa Claus, Ind., called him Monday and said he would be among the first 14 inductees, The (Arlington Heights, Ill.) Daily Herald reported Tuesday.
Wenz, who served as the jolly red elf for more than 20 years at Santa's Village in East Dundee, is the only one of the inductees who is still living. The others include the first department store Santa and several men born in the 1800s.
"The 13 other gentlemen have already passed on, so it's an honor," Wenz said. "It still hasn't sunk in yet."
"I'm 48 years old, and I've been playing Santa for 44 years. That's kind of bizarre," he said.
Copyright 2010 United Press International, Inc. (UPI). Any reproduction, republication, redistribution and/or modification of any UPI content is expressly prohibited without UPI's prior written consent.

description.hltext_display: Święta za pasem, kryzys zostanie za progiem?
description.content:
Wczorajsza sesja zakończyła się w Europie i Ameryce wzrostami indeksów, niepopartymi jednak obrotem. Należy wierzyć, że inwestorzy czekają w blokach, aby przed końcem roku dokonać jeszcze ostatnich zmian w portfelu ? sprzyjać temu oprócz aspektów podatkowych mogą dane makro i ?window dressing? funduszy inwestycyjnych, które nie będą chciały dopuścić do spadku indeksów na koniec roku. Nie najlepsze dane z frontu walki z zadłużeniem krajów UE, w szczególności kolejne informacje o możliwym obniżeniu ratingu Grecji do poziomu spekulacyjnego, nie powinny przełożyć się do końca roku na spadki indeksów ? dobrą końcówkę roku powinny mieć spółki surowcowe, z których KGHM na GPW był wczoraj liderem wzrostów w ślad za wzrostem miedzi do rekordowego poziomu 9400 dolarów.
Wracając na nasze podwórko nie można nie zauważyć rosnącego optymizmu w danych makro, począwszy od ciągłego podwyższania prognoz wzrostu gospodarczego Polski przez kolejne instytucje finansowe po wczorajszy komunikat o deficycie budżetowym niższym o 9% od zakładanego w ustawie budżetowej. Co prawda rosnący w siłę słabością euro frank może niepokoić w kontekście dużej jego ekspozycji w kredytach walutowych, jednak kolejne polityka KNF w ich zakresie powinna ją zahamować i tym samym zmniejszyć zagrożenie powstania złych długów dla banków. Dziś RPP podejmie decyzję w sprawie stóp procentowych, jednak analitycy spodziewają się pierwszej podwyżki dopiero w I kwartale przyszłego roku, tak więc każda decyzja inna niż pozostawienie ich na dotychczasowym poziomie byłaby dużym zaskoczeniem, szczególnie że wczorajszy odczyt inflacji nie pokazał żadnego zagrożenia.
var _r = document.referrer ? encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) : ''; var _w = encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); var _e = document.inputEncoding ? document.inputEncoding : document.charset; document.write('\/script'); Tak więc wobec sennie wyglądającego wykresu, który nie daje żadnych technicznych sygnałów, nadzieję na znaczniejszy obrót można pokładać w fakcie zbliżającego się końca roku i związanych z tym z jednej strony chęci zamknięcia stratnych pozycji przez inwestorów indywidualnych i podciągnięcia indeksów jak najwyżej przez zarządzających. Na ile siły te zrównoważą się nawzajem ? zobaczymy. Każda nierównowaga może skutkować znaczniejszym wahnięciem się indeksów. Wzrostów na giełdach w Europie raczej nie będą napędzać giełdy w Azji, które dziś zakończyły notowania neutralnie ? Nikkei spadł o 0,23% na wieść o gorszym od oczekiwanego bilansie handlu zagranicznego spowodowanym silniejszym niż zakładano wzrostem importu.
Dziś rano jen przestał umacniać się do euro i dolara na fali wzrostów na azjatyckich giełdach. Złotówka porusza się w wąskim przedziale wobec euro i dolara ? odpowiednio wokół 3,99 i 3,04. Ropa pnie się wciąż w górę na fali oczekiwań związanych z ożywieniem w amerykańskiej gospodarce i zwiększającym się w związku z tym popytem ? dziś rano cena baryłki słodkiej ropy na giełdzie NYMEX przekroczyła 90 USD.

description.hltext_display: Informativo en Radio Federación, 21/12/2010
description.content:
En el informativo del martes, los usuarios podrán conocer todos los detalles sobre la apertura del Museo de la Selección, la previa de la jornada de Copa y un avance de las declaraciones de los Presidentes de las distintas Federaciones Territoriales, que se irán publicando a lo largo de estas Navidades.
Este martes el Museo de la Selección ha abierto sus puertas al público, tras tres años de intenso trabajo. Además, Vicente Del Bosque será premiado, junto al Presidente de la Federación, Ángel María Villar, en la Gala del Deporte de Arganda del Rey. Pero este no ha sido el único reconocimiento al técnico salmantino, ya que también se le ha homenajeado en Cantabria.
Por otro lado, podrán escuchar declaraciones de Vicente Temprado, Antonio Escribano y Santiago Arostegui, en representación de los distintos Presidentes de las Federaciones Territoriales que han concedido entrevistas para Radio Federación, a publicar estas Navidades.
Para escucharlo, pincha aquí.

description.hltext_display: Jeder Sechste über 65-Jährige in Bayern von Armut bedroht
Vettori to miss Pakistan series
description.content:
Black Caps skipper Daniel Vettori will sit out New Zealand's three-match Twenty20 series against Pakistan as he looks to recover from a back complaint but the national selectors have included three new faces in the 14-man squad released this afternoon.
Australian-born Canterbury batsman Dean Brownlie, 18-year-old Central Districts quick Adam Milne and Wellington all-rounder Luke Woodcock have all been included in the squad that will be captained by Ross Taylor.
Convenor of selectors Mark Greatbatch, who on Monday was dumped as national coach, said the decision to include three rookies in the squad for the series which starts on Boxing Day came on the back of their domestic form.
"Dean Brownlie and Luke Woodcock have both enjoyed very good domestic form over the last couple of seasons and richly deserve their opportunity," Greatbatch said.
"Adam Milne is a promising young bowler and we are keen to give him some early exposure in international cricket.
"He is a young up-and-comer with the potential to have a big impact in international cricket for many years. Twenty20 is the ideal format for the new guys to get some international experience and exposure."
Wicketkeeper Brendon McCullum, like Vettori, has been struggling with a back complaint and will undergo a fitness test later this week to determine whether he will play in Auckland on Sunday.
Meanwhile, Canterbury's Reece Young has been given an opportunity to don the gloves in the two-test series that will follow the T20s.
The selectors also announced their 13-man test squad this afternoon and, as expected, Gareth Hopkins, long considered McCullum's understudy, has been dumped.
"We have kept faith with the majority of the squad who performed well in the test matches against India and are wanting to build on the positive steps the team took in that series," Greatbatch said.
"One new face is wicketkeeper Reece Young who gets a chance after performing well over a number of seasons at domestic and NZA level. It's disappointing for Gareth Hopkins who misses out on selection.
"Jeetan Patel and BJ Watling are the other players who were part of the larger squad in India not to make this group.
"We believe it's a well balanced squad and we look forward to a competitive Test series against a very good Pakistan side."
For the World Cup, which will take place in the sub-continent in late February, a 15-man squad will be named on January 19.
But as per International Cricket Council requirements, the selectors also released their preliminary 30-man squad.
The squad includes seven uncapped one-day members - Brent Arnel, Doug Bracewell, Rob Nicol, Brownlie, Milne, Woodcock and Young
"We will continue to closely watch the form of all players involved over the coming month," Greatbatch said.
"A number of uncapped guys who have excelled domestically made the squad. We believe it represents the best one-day cricketers we have in New Zealand.
"There is genuine competition for places as we look to select final 15 for the World Cup and that's exciting.
"From this group we believe we can select a team that, if it plays to its potential, is capable of and being competitive at the World Cup."

description.hltext_display: Plan for Kerala Tour and Enjoy Holiday in Lap of Mother Nature
description.content:
Scintillating charm of the scenic natural beauty, cascading waterfalls, musical streams, well organised tea gardens, mist kissed hills, enticing tourism attractions and on top the pleasant climatic conditions make Kerala truly a paradise on earth. And no wonder its scenic splendor and the magnetizing charm have made it rightly define as Evergreen Paradise on Earth.
Kerala is a true splendor and is one of the most visited state in India by tourists and holiday seekers not only from India but from across the corner of the globe. Kerala in its proximity has several magnificent attractions and all are amazingly blessed with enigmatic tourism attractions that include the scintillating backwaters the wonder formed by the brackish lagoons, fresh lakes and rivers, cascading waterfalls and streams. Kerala backwaters are true and are the major attraction of Kerala tourism which scintillating charm and splendor attracts thousand and hundreds of tourists from all the nook and corner of the world.
Apart from all Kerala also has interesting green hill stations blessed with enigmatic natural beauty and attractions that never fail to impress the heart of the tourists and honeymooners. Here enjoy wonderful time with your dear ones exploring the true beauty of nature and several interesting sightseeing spots on your visit to Kerala hill stations. Some of the top visited hill stations in the state of Kerala are Munnar, Idduki, Wayanad, Devikulam, etc. These hill stations are amazingly blessed with scintillating natural beauty and attractions that never fail to impress the heart of the visitors and holiday seekers coming from across the corner of the globe.
In additional Kerala also have several interesting wildlife parks and sanctuaries which are home to varied species of animals and birds. Kerala is also famous for its pristine and secluded beaches which are also the hot holiday destinations in Kerala visited by tourists and honeymooners from across the corner of the globe. It is also rich in traditional and cultural which give tourists an opportunity to treasure remarkable experince to relish in forever. These entire attractions have made Kerala the top holiday destination in India that magnets huge number of holiday makers from all the nook and corner of the globe.
So what are you waiting for? Kerala splendor and magnificence does not finish here but it's just the beginning. Once you visit you will be awe-struck with its rustic charm, inspiring temples, colorful fairs and festivals, ayurvedic massage and spa, magnificent ruins and forts, exotic charm of the backwater resorts all add and enhance the beauty of Kerala tourism.
Well plan your Kerala tour with one of the leading tour operator and travel Management Company booking one from the many Kerala tour packages and experince the splendor of the nature at its best. Kerala sheer wonder and magnificence will leave you spell bound and offer you wonderful experince of tours and travels in India. Surely once you visit to Kerala the land of wonderments often referred as Evergreen Paradise on Earth or God's Own Country, you will love to come back time and again to enjoy vacation in the lap of Mother Nature.

description.hltext_display: 双手交替做梳头状有益于防治肩周炎！
description.content: � 端肩 端肩能起到缓解肩痛的作用。做端肩动作，左右交替进行，每次做20下以上。 搓背 患臂从背后下侧摸背，健臂从背后上侧去拉患臂。� 肩周炎患者两臂很难摸到，这时可以用一条毛巾连接两臂，如同搓背一� �。 划圈 每隔一两个小时做一下手臂划圈的动作。上下左右方向划圈都可以，顺时针、逆时针交替进行。划圈时动作一定要缓慢、深长。 梳头 双手交替沿前额—头顶—枕后—耳后的顺序绕头一圈，就如同做梳头动作。每次做20下以上。也可以做抱头动作：两足站立与肩同宽，两手交叉紧抱后脑；两肘拉开，与身体平行；两肘收拢，似挟头部，反复交替至少做20下。 （编辑：童言）

description.hltext_display: 执法组突袭排屋 起7万盗版碟捕3人
description.content:
●南洋商报
（布城21日讯）国内贸易及消费部执法组今晚侦破一起非法盗版光碟活动，逮捕三名本地华裔男子，起获7万张总值70万令吉的盗版光碟。
布城贸消部执法组副主任菲杜斯指出，该组在接获情报后暗中监督两周，今晚7时带队突击怡保路彩虹花园一间双层排屋，并起获庞大数量的盗版光碟。
包装中心及货仓
他告诉记者，初步调查显示，该单位是包装中心及储藏盗版光碟的货仓。
他相信，这个单位进行盗版光碟的活动已活跃至少一年。
他指出，该盗版商在接获订单后，就会把盗版光碟以速递方式运送给买家，或者是居住在雪隆一带的买家亲自上门取货，以便在夜市出售。
他说，这些盗版商一天可售1000张盗版光碟，每月可赚取5万令吉的利润。

description.hltext_display: Another seat in Congress for the Peach State: Local leaders confident it will be in northwest Georgia
description.content:
The Census Bureau has confirmed Georgia will gain an additional congressional seat in 2012. The General Assembly will redraw congressional district lines next year, and local lawmakers say they’ll be pushing to have that new district created in northwest Georgia.
Georgia’s population swelled to nearly 9.7 million, boosting its representation in Congress, numbers released Tuesday by the U.S. Census show.
The increase of more than 1.5 million people — up from nearly 8.2 million in 2000 — means the state picks up a seat in the House of Representatives, raising Georgia’s House delegation to 14 members. The official U.S. population totaled more than 308 million people.
Georgia is now the ninth most populous state, up from 10th in 2000, and grew at a rate of 18.3 percent, outpacing the national growth of 9.7 percent.
“There’s no question the new district will be in north Georgia,” said state Rep. Tom Dickson, R-Cohutta. “That’s where the population growth has been. Of course, that’s a large area. But I think that whatever the ultimate result of this process is, it will narrow down the district that includes us into one that is more homogeneous.”
Whitfield and Murray counties are currently in Georgia’s 9th Congressional District, which includes all or parts of 15 counties and sprawls from Dade County to White County and as far south as Forsyth County.
“At this point, without seeing all the numbers I would assume our district would include Dade County, Walker County, Catoosa County, Whitfield County and Murray County,” Dickson said. “Where it goes from there is the question. How far south? How far east?”
Charles Bullock, a University of Georgia political science professor, predicts that rural districts in south Georgia will likely get bigger and northern districts could shrink as lines will be adjusted to equalize the populations in each district, which will have roughly 711,000 constituents — up from about 647,000 in 2000. Districts in and around Atlanta’s 28-county metropolitan area will also change.
State Sen.-elect Charlie Bethel, R-Dalton, agrees with that prediction. He said that will also happen to the districts for the state House of Representatives and state Senate.
“Of course, we won’t be adding any new districts. But we will have to redraw them as well to adjust for the new population numbers,” he said.
Gov.-elect Nathan Deal, a former Georgia Congressman, welcomed the additional House seat in what he called a crucial redistricting year.
“As our state continues to grow, so does our influence and stature on the national stage,” Deal said in a statement Tuesday, adding that he will call a special session of the General Assembly in late summer to redraw districts for the state House, state Senate and Georgia’s congressional seats.
But state Rep. John Meadows, R-Calhoun, said he expects lawmakers will have done quite a bit of work on the new maps before being called back into session.
“We should have a good idea of what the new districts will look like, maybe not the exact details, when the special session begins,” said Meadows, who represents parts of Gordon and Murray counties.
The final plan will require federal approval under the Voting Rights Act because of the state’s history of discrimination against minorities. The law will likely protect Rep. Sanford Bishop, who is black, and represents a largely black electorate in south Georgia. Bishop barely won re-election this year and political bartering may work in his favor, Bullock said.
“If there were an effort to undermine him, you’d be asking for trouble from the Department of Justice,” Bullock said. “What makes more sense is to make swaps ... to take some white voters out of Bishop’s district and move some African-Americans in to make him more secure.”
Such a move could benefit newly elected Rep. Austin Scott, whose district is adjacent to Bishop’s and could become more red.
The new numbers have set the stage for a tug of war in the coming months, Bullock said.
“It will depend upon who ends up on the House and Senate redistricting committees,” Bullock said. “The individuals on those committees often try to design a district that they can run successfully for Congress in.”
The census attempted to count every person living in the U.S. on April 1. It’s mandated by the Constitution to determine how to divide the seats in the House among the 50 states. The population grew in the South and West and declined in the Midwest and Northeast.

description.hltext_display: Yes, Virginia, there is a Santa Claus
description.content:
Editors note: Eight-year-old Virginia O'Hanlon wrote a letter to the editor of the New York Sun, and the quick response was printed as an unsigned editorial Sept. 21, 1897. The response of veteran newsman Francis Pharcellus Church has since become history's most reprinted newspaper editorial. We, at the Thompson Citizen, are pleased to be part of that tradition and republishing it the Wednesday before Christmas has become an annual hallmark of the festive season for us here as well. Merry Christmas, one and all.
John BarkerEditorThompson Citizen
Dear Editor:
I am eight-years-old. Some of my little friends say there is no Santa Claus. Papa says, 'If you see it in The Sun it's so.'
Please tell me the truth; is there a Santa Claus?
Virginia O'Hanlon115 West Ninety-fifth StreetNew York
Virginia, your little friends are wrong. They have been affected by the skepticism of a skeptical age. They do not believe except [what] they see. They think that nothing can be which is not comprehensible by their little minds. All minds, Virginia, whether they be men's or children's, are little. In this great universe of ours man is a mere insect, an ant, in his intellect, as compared with the boundless world about him, as measured by the intelligence capable of grasping the whole of truth and knowledge. . He exists as certainly as love and generosity and devotion exist, and you know that they abound and give to your life its highest beauty and joy. Alas! How dreary would be the world if there were no Santa Claus. It would be as dreary as if there were no Virginias. There would be no childlike faith then, no poetry, no romance to make tolerable this existence. We should have no enjoyment, except in sense and sight. The eternal light with which childhood fills the world would be extinguished.
Not believe in Santa Claus! You might as well not believe in fairies! You might get your papa to hire men to watch in all the chimneys on Christmas Eve to catch Santa Claus, but even if they did not see Santa Claus coming down, what would that prove? Nobody sees Santa Claus, but that is no sign that there is no Santa Claus. The most real things in the world are those that neither children nor men can see. Did you ever see fairies dancing on the lawn? Of course not, but that's no proof that they are not there. Nobody can conceive or imagine all the wonders there are unseen and unseeable in the world.
You may tear apart the baby's rattle and see what makes the noise inside, but there is a veil covering the unseen world, which not the strongest man, nor even the united strength of all the strongest men that ever lived, could tear apart. Only faith, fancy, poetry, love, romance, can push aside that curtain and view and picture the supernal beauty and glory beyond. Is it all real? Ah, Virginia, in all this world there is nothing else real and abiding.
No Santa Claus! Thank God! He lives, and he lives forever. A thousand years from now, Virginia, nay, 10 times 10,000 years from now, he will continue to make glad the heart of childhood.

event_or_fact.property: a letter to the editor of the New York Sun, and the quick response was printed as an unsigned editorial Sept. 21, 1897

description.hltext_display: Kabinett beschließt Doppelhaushalt 2011/2012
Apple expands Ad network to iPad
description.content:
SAN FRANCISCO: Apple Inc, which introduced a mobile-advertising network in July, is expanding the system to the iPad with a new campaign to promote the Walt Disney Co movie 'Tron: Legacy'.
The ad, which will be featured inside some applications, will serve as a preview of a broader rollout of the advertising network on the iPad next year, the Cupertino, California-based company said today.
"Disney and Apple are excited to debut the 'Tron Legacy' iAd today as a special preview of iAd for iPad," said Tom Neumayr, a spokesman for Apple.
Apple is capitalizing on the success of the iPad, the best-selling tablet device, to step up competition with Google Inc in mobile advertising. Informa Telecoms & Media, a London-based consulting firm, expects revenue from such ads to grow about 10- fold to $24.1 billion globally by 2015. Apple and Google have each acquired mobile-advertising businesses in the past year to tap the market.
Apple's iAd network was first introduced in July for iPhone and iPod Touch media player. Companies using the platform include Nissan Motor Co, Unilever NV, JC Penney Co, Best Buy Co, AT&T Inc and Geico. The promotion for "Tron," the sequel to a 1982 film about a man trapped inside a computer, includes videos and other features about the movie.
Apple Chief Executive Officer Steve Jobs is Disney's biggest shareholder and a member of the Burbank, California- based company's board.
Advertising Age previously reported on the "Tron" advertising campaign.

event_or_fact.property: Disney and Apple are excited to debut the 'Tron Legacy' iAd today as a special preview of iAd for iPad
