description.hltext_display: Byki zaczynają czuć się pewniej
description.content:
Grudzień zaczyna inwestorów rozpieszczać. I to nie tylko tych z Wall Street, gdzie indeksy we wtorek znów biły rekordy.
We wtorek tempo trwającej od początku grudnia zwyżki na amerykańskich parkietach uległo niewielkiemu przyspieszeniu. Co prawda wzrosty tamtejszych indeksów, sięgające 0,6 proc. trudno uznać za imponujące, jednak patrząc z perspektywy pełzającej hossy z ostatnich kilku dni, można zauważyć pewien postęp. Nie można wykluczyć, że pojawiające się niemal każdego dnia nowe rekordy zaczynają przekonywać coraz większą grupę inwestorów, że zwyżka może trwać dalej. Skoro indeksy znalazły się na poziomie sprzed upadku Lehman Brothers, to czemu nie miałyby pójść jeszcze wyżej? Na razie, licząc od początku grudnia S&P500 zyskał 6,3 proc. Mimo dalekich od euforii nastrojów, w Warszawie też nie ma powodów do wielkich narzekań. WIG20 wzrósł w tym samym czasie o 6,1 proc. a do rekordu we wtorek zabrakło mu zaledwie 7 punktów.
Z braku lepszych pomysłów, niektóre agencje i komentatorzy przyczyn wczorajszej poprawy nastrojów na giełdowych parkietach upatrywali w informacji o tym, że Chiny będą pomagać europejskim krajom dotkniętym finansowymi kłopotami. Ze strony wicepremiera Chin padły nawet konkretne deklaracje, dotyczące kupna ich papierów dłużnych. Tyle tylko, że to żadna nowość, bo o chińskich zakupach w Europie mówi się już od jakiegoś czasu. I trudno się tym zamiarom dziwić, skoro wiadomo, że Chiny "pomogły" już Stanom Zjednoczonym, mają ich obligacje o wartości prawie 900 mld dolarów i trochę się martwią, czy to nie za dużo.
var _r = document.referrer ? encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) : ''; var _w = encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); var _e = document.inputEncoding ? document.inputEncoding : document.charset; document.write('\/script'); Sądząc zaś po wynikach dzisiejszej sesji, można wnioskować, że chińscy inwestorzy z perspektywy wspierania Europy nie bardzo się ucieszyli. Shanghai Composite stracił na wartości 0,09 proc. Umacniający się znów jen był powodem zmartwień graczy japońskich. Nikkei spadł o 0,2 proc. Nadwyżka handlowa Japonii okazała się w listopadzie znacznie mniejsza, niż się spodziewano.
Rano notowania kontraktów terminowych na amerykańskie i europejskie indeksy znajdowały się minimalnie pod kreską. Nie musi to jednak oznaczać słabości giełd w pierwszej części dnia, choć po wtorkowych wzrostach niewielka korekta nie powinna dziwić. Po południu pojawią się pierwsze w tym tygodniu informacje zza oceanu i prawdopodobnie to one ustawią końcówkę sesji. Poznamy dane o dynamice amerykańskiej gospodarki, sprzedaży domów i indeks cen nieruchomości.

description.hltext_display: Ель одноразовая� — больше не в моде
La Federación celebra su tradicional cena de Navidad con los medios de comunicación
description.content:
RFEF - 21-12-2010
Casi doscientos invitados de los medios informativos se reunieron en la Ciudad del Fútbol de Las Rozas para compartir una cita ya habitual en estas fechas. A la cena no faltaron Vicente del Bosque, Fernando Hierro y el cuerpo técnico de las Selecciones Nacionales y una representación de la Junta Directiva de la RFEF, además de los representantes de distintas organizaciones periodísticas.
La Residencia de la Ciudad del Fútbol de Las Rozas, y el Salón "Vicente del Bosque" fue el lugar elegido este año para recibir a los representantes de los medios informativos para compartir una cena a la que asistieron aproximadamente doscientos invitados. Como todos los años, la cena de Navidad de la Real Federación Española de Fútbol sirvió como punto de encuentro de los informadores, y lugar de resumen de los momentos pasados en este 2010.
A la cena, y en calidad de anfitriones, además de Ángel María Villar, presidente de la RFEF y Juan Padrón, vicepresidente de la RFEF, junto a Jorge Pérez, secretario general, asistieron una representación de la Junta Directiva de la RFEF, así como los seleccionadores nacionales, Ignacio Quereda, José Venancio López, y el cuerpo técnico de Vicente del Bosque en la Selección Nacional Absoluta (Toni Grande, Paco Jiménez y Javier Miñano). Además, los representantes de las asociaciones periodísticas, con Mari Carmen Izquierdo, presidenta de la Asociación la de Prensa Deportiva Española.
En las conversaciones, el tema recurrente por la experiencia común entre muchos de los periodistas, redactores, fotógrafos y cámaras de televisión fue el Mundial de Sudáfrica, y la consecución del título de Campeones del Mundo por parte de la Selección.

description.hltext_display: UNGA declares June 23 as International Widows Day
description.content: United Nations:In order to address the plight of widows worldwide, the UN General Assembly has declared June 23 as International Widows Day. This rare designation of an international day of recognition by the UN follows independent verification of shocking levels of violence and deprivation faced by hundreds and millions of widows around the world.The resolution, approved by the 192 representatives of the Third Committee of the General Assembly, was a passionate personal initiative of Sylvia Bongo Ondimba, the First Lady of Gabon. UK-based Loomba Foundation had been campaigning for it at the UN for the past several years. Cherie Blair, wife of the former British Prime Minister, is its president, while Raj Loomba is its founder and chairman. "Widows are everywhere in the world, yet in many countries, they are nowhere to be seen or heard.

description.hltext_display: Benefits of Going to a San Francisco gym
description.content:
The City of San Francisco is a well-visited place in the state of California. It holds a lot of sites and cultural landmarks that people can go and enjoy. It's a great place to live for people who want to experience a well-developed urban lifestyle. There is the Golden Gate Bridge and the Palace of Fine Arts that people can visit.
Aside from the sight-seeing, shopping, and going around, there are also reliable gyms that people can workout in. Working out has become an integral component in the well-being of a person. Through proper training and exercise, people come out feeling more productive and healthy. The people who hit the gym don't necessarily go to one just because to look great but there are actually many benefits in going to a gym.
The most basic reason in that people go to a San Francisco gym is of course the health benefits when exercising. There are many things you can do to stay fit and active. You can run in the treadmill, build muscles on the bench press, enrol in an aerobics class, do sit ups on the mats, and many more. All areas of the body are covered inside the gym. After working out, it enables your body to feel more relaxed and stretched. This in turn gives you more sleep at night and more energy during the day.
Suppose you are just a beginner or a person who is really serious in getting into shape, there are always personal trainers in a San Francisco gym. A personal trainer will ensure you to actually the exercises on a constant basis. Whenever you get tired or not motivated, they are there to push you in completing the exercise. They can also teach you the proper form and posture when doing a specific bodybuilding technique. Any questions you might have regarding a fit lifestyle, you can ask the trainer.
Going to the gym has also another perk that most people don't see. There is the social aspect in exercising in a gym. If you sign up for a boxing class or an aerobic class, you sometimes end up in pairs or in a group. It's a good way to bond as you are all experiencing the same struggles and joy of exercising together. This is also true if you are just working out by yourself. You'll be able to see and eventually meet regular gym-goers who you spend time with you every single day. There is an instant connection because all who want to stay fit and healthy.
Exercising in the gym is a better way in getting the body you want rather than exercising by yourself elsewhere. There are more facilities and machines available at your disposable. It beats doing push-ups or sit-ups at home if you really want to bulk up. Everyone knows that exercising will get you healthy, but a gym enables more muscle bodybuilding and toning. It provides a more structured facility where you can focus specific muscles.
There are many things to see and do in San Francisco. For those looking for an active lifestyle and getting into shape, a San Francisco gym can easily be within reach. At the end of each workout, you will not only feel more productive but you will also look better.

description.hltext_display: Kranjčar: Ancelotti se samo raspitivao o Vrsaljku
description.content:
- Niko je zaliječio ozljedu i spreman je za igru. Još se nada da bi se mogao nametnuti Redknappu i biti u najužem krugu od 12 igrača - kaže Cico
Zdravko Mamić nakon povratka iz Londona pohvalio se kako je bio na ručku s Carlom Ancelottijem, ali i dodao da je Chelseajev trener imao "hrvatski tjedan".
– Nekoliko dana prije Zokija i mene ondje je bio i Zlatko Kranjčar, kojega Ancelotti iznimno cijeni – prisnažio je Mamić.
Dinamov gazda kaže da se razgovaralo o Modriću, a kojom je temom Cico zabavljao Ancelottija?
Izbornik Crne Gore biranim riječima govori o posjetu Chelseajevu kampu i druženju s trenerom.
Igrao sam protiv njega
– Carla poznajem iz igračkih dana, igrao sam protiv njega za reprezentaciju Jugoslavije u srazu s Italijom, a znamo se i iz trenerskih krugova. Svojedobno je kao trener Milana bio zainteresiran za Niku. Sa mnom je u Chelseajevu kampu bio i naš zajednički prijatelj Aldo iz Pule, inače Carlov čovjek od velikoga povjerenja – priča Kranjčar.
Cico je ondje proveo cijeli dan, pratio je trening engleskog prvaka, a potom dugo razgovarao s Ancelottijem. Je li ga Talijan pitao za neke naše igrače?
– Pitao me samo za – Šimu Vrsaljka. Oni ga prate, ne krije da su zainteresirani za njega, a ja sam mu potvrdio i njegova zapažanja. Šime je veliki potencijal, motoričan je, brz, ima odličan centaršut, moć ponavljanja te bi već sad mogao igrati u svakome engleskom klubu. Na Stamford Bridgeu sigurno bi još napredovao – dodaje Kranjčar.
Kakva je Nikina situacija u Tottenhamu?
Neka se Vlatko bavi ligom
– Niko je zaliječio ozljedu i spreman je za igru. Još se nada da bi se mogao nametnuti Redknappu te u dolazećem razdoblju, u kojemu se igra ubrzanim ritmom, mogao izboriti za poziciju i biti u najužem krugu od 12 igrača. Niko samo želi igrati, ne želi izgubiti kontinuitet, i zbog sebe, ali i zbog reprezentacije, jer vrlo brzo doći će odlučujuće utakmice u kojima mora biti u vrhunskoj formi.
Kako ste doživjeli izbore u HNS-u, kandidat kojega ste podržavali nije uspio?
– Atmosfera u kojoj se odigrala skupština ne služi na čast onima koji su na njoj sudjelovali. Štimac je bio džentlmen jer je sportski čestitao Markoviću. Igor je imao dobar program i ideje za razvoj nogometa i ta 24 glasa trebala bi mu biti poticaj za nastavak rada u nogometu. Usto, od pobjednika se sada očekuje da se ozbiljno pozabavi unapređenjem domaće lige, koja je do sada bila zapostavljena – zaključio je Zlatko Kranjčar.

description.hltext_display: Kommunen erhalten 2,58 Milliarden Euro an Schlüsselzuweisungen
Sporting scandals of 2010
description.author: JOSEPH
description.content:
While 2010 saw plenty of sporting success on the field, once again there was no shortage of stars making headlines off field for all the wrong reasons.
Players from a diverse range of sports including football, AFL, NRL, American football - not to mention golf - got into a variety of sticky situations this year, with some having past exploits in their personal lives aired for the very first time.
Once these dodgy dalliances bubbled to the surface, it became messy, very messy. Marriages were shattered, lucrative endorsement deals were flushed down the toilet and clubs could no longer hold onto players who had stuffed up in very big ways.
Leading the pack was champion golfer Tiger Woods, who hit the spotlight for reasons other than winning yet another tournament late last year. The ongoing saga of his dalliances with more than 100 women kept newspapers selling and mouses clicking well into this year.
Some superstars couldn't keep their fingers to themselves as texting became all the rage for athletes looking for a bit of extra-curricular activity outside the family mansion.
And football stars messing with teammates or ex-teammates missuses? C'mon, have they never heard of a bloke called Wayne Carey?
The flipside of fame means things don't stay secret for long for people constantly in the gaze of the public eye. Eventually the details emerge, presenting mouth-watering fodder for the public at home and overseas.
Here's nine of the best sporting scandals:
1. Tiger Woods
It seemed to go downhill for the world's first billionaire sportsman when he arrived in Melbourne for last year's Australian Masters tournament. American tabloid The National Enquirer reported prominent New York nightclub hostess Rachel Uchitel had flown into Australia to pay Woods a visit while he was staying at the Crown hotel.
In early December, Woods infamously crashed his car outside his Florida home after a falling-out with his wife Elin Nordegren, the mother of his two children, allegedly provoked when the alleged affairs were being "discussed". Soon after, other magazines named two more women - a Los Angeles cocktail waitress and a Las Vegas club promoter - as having regular flings with the world's best golfer.
Then more and more names came forward, and in April this year, The National Enquirer reported Woods as having confessed to cheating with as many as 120 women behind his wife's back during their five-year marriage. The golfer was said to have listed all the women he had liaisons with as part of his treatment for sex addiction at a Mississippi rehab centre.
In October, the pair finally divorced, with Nordegren reportedly receiving a $US100 million settlement from 33-year-old Woods. The golfer - who went through 2010 without a tournament win and lost his coveted world No.1 ranking to Lee Westwood - also lost $US22 million in endorsements after AT&T, Gatorade and Accenture, among others, pulled out after learning of his prowess at scoring birdies away from the golf course.
2. Joel Monaghan
The former Canberra Raiders centre landed in hot water after a photograph of him engaging in a lewd act with a dog in some end-of-season shenanigans surfaced on the internet.
The 28-year-old quit the NRL team and couldn't contain his emotions during the announcement. "I don't want to damage this great club anymore because of this stupid prank," he said. "They're my actions and I'm totally responsible. Alcohol is no excuse. I'd love more than anything to take it back but I can't."
Of course you can't Joel, who expects to cop no shortage of flak when he makes his English Super League debut next year for Warrington.
"All that nonsense that went on in Australia is water under the bridge as far as we're concerned," Monaghan's new captain Adrian Morley said.
Good luck telling that to the fans in England - it is likely there will be many more dog days ahead for this fallen star.
3. Brendan Fevola
Not an AFL (Aussie Rules) season goes by when Brisbane Lions spearhead Brendan Fevola doesn't find himself in a pickle.
This time around alcohol wasn't to blame, but instead a brainless decision by Fevola to take a nude shower photograph of model Lara Bingle back in 2006 during their brief affair.
The pic came to light this year and landed him in big trouble, again, with the AFL. It also played a part in Bingle's eventual split with the vice-captain of the Australian Test team, Michael Clarke.
The former Carlton forward admitted he took the offending picture but the League said it could not be proved he was responsible for its distribution around the traps.
Still, the neanderthal behaviour of Fev sent another wrecking ball through the AFL's battle plans to present itself and its players as a "female friendly", modern sporting code.
4. Shane Warne
Fresh reports of a fling between Shane Warne and English supermodel Liz Hurley came to light in recent weeks, pouring cold water on the much peddled rumour Warnie was being sized up as a replacement captain to save the struggling Australian Test team.
Not for the first time, Warne's so-called bedroom antics have cost him. Previous indiscretions during his playing career saw him stripped of the Test vice-captaincy in 2000 and miss out on becoming the captain of the one-day team in 2002. His Channel Nine contract was also ripped up in 2005.
Questions are now being asked about the status of Hurley's marriage to Indian tycoon Arun Nayar, even though the actress wrote on Twitter that they separated a "few months ago".
The UK tabloid News of the World claimed the Hurley and Warne were captured on video in a series of ''sizzling public clinches'', while Warne had been flirting with Hurley via Twitter for months.
According to "trusty" sources, the tabloid claimed the online tomfoolery with Hurley happened well after he and on-again, off-again wife Simone Callahan had separated - despite them living under the same roof but in separate bedrooms of their plush suburban Melbourne home.
5. Ashley Cole
Like many before and after him, the Chelsea and England defender is an absolute nutter.
A stunning pop star wife in the form of Cheryl Cole beside him wasn't enough for Ashley, who instead preferred to engage in some "text sex" with a topless model.
The scandal for the Coles occurred early this year when a model Sonia Wild, 28, claimed to have received nude pictures of the Chelsea defender along with suggestive text messages.
Media reports said she replied with naked images of herself and claims she had "text sex" with the player.
This came just two years after Ashley had an affair with a hairdresser, along with numerous other women.
It seems this guy doesn't learn, with a divorce settlement figure of 4.5 million to the singer being bandied about recently.
6. Wayne Rooney
Tabloids went into overdrive when it was claimed Wayne Rooney was cavorting with a 1000-a-night prostitute while his wife Coleen was pregnant with their son, Kai.
The Mirror newspaper claimed the Manchester United striker was using the services of a 21-year-old call girl and even went as far as wheeling her out to VIP events throughout Manchester.
Rooney's marriage is now on the rocks, especially after Coleen - his childhood sweetheart - welcomed him back in 2004 after the same paper exposed him not once, but twice, for cheating on her with prostitutes.
Once bitten, twice shy. Fat chance.
7. John Terry
A year after being named "Dad of the Year" in a poll of UK adults that was commissioned by a ketchup company, Chelsea and ex-England captain John Terry didn't seem to have embraced the honour after it was revealed he slept with the now ex-girlfriend of his England teammate.
In January this year, Terry lost a court battle to keep secret the four-month affair in late 2009 with French lingerie model and his wife's best friend, Vanessa Perroncel.
Terry, 29, who is married with three-year-old twins, was stripped of the England captaincy ahead of this year's World Cup after the claims he had a fling with the then-girlfriend of Wayne Bridge became public.
Bridge and Terry were once teammates at Chelsea, but the former joined Manchester City last year. During their first meeting after the scandal broke, Terry thrust out a hand for the customary pre-game shake only to be spectacularly snubbed by Bridge in a photo that made front pages worldwide.
8. Brett Favre
The legendary NFL quarterback has not uttered a single word this year about the alleged nude pics of himself that he sent to a former New York Jets game hostess back in 2008.
The married Favre, who now plays for the Minnesota Vikings, has preferred to concentrate on his football and not get bogged down in the controversy surrounding the alleged messages and inappropriate photos he sent to Jenn Sterger in 2008 - the 41-year-old's only season with the Jets.
Favre could be spared the litigation if the NFL decides to punish Favre over the allegations, Sterger's manager has said.
Sterger wants the matter dealt with by the time Favre retires at the end of the year, as apparently her main objective is to get acknowledgement that the former Green Bay Packers star was in the wrong.
9. Tony Parker
Winning several NBA championships with the talented San Antonio Spurs and having a gorgeous wife in Desperate Housewives actress Eva Longoria to boot just simply wasn't enough for French basketball star Tony Parker.
Longoria last month filed for divorce after she found text messages Parker exchanged with the wife of former Spurs teammate, Brent Barry, according to TMZ.
"It was flirtatious, but he never did anything with her," a source close to Parker told People magazine.
TMZ reported Parker had also denied having had sex with Erin Barry, but that didn't stop Longoria from filing divorce papers at an LA court - citing "irreconcilable differences".
What's that they say in basketball circles ... "Reeeee-jected!"

description.hltext_display: East Whittier news briefs, Dec. 22
description.content:
Friends Church plans
East Whittier Friends Church, 15911 E. Whittier Blvd., will hold its Christmas Eve worship service at 7 p.m.
For information, call 562-947-9441.
Scott's Restaurant sets
Christmas Eve dinner
Scotty's will hold its 14th annual Christmas Eve dinner from 10 a.m. to 3 p.m. Friday for the most needy in the community. A flier is required and can be obtained at the eatery.
The restaurant is located at 8426 Laurel Ave., Whittier
For information, call 562-698-8636.
MONDAY
Community Church offers
search skills sessions
A job-search skills sessions will be offered at 7 p.m. Mondays on the second floor of the education center at Whittier Area Community Church, 8175 Villaverde Drive.
Information will be presented on change, transition, understanding the job-search process, building a search plan, developing attention-getting resumes and preparing for an interview.
For information, e-mail JobQuest@wacc/net
JAN. 4
Hummingbirds the
topic of lunchtime talk
Valerie Sinex will speak on "Hummingbirds in Southern California" at the 11:30 a.m. Jan. 4 luncheon of the Garden Thyme Club.
It will be held at the East Whittier Women's Club, 14148 E. Second St.
Cost is $5 for visitors. For reservations, call 562-698-8880.
JAN. 6
Hagman to host mobile
office at library
Assemblyman Curt Hagman, R-Chino Hills, will hold his monthly mobile office in Whittier from noon to 2 p.m. Jan. 6 at the Whittwood Library, 10537 Santa Gertrudes Ave.
For information, call 909-627-7021 any time.
JAN. 18
`Rosie the Riveter'
talk slated at library

It is sponsored by the Friends of the Whittier Library.
For information, call 562-464-3470.

description.hltext_display: India twice successfully tests n-capable Prithvi-II missile
description.content: India Wednesday successfully conducted two tests of its indigenously developed nuclear-capable Prithvi-II ballistic missile from a military base in Orissa, an official said.

description.hltext_display: 冬至� 情火烧神料店 一家五口夺4命
description.content:
（槟城22日讯）冬至凌晨的一场无情大火，夺走神料店一家五口的四条人命，店主老母亲、妻子和两名儿女葬身火海，仅有自己孤身逃出火海。
这场大火是于今日凌晨2时50分左右，发生于槟岛大路后一间名为“梁辉宝贸易神料中心”（大路后巴刹附近），唯一生还者是59岁的梁辉宝，他的妻子吴秀娇（56岁）、女儿梁丽宏（18岁）和儿子梁孙义（16岁）受困在店铺二楼的浴室被浓烟熏死。
至于老母亲林彩花（76岁）是被消拯员发现晕倒在底楼后方走道，被送院途中不治，梁辉宝则毫无损伤，虽然全家只有他活了下来，但一夜间丧失四名至亲，相信他内心亦生不如死。
初步了解，起火原因相信是因电线短路，而火势是从店铺底楼开始烧起，由于底楼放置过多的纸札和神料等易燃物，导致火势一烧起来，短短几分钟内整间店铺已陷入火海，里边的人也受困在浓烟之中。
心有余悸的梁辉宝受访时说，事发时，他听到在客厅看电视的儿子梁孙义大喊火灾，情急之下赶紧寻找后门的钥匙，不料却遍寻不获，他唯有冲下楼逃命，不久后，消拯员撬开后门，他因此立即逃出去。
他说，他当时以为儿子会带着其他人逃出来，不料等了许久却不见人影，而他当时也无法再进入火场救人，内心非常着急。
霹雳路消拯局行动组副主任莫哈末拉查姆说，三名死者的遗体都是在二楼的冲凉房被发现，当局正追查起火原因及损失数额。

description.hltext_display: GPW powróciła do wzrostów
description.content:
We wtorek indeksy europejskie nadal rosły, poranne zwyżki na giełdach w Azji, a także zbliżające się święta sprzyjały stronie popytowej.
Inwestorzy nie przejęli się ostrzeżeniami agencji Moodyâs o możliwości obniżenia ratingu Portugalii. Brak istotnych danych makroekonomicznych, a także pozytywne sygnały płynące zza Oceanu doprowadziły, do nowych tegorocznych szczytów na giełdzie we Frankfurcie, gdzie indeks DAX zyskał 0,85%. Wzrosty indeksów wynikały z dobrej postawy sektora wydobywczego, a także rosnącej ceny surowców m.in. cena miedzi podrożała o 2%, a baryłka ropy kosztuje blisko 90 dolarów. Na giełdach w Paryżu i Frankfurcie wzrosty przekroczyły wczoraj 1%.
Po słabszym początku tygodnia popyt uaktywnił się we wtorek na GPW. Indeks WIG20 dzięki sprzyjającej sytuacji zewnętrznej, po południu zbliżył się do tegorocznych szczytów i na zamknięciu zyskał 1,12%. Zwyżkom sprzyjała bardzo dobra postawa akcji spółki KGHM (+3,17%), której wycena rosła w ślad za rynkiem miedzi. Niewiele w dniu wczorajszym działo się na rynku walutowym notowania złotego względem euro i dolara pozostały bez zmian. Powodów do zmartwień dla kredytobiorców cały czas dostarcza zachowanie franka szwajcarskiego, który kosztował wczoraj ponad 3,17 zł i jest to najwyższy poziom w tym roku.
var _r = document.referrer ? encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) : ''; var _w = encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); var _e = document.inputEncoding ? document.inputEncoding : document.charset; document.write('\/script'); Wczorajsza sesja na Wall Street miała charakter symboliczny, indeks S&P500 (+0,6%) wzrósł powyżej 1253 punktów i tym samym odrobił wszystkie straty poniesione po upadku Lehman Brothers w 2008 roku. Jak widać po zachowaniu indeksów amerykańskich w ostatnim czasie zarządzający funduszami pod koniec roku przenoszą aktywa na giełdę, co wspiera wzrost indeksów za Oceanem. Dzisiaj rano rosła także większa część rynków azjatyckich na fali rosnących cen surowców, a przede wszystkim miedzi.
Nastroje na GPW w dniu wczorajszym uległy diametralnej poprawie, wszystko wskazuje na to, że przed świętami indeks WIG20 ustanowi tegoroczne maksima. Rajd św. Mikołaja na światowych rynkach trwa w pełni i nie widać na razie żadnych przesłanek świadczących o możliwości jego zakończenia. Dzisiaj inwestorzy poznają decyzję Rady Polityki Pieniężnej dotyczącą stóp procentowych, które w mojej ocenie pozostaną na niezmienionym poziomie.

description.hltext_display: Apple pulled out WikiLeaks app
description.content:
WASHINGTON: Apple said that it removed an unofficial WikiLeaks application for the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad from its App Store because it violated its guidelines for software developers.
"Apps must comply with all local laws," Trudy Muller, an Apple spokeswoman, told AFP. "It may not put an individual or targeted group in harm's way.
"We removed the WikiLeaks app from the App Store because it violated our developer guidelines," Muller said, declining further comment.
The WikiLeaks application cost 1.99 dollars and provided a mobile version of the WikiLeaks content, which is available on the organization's website for free, and access to its Twitter feed.
It was approved by Apple on December 17 but removed from the App Store on Monday.
The application's developer, Igor Barinov, said in a link on his Twitter feed that he had planned to donate one dollar from each download to WikiLeaks.
Visa, Mastercard, PayPal and Amazon and other US companies have withdrawn their services from WikiLeaks since it began releasing thousands of secret US diplomatic cables.

description.hltext_display: Holiday Closings
description.content:
• The City of Dalton Public Works Department will be closed to observe Christmas on Thursday and Friday. No garbage or recycling will be picked up on those days. Friday’s garbage and recycling will be picked up today.
The department will also be closed to observe New Year’s Day on Friday, Dec. 31. No garbage or recycling will be picked up on that day. Next week, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday’s garbage and recycling will be picked up on their regularly scheduled days. Friday’s garbage and recycling (Dec. 31) will be picked up on Thursday, Dec. 30.
• Whitfield County government offices will be closed Dec. 23, 24 and 31 for the Christmas and New Year’s holidays.
• Varnell garbage pick-up will be Thursday.
• The Chatsworth-Murray County Library will be closed today through Saturday for the Christmas holiday. The library will re-open on Monday at 8 a.m.
• All locations of the Dalton Whitfield Solid Waste Authority will be open from 7 a.m. to noon on Friday, Dec. 24, and closed on Saturday, Dec. 25. The normal operating schedule will resume from Monday, Dec. 27, through Friday, Dec. 31 (7 a.m. to 6 p.m.). In observance of New Year’s Day, all locations will be closed on Saturday, Jan. 1. The normal operating schedule will resume then on Monday, Jan. 3.
Locations include the Old Dixie Landfill & Convenience Center, McGaughey Chapel Convenience Center, Westside Convenience Center and the M.L. King Convenience Center. For more information visit www.DWSWA.org or call (706) 277-2545.

description.hltext_display: Branded for much-needed bucks?
description.content:
Imagine the gym at South Kamloops secondary emblazoned with a gigantic Nike swoosh at centre court.
Or the football field outside NorKam secondary sporting a stylized Telus ‘t’ on the 55-yard-line.
Or the library at Valleyview secondary with a big “Brought to you by Chapters” sign at the entrance.
Such fundraising efforts are being undertaken in the Los Angeles Unified School District and are expected to generate as much as $18 million annually.
And, all are possible here under the Kamloops-Thompson School District’s current policy on corporate sponsorship.
But, none are likely, according to SD73’s superintendent.
“The fact of the matter is, nobody’s beating down our doors to give us corporate donations,” Terry Sullivan said.
“It’s just not taking place.”
Last week, the Los Angeles school board unanimously approved a plan allowing the district to seek money from corporate sponsors.
Similar programs are already in place in districts in Wisconsin and Texas.
SD73’s policy allows for similar action here.
According to the policy, which came into effect in July, individual school principals are free to seek corporate funding for anything they see fit — as long as it meets criteria such as enhancing the delivery of education and being “respectful of community standards.”
For any sponsorships over $5,000, principals must receive the OK from their parent advisory councils.
Contracts running more than 12 months require the go-ahead from the board’s secretary-treasurer.
District-wide sponsorship is also addressed in the policy, requiring “co-ordination” through the board’s corporate-sponsorship steering committee.
Sullivan said it’s unlikely Kamloops schools or their facilities will ever receive corporate facelifts like the ones that could take place in Southern California.
“In the States, they’re more liberal in terms of sponsorships than we would be,” he said.
“They [the corporations] are going to want something in return and it’s the really overt stuff people [in Canada] don’t like.”
But, Sullivan said, schools need money — especially since new provincial rules did away with vending-machine contracts of soft-drink giants Coca-Cola and Pepsi in 2008, a move that cost SD73 almost a half-million dollars annually.
“We lost over $450,000 when we had the vending machines taken out of the schools,” Sullivan said.
“That’s a lot to make up for our extra-curriculars.”
Team 73, a program targeting local businesses for money to go toward extra-curricular activities, has been set up in an effort to recoup some of those losses.
Sullivan said it’s still too early to know how the program will work.
“It’s still new,” he said.
“We’ll have to wait and see.”
• Advertising can bring out public passion
According to Sullivan, one of the greatest challenges in introducing corporate sponsorship to schools is the reaction of the public.
And he knows of what he speaks.
Fifteen years ago, Sullivan was vice-principal at a high school in Halifax.
“We had high school hockey,” he said.
“And, it was big.”
Sullivan said the school decided to use the squad to raise some funds — literally on the players’ backs.
“Each player on the team, they had home uniforms and away uniforms,” he said.
“And, on the top, they had their names. On the bottom, there was a sponsor, saying ‘A&W’ or whatever it was.
“Each uniform had a sponsor.”
Similar sponsorship deals are reached with hockey teams across the country, including the junior B Kamloops Storm.
As VP, Sullivan thought the jersey-back advertising was a good way to bring in cash.
But, he soon learned, others disagreed.
“People took great exception to it,” he said.
“We had to abandon it.”
Sullivan said potential sponsors are aware of the possible public fallout.
“I think there are corporate donors that would like to be involved,” he said.
“But, they aren’t interested in attracting any negative publicity.”

description.hltext_display: Facebook fight leads to police chase
description.content:
(UPI via COMTEX) -- Houston police said an incident began with a Facebook argument between two teens and ended with a high speed chase and the arrest of a woman with a stolen gun.
Harris County sheriff's deputies said a 15-year-old girl at the Irvington Village Housing Project argued Monday morning with a 17-year-old girl on Facebook, leading the second teen and her mother to visit the girl's home, KPRC, Houston, reported Tuesday.
"They started at 8 a.m. texting my phone and then came to my residence and busted my baby in her head," the 15-year-old's mother said.
Investigators said Rayna Polk, a woman who was not involved in the original incident, was questioned about the alleged attack and they pursued her when she fled during the interview.
Deputies said Polk fled in her car and drove the wrong way down several streets while traveling at speeds of more than 90 mph.
"During the course of that chase, when she was running, she dropped a backpack and we recovered a stolen weapon," Lt. Mark Timmers said.
Polk, who surrendered after police blocked her path, was charged with felony evading arrest and possession of a stolen weapon.

description.hltext_display: Quality Guaranteed When Looking For A Resort Rotorua Has To Offer
description.content:
There are various reasons why couples head away to another town or city for the weekend or a few days. Three of the most common ones are to take in an upcoming event, experience a few activities or to enjoy a few moments of quality time away from everyday life.
In New Zealand there are several areas that attract great interest from outsiders looking to whip away for a few days. Unfortunately, not all destinations are viable options. For example, if you are living in Taupo, skipping away to the Coromandel for the weekend is not ideal, due to the amount of travel involved. That is when it pays to select a place that offers everything you are looking for a little closer to home.
This is where you might want to enquire about the best resort Rotorua has to offer. This geothermal wonderland is smack bang in the middle of the north island and is quite clearly a logical getaway choice for couples. And there's certainly no shortage of appeal in Rotorua. After all, it's New Zealand's no. 1 tourist destination, plus it has been labelled the country's most beautiful city five times.
Because Rotorua is a tourism hotspot, it means there is huge choice for things to do and see. "Rotovegas", as it is commonly referred to, caters to the needs and desires of hundreds of thousands of people throughout the year, so it's a safe assumption there are no problems finding a fun activity to do or the best resort Rotorua has to offer.
When getting away for a romantic retreat for the weekend, some people like to find a form of accommodation that offers different scenery and features to what you have at home. For example, if you live on a busy street on the flat, then you might like to consider a quiet location that is elevated. You might also want to consider the proximity of the place you stay at, particularly if there are events or things to see that you are interested in.
New Zealand is very much known for its beautiful clean, green image. Rotorua and its surrounding landscapes is a great example of such existence in the north island. You can quite easily find yourself set among native trees and bush, yet nice and close to one of the 16 lakes in the area as well. You can be confident that a quality resort Rotorua has to offer will provide you with just what you need.

TER Rouen-Caen : des passagers dégagent la voie ferrée
description.content:
Publié le dimanche 19 décembre 2010 � 18H02 Parti de Rouen ce matin � 10 h 10, le train TER � destination de Caen a été immobilisé plusieurs fois. En cause : la neige et le gel qui ont fait plier branches et arbres, certains se couchant même sur les voies et empêchant par la même toute circulation. Après avoir heurté un arbre en forêt domaniale de La Londe-Rouvray, le train a du s'arrêter pour permettre au conducteur d'aller prévenir le chauffeur du véhicule arrivant � 140 km/h en face. L'agent a du faire neuf cents mètres � pied dans la neige pour déposer de petits explosifs sur la voie. " Lorsque le conducteur du train va rouler dessus, il comprendra qu'il y a un problème et freinera " a expliqué le chef de bord. Au bout d'une demi-heure d'attente, le véhicule a pu repartir mais a été contraint se s'immobiliser de nouveau quelques kilomètres plus loin � hauteur de Bourgtheroulde.
Deux arbres se trouvaient cette fois-ci sur les voies. Les passagers, dont de nombreux scouts, ont donc proposé de sortir pour aider les agents � dégager les rails. Quinze minutes plus tard, le train pouvait repartir.
Toutes les informations dans notre édition Evreux - Louviers - Bernay -Pont-Audemer du lundi 20 décembre
Avertissement Nous vous rappelons que vous avez, lors de la création de votre compte, accepté les conditions d’utilisation du site. Celles-ci proscrivent notamment la diffamation, l’incitation � la haine raciale, l’atteinte aux bonnes mœurs. Nous vous prions donc de respecter strictement . A défaut, votre compte sera banni du site. Voir aussi : florestan 19/12/2010 � 23h30 Comme quoi la solidarité normande existe : le service public � l'état pur! On n'est jamais mieux servi que par soi-même...
La SNCF en pleine déconfiture!
jpdock 19/12/2010 � 18h46 On revient au temps des diligences , les passagers descendaient pour pousser dans les montées ... Et quand tu sais en plus que tu risques de te prendre un autre train en pleine tête , pas étonnant que tu ais envie d'aider pour te barrer de cette voie le plus vite possible ....

description.hltext_display: Un ao despus del asesinato de Gobernador de Caquet
description.content:
Un año después del asesinato de Gobernador de Caquetá
Redacción Judicial
Hoy se cumple un año del secuestro y posterior asesinato del gobernador del Caquetá Luis Francisco Cuéllar Carvajal, hecho criminal que conmocionó al país.
Pasado este tiempo, sólo está condenado y pagando una pena Diver Dubán Calderón Parra, alias "Correcaminos" o "Felipe" uno de los asesinos del Mandatario. Mientras tanto, la Fiscalía adelanta una investigación para vincular a los miembros del secretariado de las Farc en el este crimen.
Su secuestro
Eran aproximadamente las 10:00 p.m. de ese fatídico 21 de diciembre de 2009 cuando la residencia del Gobernador fue atacada por un grupo de más de diez hombres que vestían uniformes del Gaula del Ejército quienes volaron la puerta de la entrada de su casa con una granada, no sin antes asesinar a un patrullero de la Policía que prestaba guardia.
El Gobernador fue sacado a la fuerza de su vivienda y raptado por los guerrilleros quienes lo condujeron en una camioneta a la zona rural del municipio de Florencia. Los informes explicaron que el Mandatario murió degollado la misma noche de su secuestro a manos de sus secuestradores. La hora del deceso la establecieron los médicos del Instituto de Medicina Legal y Ciencias Forenses a las 11:00 p.m.
De acuerdo al primer informe del Ejército, el cuerpo sin vida de Cuéllar fue encontrado en un paraje conocido como El Salao, vereda Sebastopol, a las afueras de la ciudad de Florencia. El cadáver estaba degollado, boca abajo, cargado de explosivos y en una zona completamente minada.
Los responsables
Iniciadas las investigaciones del crimen, el 6 de enero de 2010, un miembro de la Columna Móvil Teófilo Forero llamado Henry López Sarmiento, alias “El Paisa” o “Ricardo”, fue capturado por las autoridades colombianas. Al parecer fue el individuo que planeó el secuestro y asesinato de Cuellar. Además de diseñar una maqueta de su casa.
El 28 de mayo del mismo año, en Bogotá fue capturado, Dubán Calderón Parra, alias "Correcaminos" o "Felipe", miembro de la Columna Móvil 'Teófilo Forero' de las Farc.
La condena
Tras evaluar el material probatorio presentado por la Fiscalía, el Juzgado Segundo Especializado de Florencia Caquetá) anunció la condena contra Diver Dubán Calderón Parra, alias "Correcaminos" o "Felipe", por el secuestro y muerte del gobernador de Caquetá, Luis Francisco Cuéllar Carvajal.
Así mismo, un fiscal de Derechos Humanos y DIH a cargo del caso, indicó que hubo división del trabajo de miembros de la columna móvil ‘Teófilo Forero’ de las Farc para efectuar esa acción. Alias "Correcaminos" se encuentra preso en la cárcel La Picota de Bogotá.
La confesión de Diver Dubán Calderón, condenado a 50 años de prisión por el asesinato, por orden de alias 'el Paisa', jefe de la columna 'Teófilo Forero', ensayó dos semanas el secuestro del Mandatario seccional.
Calderón aseguró que el plan inicial era un secuestro para presionar al Gobierno, pero que la reacción de la Fuerza Pública fue tan rápida que decidieron cumplir otra orden del 'Paisa': asesinar al rehén si había riesgo de un rescate. Lo degollaron.
En videos incautados en febrero en Caquetá, quedó registrado cómo se preparó el comando que perpetró el salvaje crimen.
La misa
Himelda Galindo, esposa del Gobernador inmolado y sus hijos Norma Victoria, Luis Fernando, Paola Adriana, Daniela, Nietos, Yerno, Nuera, Cuñada y demás familiares, ofrecerán hoy una misa, a las 10:00 de la mañana en la Catedral Nuestra Señora de Lourdes, de Florencia para recordar la memoria del compañero, padre y abuelo.

description.hltext_display: Classic expected to boost Pittsburgh economy
description.content:
City officials said they are expecting 30,000 fans from Washington at the Jan. 1 outdoor game at the home of the Steelers, which will seat about 60,000. About 10,000 people are expected at an alumni game the day before.
PITTSBURGH -- When Penguins president David Morehouse and Pittsburgh mayor Luke Ravenstahl attended the NHL's first Winter Classic, they talked about how great it would be to bring the hockey showcase -- and all the publicity and money generated from it -- to their city one day.
Four years later, the two sat side by side Tuesday along with city tourism officials to tout the $23 million next week's Winter Classic at Heinz Field is expected to bring to the region. The game pits the Penguins and star Sidney Crosby against the Washington Capitals and rival Alex Ovechkin on one of the busiest weekends of the year, Pittsburgh's annual New Year's Eve weekend celebration known as First Night.
"Pittsburgh will be the focal point of the hockey world -- not only the hockey world, but the entire sports world," Morehouse said.
City officials said they are expecting 30,000 fans from Washington at the Jan. 1 outdoor game at the home of the Steelers, which will seat about 60,000. About 10,000 people are expected at an alumni game the day before.
First Night, which is made up of 150 events at 50 venues in the city's cultural district, usually draws about 35,000 people.
"We have something for everyone," First Night director Kathryn Heidemann said.
She said many of this year's activities are hockey-themed, including a meet-and-greet with a penguin from the National Aviary and hockey-themed art shows.
Several activities are planned leading up to the game, including a pep rally in the downtown area known as Market Square on Dec. 30. Ravenstahl encouraged people to attend for a chance to win tickets to the game -- what he called "the hottest ticket in town."
Hotels in the city are booked, though officials said there may be some available outside of the city. And to avoid gridlock on game day, the Port Authority of Allegheny County is offering an incentive for fans to take public transit: Rides on the bus and light rail on New Year's Day will be free.
Those who can't get a ticket to the game are encouraged to take advantage of another attraction opening in conjunction with the Winter Classic. An ice rink is being build adjacent to Heinz Field. It will be open for general skating but will also feature some youth hockey games.

event_or_fact.property: Pittsburgh will be the focal point of the hockey world -- not only the hockey world, but the entire sports world
many of this year's activities are hockey-themed, including a meet-and-greet with a penguin from the National Aviary and hockey-themed art shows

description.hltext_display: Na listi čekanja za koprivnički Dom umirovljenika čak 1000 ljudi
description.content:
U domu trenutačno boravi 270 korisnika, a s liste čekanja žene na red dolaze tek za pet, a muškarci za tri godine.
Dom za starije i nemoćne osobe u Koprivnici ovu je godinu završio s prihodom od 14 milijuna kuna.
– Od toga su vlastiti prihodi 46 posto, a županija sufinancira 53 posto. Prosječna cijena koju plaća korisnik je 2100 kuna, a realna je cijena 4140 kuna – rekla je Vesna Križan, ravnateljica doma.
Napomenula je da je nakon smjene Darka Ledinskog (SDP) s mjesta ravnatelja, natječajima ušteđeno 450 tisuća kuna
– Primjerice, samo na bojenju "ušparano" je 46 posto – rekla je Križan.
U domu trenutačno boravi 270 korisnika, od čega 130 u bolničkom odjelu, a 140 su stanari. Na listi je čekanja čak 1000 ljudi. Muškarci tako na red čekaju do tri godine, a žene i do pet pa je u planu proširenje kapaciteta u bolničkom odjelu.
Dom za starije i nemoćne osobe već će sljedeće godine proslaviti 20 godina postojanja.
– U domu sam 15 godina. Lijepo mi je, toplo, ima ukusne hrane i sve što mi treba. Pjevala sam i u zboru, ali više ne mogu – rekla je Marija Premužić (85).
Križan je također istaknula da je koprivnički dom uzor u socijalnoj skrbi u Hrvatskoj.

description.hltext_display: 槟首长林� 英变拿督斯里林“英� ” 马机场公司指已致函道歉
description.content:
●南洋网
（吉隆坡22日讯）把槟城首席部长林冠英称为拿督斯里和林“英冠”，马来西亚机场公司发文告指，该公司董事经理丹斯里巴希尔已致函向林冠英道歉。
该公司发文告指出，对于本月20日，该公司邀请首相拿督斯里纳吉为槟城国际机场扩建计划主持动土礼时，巴希尔在演说时，错误读出林冠英称为拿督斯里和把名字称为林“英冠”。
之外，还使用“尊贵的”（YB）来称呼林冠英。根据我国惯例，州首席部长应该称呼为“非常尊敬的”（YAB）。
该公司在文告，表明已针对此事向林冠英致歉。

description.hltext_display: What You Think About Your Destination Wedding
description.content:
Destination weddings have become a way many couples are now using to declare their love in a much more free and non traditional way. If you are thinking about having your wedding at a destination other than down the street, let me suggest that you make this the fun and romantic experience of a lifetime for you, your fiancé and however many guests you have.
Half a million couples will celebrate a destination wedding this year. That's a lot of couples who are running away. Over half of these couples are eloping because their wedding plans started to get out of control. A week in Hawaii for the two of you can cost you less than a reception meal for 150-200 people and many couples choose to concentrate more on themselves than all of these people they don't even know.
Destination wedding websites allow for you to plan your wedding in detail and often you can also arrange your travel plans as well. You can also create your own web page to include your wish list and link directly to the hotel reservation pages that you would like to recommend to your guests.
The etiquette of a destination wedding often suggests that invited guests should pay their own airfare, while the bride and groom pick up the tab for the lodging, food, and beverages. But this is an area where you can really write your own rules. Do what seems right and best (and also what you can afford).
When selecting a destination wedding location, choose one that appeals to your tastes and wedding style. Keep in mind that because this isn't like going down the street to a local church, many of your guests won't be able to come. So you'll want to assume that your guest list will be much smaller.
Hawaii is one of the leading destinations for weddings: Every year Hawaii performs 20,000 weddings for those coming from the U.S. Mainland. This compares with the U.S. Virgin Island which does about 5,100, Jamaica does 5,000 and the Bahamas has 4,000. And about half of all Hawaiian weddings are performed on Maui.
There are many great outdoor wedding locations available -- beach weddings, waterfall wedding, and garden weddings. The options are endless! With any outdoor wedding, it is vital that the bride and groom work with their coordinator or wedding company to establish a backup plan in the event of bad weather.
Susan Pieper is a coordinates Maui weddings in Hawaii. She has planned thousands of weddings on Maui. If you would like to get your own Maui wedding package, give her a ring at 800-856-3270.

description.hltext_display: Côte d'Ivoire: Gbagbo se réaffirme président mais "tend la main" � Ouattara
description.content:
Laurent Gbagbo a réaffirmé mardi soir qu'il était le "président" de la Côte d'Ivoire mais s'est dit prêt � discuter avec son rival Alassane Ouattara et la communauté internationale qui le soutient, pour sortir d'une crise qui a fait au moins 50 morts selon l'ONU.
"Je suis le président de la République de Côte d'Ivoire", a déclaré Gbagbo dans son premier discours depuis son investiture le 4 décembre, diffusé sur la radio-télévision d'Etat RTI, un pilier de son régime.
Sous très forte pression de la communauté internationale qui réclame sans relâche son départ depuis la présidentielle controversée du 28 novembre, il a accusé le camp Ouattara et ses nombreux soutiens extérieurs de lui "faire la guerre". "Je ne veux pas que le sang d'un seul Ivoirien soit versé. Je ne veux pas d'une guerre en Côte d'Ivoire qui peut s'étendre aux pays voisins ou les affaiblir", a cependant affirmé Gbagbo.
Il s'est dit disposé � "accueillir un comité d'évaluation sur la crise post-électorale" qui "aura pour mission d'analyser objectivement les faits et le processus électoral, pour un règlement pacifique de la crise".
Ce comité serait "dirigé par un représentant de l'Union africaine" et comprendrait des représentants de l'ONU, de la Cédéao (Communauté économique des Etats d'Afrique de l'Ouest), des Etats-Unis, de l'Union européenne, de la Russie, de la Ligue arabe et de la Chine ainsi que "des Ivoiriens de bonne volonté".
"Je tends la main du dialogue. Je tends la main � l'opposition, � M. Ouattara et � la rébellion armée (Forces nouvelles, FN) qui le soutient", a-t-il lancé. Il les a exhortés � quitter l'hôtel du Golf d'Abidjan, qui leur sert de quartier général, pour "regagner leurs domiciles", alors que l'établissement est soumis � un blocus des forces fidèles � Gbagbo depuis plusieurs jours.
En signe de détente avant Noël, l'armée loyale au président sortant a annoncé dans la foulée la levée dès ce mardi du couvre-feu nocturne instauré � la veille du scrutin.
Plus tôt, le gouvernement Ouattara dirigé par le chef des FN Guillaume Soro avait montré qu'il n'entendait pas céder, appelant le peuple � "la désobéissance" au gouvernement "factice" de Gbagbo. La Côte d'Ivoire "vit la pire des escalades dans la barbarie d'un clan, d'un régime fini, contre les populations civiles démunies et désarmées", selon Soro.
La Cédéao a annoncé la tenue d'un sommet extraordinaire sur la situation en Côte d'Ivoire vendredi � Abuja. Lors d'un précédent sommet début décembre, elle avait suspendu le pays et demandé � Gbagbo de partir. Washington a imposé un premier train de sanctions contre Gbagbo en lui interdisant, ainsi qu'� plusieurs dizaines de ses proches, de se rendre aux Etats-Unis. L'Union européenne avait auparavant décidé de lui infliger la même sanction, ainsi qu'� ses deux épouses et 16 autres proches.
Le camp Gbagbo s'est moqué de sanctions qui font "sourire", de même qu'il n'entend pas revenir sur sa demande de retrait de Côte d'Ivoire de la mission de l'ONU, l'Onuci, dont le mandat a été prolongé de six mois par le Conseil de sécurité, ainsi que de la force française Licorne.
Alors qu'une confrontation est redoutée � la suite d'incidents, Gbagbo a assuré mardi soir qu'il entendait obtenir le départ de l'Onuci et de Licorne "par voie diplomatique" et demandé aux jeunes de "rester calmes".
Le secrétaire général des Nations unies Ban Ki-moon a cependant appelé la communauté internationale � venir en aide aux Casques bleus, avertissant que les forces loyales � Gbagbo tentaient d'"entraver les ravitaillements" de la mission et de l'hôtel du Golf.
Charles Blé Goudé, leader des "jeunes patriotes" pro-Gbagbo, fer de lance des violentes manifestations anti-françaises de 2004 � Abidjan, ne cesse de mobiliser ses partisans en vue du combat pour "la souveraineté de la Côte d'Ivoire".
Les violences depuis la marche de jeudi, appelée par les partisans de Ouattara et réprimée par les Forces de défense et de sécurité (FDS) fidèles au sortant, ont fait au moins 50 morts selon l'ONU, 25 dont 14 dans les rangs des FDS d'après le camp Gbagbo, 48 selon le camp Ouattara.

description.hltext_display: Humaltunut kuski Ounasrinteellä
description.content: Rovaniemen Ounasrinteellä jäi keskiviikon vastaisena yönä kiinni humalassa ajanut nuori mies. Poliisi kiinnitti autoon huomiota liikennevalvonnan yhteydessä puoli neljän aikaan aamulla ja pysäytti auton Matkajängäntielle. 18-vuotias ulkopaikkakuntalainen mies puhalsi alkometriin 0,77 promillea. Mies vietiin alkometrikokeeseen ja määrättiin ajokieltoon. YLE Lappi

description.hltext_display: Germany world juniors exhibition postponed
description.content:
A pre-World Junior Hockey Championship tournament exhibition game between the Czech Republic and Germany has been pushed back one day to Thursday due to lost luggage.
ROCHESTER, N.Y. -- A pre-World Junior Hockey Championship tournament exhibition game between the Czech Republic and Germany has been pushed back one day to Thursday due to lost luggage.
It's unclear when the German team's equipment will arrive from Europe. USA Hockey executive Jim Johannson spent part of Tuesday assisting the Germans in purchasing new equipment in Rochester.
Sweden and Norway have experienced similar problems.
Norway's game against Slovakia on Tuesday in Jamestown, N.Y., was pushed back a day. USA Hockey spokesman Dave Fischer said the bulk of Norway's equipment has arrived.
Sweden purchased new equipment to play its game against Canada in Toronto on Tuesday.
The tournament opens in Buffalo on Sunday.

event_or_fact.property: the bulk of Norway's equipment has arrived

description.hltext_display: 吴孟达三次离婚一人养四月扛90万赡养费
description.content:
吴孟达三次离婚一人养四家 月扛90万赡养费(图),吴孟达,,,娱乐新闻,明星新闻
省长王三运宣布项目开工 中国石化皖北煤电煤化一体化合作… ?景湾爆炸案 韩某某上诉 [ 中国石化皖北煤电煤化一 ][更多] ・ 安徽省固定资产投资总量突破1万亿元 ・ 皖江物流产业投资基金扬帆启航 ・ 安徽省经理人界将 ・ 安徽省省城首届漂移板邀请赛吸引百余 ・ 中国石化皖北煤电煤化一体化合作项目 正文如下： 据台湾TVBS报道，人称达叔的搞笑影星吴孟达，私底下其实有着不为人知的家庭故事，他结过4次婚，却还肩负着前3个家庭的生活费，每个家庭80万，一个月就得支出240万元.过去每年他要拍20部电影，赚的到这笔钱，但现在电影减产，他改接拍偶像剧养家，每个月一家只付得出30万，加一加，一个月基本盘就是90万元。
报道说，吴孟达老婆到台湾探班，却意外曝光他原来是个妻管严，现实生活，他更得负担沉重家累，因为每个月他得养4个家庭。
据了解，吴孟达总共有过4段婚姻，大老婆麦莉莉生了双胞胎女儿，二老婆卢少慈同样也育有一女，现任老婆侯珊燕更替他生了双儿女，4段婚姻关系5个孩子。
报道指，吴孟达4个家庭各给1间屋每个月还给80万元的安家费，但是最近已经减少为30万。尽管如此，开销还是很大，过去吴孟达一年最少拍20部电影，现在连偶像剧也通杀，两岸三地，拍戏到处走。
但是已经年近60的他不喊苦，哪时候退休，只说拍到观众不想看为止，让大家见识戏里戏外的他，同样乐观面对人生。
上一篇：袁咏仪张智霖4岁儿子私房照 顽皮可爱(组图)
下一篇：Angelababy发素颜照 网友称和黄晓明有夫妻相

description.hltext_display: 教育部已正式下令各州 华淡小双语教师教国语
description.content:
（吉隆坡22日讯）教育总监拿督阿都嘉化经于本月9日发出正式通令予各州教育局长，指示华小及淡小一、二年级的马来文必须由双语教师教导，而且有关教师在大马教育文凭中必须考获马来文优等。
至于三至六年级的国语教师则必须是主修马来文的教师。
通令也特别强调，微型华小及淡小的国语则必须由教学经验丰富，而且谙双语的教师负责，有关教师在大马教育文凭的国语也必须考获优等。
教育部副部长拿督魏家祥博士今天在记者会上说，随着副首相兼教育部长丹斯里慕尤丁通过媒体发出明确指示后，教育总监阿都嘉化已在本月发出通令予各州教育局长及负责人，训令他们必须遵重内阁指示。
他说，随着教育总监发出明确指示后，有关教育部将于明年调派更多主修国文的教师到华小，不应该继续成为一项争议。

description.hltext_display: Британским солдатам выдадут бронированные трусы
description.content:
Министерство обороны Великобритании потратило десять миллионов фунтов стерлингов (15,5 миллиона долларов) на покупку специальной брони для солдат, которая позволит защитить органы тазовой полости от взрыва. Как сообщается в пресс-релизе военного ведомства, 45 тысяч комплектов новой защиты, которая состоит из специальных трусов, пояса и ракушки, уже поставлены в Афганистан для использования британским военным контингентом.
Как ожидается, в ближайшее время в Афганистан будут отправлены еще 15 тысяч комплектов новой защиты, а в 2011 году — 60 тысяч комплектов. Новая защита трехслойна, и слои могут комбинироваться по разному, в зависимости от того, какую задачу выполняет боец. Для обычного патрулирования рекомендуется надевать первый слой защиты — специальные трусы, выполненные из баллистической ткани. Какая именно ткань используется, не уточняется. В похожей версии защиты, создаваемой для солдат в США, используются кевларовые нити.
Посмотреть на то, как ведут себя защитные трусы при попадании пули, можно здесь. С похожей разработкой для американских военных можно ознакомиться здесь.
Второй слой защиты представляет собой приспособление, которое застегивается вокруг пояса солдата, а специальная защитная ткань с жесткими вставками пропускается между ног и пристегивается к поясу со стороны спины. Эту защиту рекомендуется использовать бойцам, занимающимся поиском самодельных взрывных устройств. Специальные шорты и пояс выполнены из материалов, обеспечивающих вентиляцию.
Наконец, третий слой представляет собой ракушку, которая прикрывает половые органы бойца. Второй и третий слой защиты одеваются поверх формы, в то время как шорты — под штаны. На разработку и покупку первого слоя защиты министерство обороны Великобритании потратило шесть миллионов фунтов стерлингов, а второго — четыре миллиона. Сколько средств уже потрачено на третий слой защиты, пока неизвестно. Его испытания намечены на 2011 год.

description.hltext_display: Ez kell a Fradi bajnoki címéhez Prukner szerint
description.content: Prukner Lászlóra össztüzet zúdítottak a Ferencváros futballistái a 100%Fradi sportmagazin legfrissebb számában. A szakmai igazgató játékosai kérdéseire elmondta többek között, a legnagyobb álma válna valóra egy esetleges bajnoki címmel, ahhoz pedig, hogy erre esélyük is legyen, a koncentráltabb játék mellett 1-2 poszton erősítés is szükségeltetik. A tréner azt is elárulta, ha egyszer majd lesz rá lehetősége, hogy szövetségi kapitány is legyen, valószínűleg nem fog kitérni előle.

description.hltext_display: Govt Waives Import Duty On Onion
description.content:
(RTTNews) - In an attempt to curb soaring onion prices, India on Wednesday brought down customs duty on imports of the commodity to zero from 5%. "The customs duty on onions has been brought down to zero," finance secretary Ashok Chawla said.
The move comes amid a sharp rise in the price of onions which currently hover between Rs.65 and Rs.85 a kg in Bangalore and other retail markets on account of heavy rains in key producing states of Maharashtra and Gujarat that damaged substantial quantity of onion.
Because of the shortfall in the crop this year, retail prices may not fall below Rs.35-40 per kg in the near to medium term, agriculture minister Sharad Pawar warned on Tuesday.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com

description.hltext_display: Many rewarding opportunities to volunteer and promote literacy
description.author: Linda Fields Gold Staff Writer
description.content:
"Each One Teach One."
Frank C. Laubach came up with that motto. He was a missionary, educator, writer and literacy pioneer who came up with a technique honed in the Philippines during World War II that helped people learn to read and write. After the war, he went around the United States, inspiring others to adopt his techniques. One of his stops was in the San Gabriel Valley.
Since 1969, The San Gabriel Valley Literacy Council has "provided English language and citizenship instruction that meets the evolving needs of adult learners" in our area, with "special focus on the beginning learner and those who need more flexible scheduling." This means not just ESL (English as a Second Language), but also helping native English speakers learn better reading and writing skills.
The classes meet at libraries, churches, schools and community centers around Pasadena. There are about eight sites at present; with more tutors there could be additional classes in nearby communities. Hours are very flexible, day and evening, weekdays and weekends.
Volunteers do not need any specific background, other than being able to speak, read and write English fluently and being able to schedule between two and eight hours a week. The SGVLC will work between your schedule and the needs of their students. A minimum commitment would be at least a semester, hopefully a year.
Candidates for teaching need to be 18 or older. There will be a mini-interview
by phone or by e-mail. Tutors will work with small groups of not more than 10 students. Once a candidate has been interviewed, they will need to enroll in a two-session, 12-hour training class, between 9 a.m. and 3 p.m. Jan. 15 and 29, 2011. (The cost is $25 and includes lunches, as well as Council membership.)
The class teaches strategies and techniques, not only to boost your confidence, but to give you proven skills. Additional helpful characteristics: dependability, promptness, discretion, flexibility, patience, and really important, a sense of humor.
What does the volunteer get? "Heightened perception of the world around you, deepened understanding of another's values and lifestyles, broadened imagination for creative problem solving, and personal satisfaction in helping others to achieve their goals."
Other non-tutoring volunteer opportunities include public relations, fundraising, general office skills, accounting and translating.
Send information about your organization to features@sgvn.com or call 626-962-8811, ext. 2252, or fax to 626-856-2758.

description.hltext_display: Isles place DiPietro, Mottau on injured reserve
description.content:
New York Islanders goaltender Rick DiPietro and defenseman Mike Mottau have been placed on injured reserve.
UNIONDALE, N.Y. -- New York Islanders goaltender Rick DiPietro and defenseman Mike Mottau have been placed on injured reserve.
The team announced the moves in a statement Tuesday.
DiPietro sat out Saturday night's game against the Phoenix Coyotes because of swelling in his right knee. The former first-overall draft pick, who is 4-6-4 with a 3.68 goals-against average this season, is eligible to return after seven days.
Mottau will miss the rest of the season after surgery on his right hip.
He'd been out the past 10 games because of an eye injury, was cleared for physical activity last week, then tore the labrum in his right hip. The defenseman had three assists in 20 games.
The Islanders return to action Wednesday night against Tampa Bay.

description.hltext_display: Optimera kapret Veidekke
description.content:
Optimera har kapret Veidekke fra Byggmakker som hovedleverandør av trelast og byggevarer de neste tre årene med opsjon på ytterligere to år.
I tidligere avtale sto Byggmakker for omlag 80 prosent av leveransene, mens Optimera hadde resten. Nå blir det tvert om og vel så det. Avtalen vil gjøre Veidekke til Optimeras største kunde, og har en total verdi på 500-600 millioner kroner.
– Optimera ble valgt fordi de totalt sett hadde det beste og mest komplette tilbudet, kommenterer innkjøpssjef Ole Jakob Næss i Veidekke.
– Etter en grundig evaluering ble Optimera valgt fordi de hadde stort fokus på HMS, det beste betingelsessettet, relevant kompetanse og den kapasiteten og tilgjengeligheten som er nødvendig for å håndtere det store volumet som Veidekke representerer. Optimeras gode logistikkløsninger med åtte forsyningslagre strategisk plassert i forhold til våre markedsområder, spilte også en viktig rolle, fremholder Næss.
Flere leverandører var med i konkurransen om avtalen, og etter lange forhandlinger ble Veidekke og Optimera til slutt enige om en avtale som gjelder for Veidekke Entreprenør AS og datterselskaper. Avtalen trer formelt i kraft fra 1. januar 2011.
Ass. direktør i Optimera Proff/Montér, Tom Søgård, kan opplyse at for Optimera betyr avtalen at omsetningen hos Veidekke øker fra 30 millioner i 2010 til opp i mot 200 millioner per år i avtaleperioden.
– Som en integrert kjede med samme IT-plattform overalt kunne vi tilby Veidekke markedsriktige betingelser i alle regioner. Dette gjør det svært enkelt, effektivt og oversiktlig for en kunde av Veidekkes størrelse. I forhandlingene la vi også stor vekt på vårt arbeid med HMS og på elektronisk samhandling, opplyser Søgård.
– Vi ble avslutningsvis invitert ut på en besøksrunde i noen av Veidekkes distrikter og datterselskaper. Her presenterte vi Optimera generelt og hver enkelt region spesielt, og fortalte hvordan vi hadde tenkt å samarbeide med Veidekke. Disse rundene skapte godt klima, ga trygghet og tillit begge veier, og viste at vi hadde mange felles ståsteder, fremholder han.
Nå skal det avholdes implementeringsmøter i alle regioner der partene skal bli bedre kjent med hverandre og med avtalens innhold.
– Ikke minst skal det nå skapes gjensidig forståelse for hvordan vi kan utvikle oss sammen for å stå enda sterkere i norsk byggebransje. Vi gleder oss til fortsettelsen, avslutter Tom Søgård.

description.hltext_display: FDP unterstützt Oppositionskandidaten für BLM-Präsidentschaft
Fundusze BZ WBK AIB mają 6,98 proc. akcji Fortuna Entertainment Group
Paris Hilton doživjela šok na letu za Havaje
description.content:
Američka starleta trebala je sa svojim dečkom Cyom Waitsom poletjeti za Maui no zbog pronađenog velikog noža u avionu let je odgođen.
Savršeno putovanje za božićne blagdane Paris Hilton i njenog dečka Cy Waitsa već je na samom početku naišlo na poteškoće. Naime američka bogatašica trebala je poletjeti za Maui, no svi putnici iskrcani su iz aviona zbog pronađenog oružja.
- U avionu je pronađen veliki nož, zbog toga smo se morali iskrcati iz aviona. Uopće nisam očekivala tako nešto. Jedva čekam da stignem na Maui, napisala je Paris na svojoj Twitter stranici.
Američki mediji nagađali su da je Paris trudna, no čini se da je to bila samo lažna uzbuna jer je izjavila kako još nije spremna za majčinstvo.

description.hltext_display: Ligue 1: Montpellier arrache le nul � Lorient 0-0
description.content:
Publié le mardi 21 décembre 2010 � 23H15 PARIS (Reuters) - Malgré une large domination, Lorient a été tenu en échec par Montpellier (0-0) mardi sur son terrain en match avancé de la 19e journée de Ligue 1.
Les Merlus ont fait le siège du but montpelliérain pendant la majeure partie de la rencontre, sans parvenir � tromper le gardien Geoffrey Jourdren, sauvé notamment par son poteau juste avant la pause sur un tir de l'international lorientais Kevin Gameiro. Réduits � dix après l'expulsion pour un second carton jaune de leur défenseur Mapou Yangambiwa � la 73e minute, les joueurs de René Girard se sont même montrés dangereux en fin de match sans toutefois réaliser le hold-up.
Après ce partage des points, Montpellier est neuvième avec 27 points, tandis que Lorient reste � la 12e place avec 25 points.
Les neuf autres rencontres de l'ultime journée de championnat pour l'année 2010 auront lieu mercredi soir. Après une trêve � l'occasion des fêtes, la reprise en Ligue 1 est fixée au samedi 15 janvier.
Pascal Liétout pour le service français, édité par Nicole Dupont
Avertissement Nous vous rappelons que vous avez, lors de la création de votre compte, accepté les conditions d’utilisation du site. Celles-ci proscrivent notamment la diffamation, l’incitation � la haine raciale, l’atteinte aux bonnes mœurs. Nous vous prions donc de respecter strictement . A défaut, votre compte sera banni du site. Voir aussi : Droits de reproduction et de diffusion rservs � www.paris-normandie.fr

description.hltext_display: Corées: Séoul lance une deuxième vague de manoeuvres militaires
description.content:
La Corée du Sud va procéder cette semaine � une nouvelle vague de manoeuvres militaires, terrestres, aériennes et navales, quelques jours après les exercices sur une île bombardée par Pyongyang qui avaient porté la tension � son comble sur la péninsule coréenne.
L'armée a annoncé mercredi qu'elle allait entamer jeudi des manoeuvres militaires � tirs réels, terrestres et aériennes, près de la frontière avec le Nord. Les exercices se dérouleront � Pocheon, � 20 km au sud de la frontière entre les deux Corées, a indiqué un porte-parole de l'armée, précisant que ces manoeuvres seraient importantes.
Des manoeuvres similaires se sont déroulées � plusieurs reprises � Pocheon, a-t-il ajouté. Participeront � ces exercices 800 soldats, des hélicoptères, six avions de combat, des chars, des missiles anti-char, des canons autoportés et des lance-roquettes multiples.
Des manoeuvres navales ont par ailleurs démarré mercredi, � l'est de la péninsule, en mer du Japon, a ajouté l'armée. Elles se déroulent � une centaine de km au sud de la frontière avec le Nord et impliquent six navires de guerre et des hélicoptères. L'objectif est de s'entraîner � répondre en cas d'intrusion de sous-marins ou de navires de patrouille nord-coréens dans les eaux sud-coréennes, a indiqué l'armée.
Les manoeuvres "démontreront la solidité de notre préparation militaire", a déclaré le commandant du Premier bataillon armé, Choo-Eun-Sik, � l'agence sud-coréenne Yonhap. "Nous lancerons de sévères représailles si le Nord se risque � un autre acte provocateur tel que le bombardement de Yeonpyeong", a-t-il ajouté. Le 23 novembre, la Corée du Nord avait tiré 170 obus sur cette île sud-coréenne.
Ce bombardement, le premier d'une zone civile depuis la fin de la guerre de Corée (1953), a tué quatre Sud-coréens et provoqué un tollé international.
Lundi, Séoul a procédé � de brèves manoeuvres militaires � tirs réels sur Yeonpyeong, malgré les menaces de graves représailles par Pyongyang. La Corée du Nord a finalement décidé de ne pas riposter.
Selon l'ambassadeur chinois � l'ONU Wang Min, les deux Corées étaient ces derniers jours "proches de se livrer une guerre". "Nous espérons encore qu'ils peuvent maintenir le calme", a-t-il estimé mardi lors d'un débat aves des jeunes, au Conseil de sécurité. Mais "leurs différends durent depuis des décennies, pas depuis hier. Il est peu probable que leur problème puisse être résolu en une nuit", a-t-il ajouté.
Lundi, Pyongyang a accepté le retour des inspecteurs nucléaires de l'ONU qu'elle avait chassés en avril 2009, selon le gouverneur américain Bill Richardson, un ancien ambassadeur � l'ONU qui a effectué une visite de cinq jours dans le pays, qualifiée de "privée" par Washington.
Mais ce geste d'apparente bonne volonté, qui démontre selon les analystes la volonté de Pyongyang d'engager le dialogue avec les Etats-Unis, ne reçoit pour le moment qu'un accueil sceptique de Washington.
"En mettant de côté les discours et la rhétorique, ils savent ce qu'ils (doivent entreprendre) pour devenir un membre respecté de la communauté internationale", a déclaré mardi le porte-parole du président Barack Obama, Robert Gibbs, � propos des responsables du régime nord-coréen. "Les pourparlers � Six (sur le nucléaire) reprendront lorsque les Nord-Coréens démontreront leur volonté de changer leur attitude", a-t-il ajouté lors d'un point de presse. En avril 2009, Pyongyang avait quitté les pourparlers � Six sur son désarmement nucléaire (réunissant les deux Corées, le Japon, la Russie, les Etats-Unis et la Chine) et procédé un mois plus tard � un deuxième essai nucléaire.

description.hltext_display: Hawks' Kane, Hossa out; Stalberg ready to play
description.content:
Viktor Stalberg declared himself ready for action against the Nashville Predators on Wednesday, but Marian Hossa and Patrick Kane will not play.
CHICAGO -- The Chicago Blackhawks will get one of their walking wounded back from injury, but two other stars remain out.
Viktor Stalberg declared himself ready for action against the Nashville Predators on Wednesday, but Marian Hossa and Patrick Kane will not play.
"We're going to shoot for after Christmas with Hossa," coach Joel Quenneville said. "He looked good out there today. He's close."
Hossa practiced with his team and then stayed on the ice for over a half hour running drills by himself on Tuesday. He's missed the last nine games after colliding with a teammate in practice last month.
Kane did not practice on Tuesday making it three straight days off the ice for him as he recovers from an ankle injury suffered Dec. 7.
"I still think he's able to do a lot off the ice," Quenneville said. "I think his conditioning is still going to be right for game conditions. It's just a matter until he feels good on the ice. He's not too far away either."
Kane skated for several days but in obvious discomfort, though Quenneville stressed there has been no setback. Neither Kane nor Hossa were available for comment after practice.
Stalberg's discomfort is behind him after being checked into the boards from behind last Wednesday against Colorado. He left that contest with concussion-like symptoms and missed the next two, but says he's ready.
"I'm cleared to play," Stalberg said. "He hit me in a bad spot. It happens sometimes. I've been cleared as far as the protocol and all that stuff that has to be done."
Quenneville didn't go as far as declaring him in the lineup for Wednesday but said "we'll see how he is tomorrow. There is a chance he could play."
Jesse Rogers covers the Blackhawks for ESPNChicago.com and ESPN 1000.
